Summary Heading: Hidden Gem in Disneyland Resort Area
Summary: Hyatt House was a phenomenal option for a short Disneyland trip for my wife and me.   Before I selected this property, I read some of the reviews - and the only feedback people had that was negative seemed to be a “smell” in the elevators and some wear on furniture, etc. in the room. I can confirm a smell in the elevator, but to us it felt more like an industrial cleaner-type smell - likely tied to the laundry, etc, which I assume is at the basement level (speculation) - and honestly it was not bad at all - some folks clearly over exaggerated that. And as to the wear, sure there were some chipped edges of drawers and walls, but knowing how close this property is to Disneyland - it’s honestly impressive how well-kept it is considering how many families with kids must come
Manager Response: none

Summary: Awesome stay and staff. Everything about the experience was perfect. From check in to check out. Out of the 5 or so hotels we have used when visiting Disneyland this has been our favorite. The wife and I will definitely be staying at this property again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us in Anaheim! Your feedback here helps give future guests an idea of what to expect when staying with us. Additionally, it gives us an opportunity to grow in the right direction. We hope you have a wonderful rest of 2023.

Summary: Been a Hyatt member for 10 years.  Great options with the various chains and Hyatt House is perfect for a simple stay.  Clean, excellent service, and a satisfying breakfast included.  Kids will love it too.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, thank you for your kind words. We hope that Hyatt House and our other hotel names around the globe continue to be your go-to when traveling. Thank you for always giving us the opportunity to support you during your many travels. Have a wonderful rest of 2023.

Summary: Room was big & quiet despite the hotel being a family hotel. The staff were all kind and accommodating. It is about a ten minute walk to disney parks & several restaurants. Breakfast is included and my family enjoyed having a light breakfast before going to the parks. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience with us in Anaheim! We hope you were able to do everything you set out to do originally. Despite the weather! Have a wonderful day.

Summary: The staff at the front desk, breakfast staff and housekeeping staff were so friendly and helpful.  The hotel was very clean.  Breakfast was great. Big selection of cold and hot food. Great location to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to Hyatt! Hearing back from our guests is one of the best tools we have to strengthen our team. We hope that everyone was able to enjoy the area and do everything you planned to do!

Summary: We have stayed here the past 4 years with our Cheer team, and it's been nothing but amazing.  The rooms are so big which is great for large groups.  The breakfast has a great selection and the staff in the cafe are so welcoming.  Norea, Marinna & Oscar made the arrangements easy and stayed in touch prior to arrival and when on site.  The front desk guys Efrain and Joey still being there this year was a such a joy. The smiles and help they provided at all times were amazing.  Hope to continue to stay in the future as a family or group trips, and we always recommend to others going to Anaheim since it's a close walk to the convention center and the Disney parks.
Manager Response: It is great to hear from you! Thank you for staying with us at Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center! Our future guests and the hotel staff rely on your feedback

Summary: Hyatt House proved to be a comfortable, relaxing place to go to after a long day at a conference. From lounging on the sofa to sleeping peacefully in the bed. They provided a lot of amenities that, even though I didn't use, were nice to have. I'd stay here again and recommend to friends and coworkers.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed every minute of your time with us! Our team strives to provide exceptional experiences. We are glad to see we were able to do that for you.

Summary: Great experience as discoverist, we were able to get late check out. Also, all the staff was kind and friendly specially the cleaning staff and at the breakfast room. Anaheim public bus is one block away and Disneyland just a 10 minutes walk. There is a Walgreens and Starbucks at this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for you for coming in to Anaheim and spending your stay with us. It is great to hear you were able to enjoy the various amenities we have to offer our guests.

Summary: Right in the heart of Anaheim.  We lived watching the Disney Firework show from our room.  The hotel gas convention center in the title, but it’s still a good walk from the property.  Staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Your loyalty drives us forward! Thank you for choosing our hotel for your accommodations while visiting the Anaheim Resort area. We hope that your experience with us was nothing short of exceptional.

Summary: Check in was great, friendly staff, the hotel was quiet and clean. We were walking distances from Disneyland. They have strollers that you can rent if needed. The breakfast wasn’t the best but better than your usually cold free breakfast like some hotels. Would recommend and stay again. The rooms are big enough to comfortably sleep 6 people.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to support you during your visit to our area. We hope that you were able to complete all the vacation goals you had for this trip!

Summary: This hotel is a bit of a disaster. I was sure because it was Hyatt it would be nice and the location for Disney is fantastic, but there were so many issues. First, it's so noisy at night. The cars on that street are so incredibly loud we all woke up numerous times in the night. Our second night, we got back from Disney and one of the side tables was covered in little black bugs. So gross. I called and they were very responsive, moving us to a different room. The room we were moved to, however, was an adjoining room which is not ideal and the lock to the adjoining room was broken. Maintenance had to come and fix the lock. Then we needed the refrigerator the next night and it was broken so maintenance had to come back the to replace the refrigerator. Other than coffee, the
Manager Response: Your feedback is going to help shape us for the future. Thank you for sharing what you liked and disliked as these are valuable tools for us to build off of when looking for areas of improvement. Please note that I will share your feedback with my team to work off. I hope that everyone enjoyed their time in Anaheim.

Summary: My husband and I enjoyed a pleasant week long stay here last week. We loved having a room that included a bunk bed, family partitioned area of our room, as we were babysitting our grandchildren for several nights of our stay. Each section of the room had their own tv, which was wonderful for both our grandkids, and ourselves. We all loved the great, free breakfast daily. It included: scrambled eggs, diced potatoes, sausage, waffles, oatmeal, nice fruit including blueberries, boiled eggs, cereal, milk, oat milk, toast, bagels, English muffins, milk,  juices, coffee and a great tea selection. The breakfast staff was really helpful, and kept replenishing the food right up until closing time. I want to complement your Resturant staff, Margarita, Anna and Ray! Each morning they
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our family just returned from a 6 night stay at the Hyatt House and it was the best hotel experiences we’ve had with kids (5, 7 & 9). The hotel rooms are great for families and the staff is phenomenal. Myrna at the breakfast buffet was a ray of sunshine each morning before heading out to Disney for the day. I have no hesitation recommending this hotel and we will certainly be back.
Manager Response: Greetings and many thanks for choosing us for your hotel stay! We hope that whatever brought you to the area, you were able to fulfill your goals while staying with us! Have a wonderful holiday season!

Summary: Hotel staff and housekeeping were amazing!  The overall hotel fit our needs but the smell of sewer was so bad at times.  The hotel looks a little worn in places.  Location was great.  Not too far from Disney and in walking distance to everything you need.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience during your most recent stay. We hope that you and your guests, sincerely, enjoyed our accommodations and amenities at the hotel.

Summary: The location is great, just a short walk to Disneyland.  And, there is a Wallgreens and a Starbucks adjacent.  The rooms were okay, not the best but not the worst.  Customer service was phenomenal, though!  And the bartender was great.  We were not able to take advantage of the free breakfast so I cannot rate that.
Manager Response: We know why our guests come to our hotel. It is family time! We are grateful that you chose to use our hotel for your stay during such an important time. We hope that everyone enjoyed their stay!

Summary: Great hotel with great customer service (chase). Front desk was very helpful and the whole hotel staff was nice and friendly. Also had free continental breakfast which is important for kids to have in morning to hold them over till lunch.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. Your satisfaction with your stay is of the upmost importance to us. We hope that we were able to meet your expectations.

Summary Heading: Probably the worst hyatt property I've stayed, expensive at high season, dark and dirty room
Summary: Stayed one night. I am not a Hyatt globalist but a explorist level. They got me a room, just a basic one w/o any upgrade, which is fine. The room was old and a bit dirty side...  Front desk staff does not seem to care about the guests. They do the work (make the room keys, keep the luggage,etc) but that is it. Can find any difference if I am at the hyatt property (which usually has a higher standard) or a cheap motel out of nowhere. Parking is $30 per night. It was high season the price per night was over $300 USD. I would never stay here at that rate. I think $125 per night should be the right price for what you get.   Some positives; 1) close to the free shuttle (~ 7 to 10 mins) 2) Walgreen in the same building in case you need anything
Manager Response: A review such as the one you have prepared and posted for us is what makes hospitality our favorite industry! We hope that you all enjoyed your time in Anaheim while staying with us. We are happy to hear you were able to take full advantage of the amenities we have to offer our guests.

Summary: We had a nice stay at Hyatt House last week.  The room met our family’s needs well, check in and out was smooth and it was a short walk to Disneyland.  We love the King and bunk configuration and had plenty of space.  The main reason for 4 stars instead of 5 was that both when we arrived and when our room was serviced mid-stay, the top bunk was left unmade.  Especially surprising mid-stay since it was clear someone was sleeping there.  It was upsetting for my daughter and a bit challenging and unexpected that we had to make our bed at the hotel, certainly in this price range.  The breakfast was also rather uninspiring.  That said, we would stay again and request that the top bunk be made up in advance.
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Hyatt House! Your loyalty is so appreciated! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your entire stay with us and had lots of fun together!

Summary: We had a great stay here. We enjoyed the 5th floor kitchen view room that gave a view of Disney weekend fireworks. Our 1st night was 4th floor, but too much noise above us early morning caused us to ask for a top floor room. Also the  4th floor view room we had paid extra for was completely blocked by palm trees - I can’t see how they can call those view rooms! The top floor had an excellent view and was quiet. The morning buffet breakfast was plentiful - scrambled eggs, diced potatoes, sausage, waffles, oatmeal, nice fruit including blueberries, boiled eggs, cereal, milk, oat milk, toast, juices, coffee and tea selection. The breakfast staff was really helpful and kept replenishing the food right ip until closing time. They came to my table to let me know they were closing and
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us for our future guests to see! Your loyalty to Hyatt is everything! We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Fantastic visit with an incredible breakfast staff
Summary: The hotel is ideally located only a 15 minute walk from the front gate to both Disney parks. Probably the thing that I will remember the most about this visit was the incredible breakfast staff and how hard they worked to begin creating the Disney magic while we were still in the hotel, eating breakfast each day, they developed relationships with each of my grandchildren and help set them up for a magical vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us here! We hope that you had an exceptional experience staying with us in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary: The service, rooms, and breakfast were excellent.  The staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was delicious. The only things I would recommend are better mattresses and daily housekeeping rather than every other day if only for coffee packs and garbage pickup.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary Heading: EVERTHING IS GREAT EXCEPT THE BEDS
Summary: So close to Disneyland the two room bunk set up was PERFECT.  The location with starbucks, walgreens and CVS is great.   It was great to have separate space for a call or a nap.  Staff was friendly.  There was a 250 dollar security deposit which was a surprise and I will check it was credited back.  Our rooms were cleaned each day. which was a nice surprise.  The only bad thing I can say is the beds are ROCK HARD they need to work on getting better ones.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear back from you on a guest survey! We hope that you were able to do everything you planned to do for this trip! We hope we provided an exceptional experience for you and your valued guests.

Summary: This is our family’s first ever-week-long trip. We had chosen to stay at the Hyatt House due to its location and amenities. It isn’t far from Disneyland. Our car trip took us 7-plus hours to get to Anaheim. Our room was long ready when we arrived, so we did not have to wait.   The front desk made check-in seamless and stress-free, providing all the information we needed; they were welcoming and accommodating. It was our first time here in Anaheim, and he answered any concerning questions we had. I mentioned that another adult would stay for 1-2 days; there were no additional costs. You can pick up two water bottles daily for free, which is helpful if walking to and from Disneyland. Parking is discounted for three-plus-night stays. Parking was prepaid, so no worries about
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to Hyatt! Hearing back from our guests is one of the best tools we have to strengthen our team. We hope that everyone was able to enjoy the area and do everything you planned to do!

Summary: It’s our second time here, first time in 2020. We booked mainly for the hot breakfast but got more than we expected. Excellent customer service. Came to Anaheim to celebrate my daughter’s 4th birthday and she could not stop telling us everyday we stayed how much she loved the hotel. From the pool to the jacuzzi, to the bunk beds to the hot breakfast. She loved it so much!   We want to especially thank Rey in the breakfast dining area, he really made our trip & my daughter’s b-day extra memorable.   While we were finishing up our breakfast on our last day, Rey came by and asked if he can take our plates.. he asked us how we were doing but my daughter heard “how old are you” so she held up 4 fingers! He laughed and said oh it’s your birthday and looked at me for confirmation in
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. We realize you have many options to choose from for hotel accommodations. We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: The Best Hotel to stay if your visiting Disneyland
Summary: Excellent, Clean, Súper Friendly Staff, Great Breakfast from 6:30 am to 9:00 am, very close to Disney Parks we love staying here. We always get the family suite and it’s super spacious with a small kitchen and island. Safe parking lot !
Manager Response: It is great to hear from you! Thank you for staying with us at Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center! Our future guests and the hotel staff rely on your feedback

Summary: Staff was super kind and ray and margarita and alma were absolutely amazing very helpful front desk was amazing . The front desk made our trip amazing and felt very safe with my family there. Will be booking there again really soon
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed every minute of your time with us! Our team strives to provide exceptional experiences. We are glad to see we were able to do that for you.

Summary Heading: Good stay for the most part but some things…
Summary: Everything about the stay was pretty good…the distance wasn’t bad at all and the staff was very friendly. The only few things were…the smell in the garage and elevator sometimes smelled like sulfur which was unpleasant. And there was a false fire alarm on our last night at like 5am that woke us up in a panic. Not sure what happened but after about a minute or two we went back to sleep
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to support you during your visit to our area. We hope that you were able to complete all the vacation goals you had for this trip!

Summary: Great place to stay. Short walk to Disneyland. Clean and comfortable place. Never didn't feel safe there. Pool and gym was nice and clean as well. Breakfast had plenty to choose from and was fairly decent. One of the best free breakfasts in a hotel I’ve had. Would defiantly stay here again.
Manager Response: Your loyalty drives us forward! Thank you for choosing our hotel for your accommodations while visiting the Anaheim Resort area. We hope that your experience with us was nothing short of exceptional.

Summary: That’s our second time staying here . I couldn’t be happier with the staff. Everyone are super helpful , kind and happy. The hotel is clean and the food is great . The front desk always offer a smile to my children. I enjoyed staying here . The view is great and we could see the fireworks at night . It’s about 7-9 min walk to Disney . They have Starbucks, pizza and Walgreens  Next To the hotel
Manager Response: We know why our guests come to our hotel. It is family time! We are grateful that you chose to use our hotel for your stay during such an important time. We hope that everyone enjoyed their stay!

Summary: The hotel was in a central location closed to Walgreens, Starbucks and Disney parks. Staff were friendly and accommodating. Our room was very clean. This is one of the very few hotels were they actually vacuum their rooms and not use a lint roller to “clean.” I would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. Your satisfaction with your stay is of the upmost importance to us. We hope that we were able to meet your expectations.

Summary: Love this place, its my wife & i’s go to hotel when we go to disneyland the staff are super friendly from front desk to the housekeepers. We are magic key holders so we tend to visit often and the front desk staff remember us which really makes us feel right at home. We will continue to stay here! Hotel itself is very clean and up to date gotta love that!
Manager Response: Good morning, thank you for your kind words. We are so happy to hear you had nothing but exceptional experiences with our family here at Hyatt House. Thank you for sharing your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Solid Choice in the Anaheim Vicinity
Summary: The Hyatt House at the corner of Harbor and Katella is everything you would want in a mid-range hotel. Added to that is the friendly, helpful staff and you got a solid 5/5.   The only CON is that some of the room finishes need a bit of repair, such as trim coming loose from the wall, or caulk around fixtures in the bathroom.
Manager Response: We are grateful to have had the opportunity to accommodate you and your family’s hotel needs while traveling to the Anaheim resort area. We hope that we lived up to the expectations you had for us!

Summary Heading: Great hotel option for Disney trips
Summary: We’ve stayed here twice now and have had a great experience both times. Clean rooms & easy parking. Decent continental breakfast. Quick walk to Disney if that’s part of your trip. Love that Walgreens and Starbucks are both in the building, plus lots of other restaurants nearby which are an easy walk.
Manager Response: Your loyalty to our hotel is greatly appreciated and sorely needed. Your loyalty and your feedback help other guests find out how awesome we are here in Anaheim. Thank you for continuing to stay with us!

Summary: The staff was very quick to remedy the noise from the room next to us through the adjoining door. We were given a great room that better fit our families needs, as we were traveling with our children, one of whom is autistic. The noise was an issue and the staff quickly fixed it for us.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, camdon18, thank you for providing us feedback and a detailed description of your experience with us. Some times things go wrong, and how quickly we respond shows how much we care about our guests' experience. We hope that our speedy response to your concerns shows you how much we value you and your loyalty.

Summary: Absolutely outstanding experience from start to finish. Loved staying here for our 3 nights and two days exploring Disneyland. Grab a great breakfast and walk to the park and back in 15 minutes or less each way. Everyone we interacted with from the hotel was so kind, happy and helpful. Very clean and secure. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, and thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback on your experience with us! It is rewarding to have our guests leave us feedback on the impact our dedication to hospitality had on their stay. We hope to be able to support you and your loved ones once again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Rooms need a face lift and they need to lose the insane amount of plastic at the breakfast.
Summary: Rooms need a face lift. They are getting too much wear and tear and they are very used. Otherwise great location. I also HATE the fact they use styrofoam plates and 13 plastic cups. So much plastic. They wipe the styrofoam to make it look like it's being recycled but that material isn't recyclable.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience in our hotel, A7897RLmaggiem. Your feedback helps us grow. We hope to apply the feedback you have given us to hone in on our opportunities for improvement. We hope that you were able to enjoy your stay.

Summary Heading: Loved how close we were to Disneyland
Summary: Very nice hotel.  Enjoyed it with my family.  Super close to Disneyland, only a 10 or 15 minute walk. Also really nice to have Walgreens attached to the hotel for all the little odds and ends you forget or need. Breakfast was also delicious! I loaded up on pork sausage and tater tots most mornings.  Loved our stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hyatt House in Anaheim for your most recent trip to Anaheim. We hope that everyone enjoyed the accommodations we have to offer. We hope everyone had fun at the parks!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for families going to disney
Summary: We’ve stayed at Hyatt house Anaheim twice as a family of 6. Like many, we were in Anaheim for a family Disneyland vacation. This hotel is clean, spacious, and convenient. The hot breakfast makes the mornings really easy and stress free. It’s hard to find a hotel that comfortably accommodates our families sleep needs and this one is the best.
Manager Response: It is great to hear from you! Thank you for staying with us at Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center! Our future guests and the hotel staff rely on your feedback

Summary: The best part of the trip is when you have people that help you and answer questions and the Hyatt staff did not disappoint. We felt welcomed and weren’t afraid to ask questions cause we had a lot. The rooms could use some usb ports so make sure you take a plug to charge your things cause there are none. Breakfast was good but pretty much the same everyday. Even the meat . Close to all kinds of restaurants and of course Disneyland. We enjoyed our trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. We realize you have many options to choose from for hotel accommodations. We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary: The pillows were fluffy, the sliding doors really sound-proofed a lot more than we expected! But a lot of the amenities weren’t up to Hyatt quality. Our fridge was broken and so was the bathroom mirror light. It’s a really small space so I wouldn’t stay there with more than two kids. Teens might be a stretch.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us here! We hope that you had an exceptional experience staying with us in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel for a great price
Summary: Always top of our list of where to stay at Disneyland. Close to the parks, amazing staff (Myrna at breakfast is our favorite, my kids wanted to bring her home with us). Breakfast was included and had a variety of options.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary: Quick and easy check in, Had a 2 queen suite with a full kitchen. My only complaint the whole stay was no water pressure in the shower in the morning. But beds were clean and comfortable, room was very clean, and the tv swiveled from the sitting area to bedroom! Which was so cool.  Free breakfast was a great plus. $28/night for parking was steep, but very comparable for the area. Will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us for our future guests to see! Your loyalty to Hyatt is everything! We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary: The rooms were very clean and not too small. And the staff were very helpful and friendly. They had good breakfast choices even though it was free, and great location to go the Convention Center or to Disney!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us here! We hope that you had an exceptional experience staying with us in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary: We arrived early for an event at the Convention Center but our room was ready and we were able to settle in prior to attending.  The Convention. center was a short 10 minute walk and there were many restaurants nearby we could walk to.  Our room was lovely and we had a Birds Eye. View of the fireworks from Disneyland!  It was my birthday so it felt very special..
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Hyatt House! Your loyalty is so appreciated! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your entire stay with us and had lots of fun together!

Summary Heading: Great hotel-longer walk than hoped for from Disneyland, but would stay again.
Summary: Loved that Blaze pizza and Walgreens were steps away from the lobby. Super helpful with tired feet and with kids. Clean and nice. Close to Disneyland, but my husband has trouble walking so it was a bit too far for us, and our young child (8). Pull out couch bed was terrible, but thankfully our child did not notice. Our Queen bed was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center, we, sincerely, hope that you enjoyed your entire stay with us. We hope that you all enjoyed each day out at the parks!

Summary: Margarita was so attentive during our breakfast in the morning and made sure we were well taken of! Super sweet lady so helpful answered all questions. She cleared our table as we ate and came around when it was closer to the end of breakfast to see if we would like anything else before they close everything up. Very helpful
Manager Response: Good afternoon, thank you for choosing Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention, we appreciate your loyalty. Thank you for sharing the experience you had with our team member, Margarita. We will make sure she knows her dedication to hospitality does not go unnoticed.

Summary: We booked this hotel for our honeymoon. After a long research we chose this hotel and we don’t regret it at all. It is perfectly located within a walking distance from Disney. We wanted a hotel with a kitchen and it was fantastic. The room is clean and has everything you need for a confortable stay. But what we liked the most was the kindly attention we received from Angela who checked us in and let us get to our room 7 hours before check in time. That was such a pleasant surprise!
Manager Response: We are grateful to have had the opportunity to accommodate you and your family’s hotel needs while traveling to the Anaheim resort area. We hope that we lived up to the expectations you had for us!

Summary Heading: The suites are a great, ROOMY option for family of 6!
Summary: This is a GREAT, roomy hotel for families! We booked a stay through getawaytoday in a 2 Queen suite. We easily fit our family of 6 in it.  It had so much room! 2 queen beds were in a seperate room with a door, and a pull-out couch was in the living room area. The pull out couch was actually pretty comfortable! the mat was thick so you didnt feel the bars underneath. Definitely the most comfortable pull-out bed that we've seen. The suite also had a bar/table with 4 chairs and a HUGE kitchen with FULL SIZE fridge, full size dishwasher, and lots of cupboards with all the dishes you need! It was basically like an airbnb! We went in january when it was cold, but the pool was heated so the kids still swam at night and we hit up the hot tub. Towels are available at the pool. Breakfast
Manager Response: Your loyalty to our hotel is greatly appreciated and sorely needed. Your loyalty and your feedback help other guests find out how awesome we are here in Anaheim. Thank you for continuing to stay with us!

Summary: We stayed with points.  We had a great room with a upgrade.  The breakfast was the same as every other Hyatt, but it had a very large eating area.  Parking was easy and convenient.  We went to Disneyland and was a close walk to the entrance.  I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Greetings and many thanks for choosing us for your hotel stay! We hope that whatever brought you to the area, you were able to fulfill your goals while staying with us! Have a wonderful holiday season!

Summary Heading: Much Better Options near Disneyland for similar $$
Summary: We rented two rooms, a single and a family room. The Courtyard's family rooms are much better for a similar price. The main issues with the Hyatt: the door between the children/adult sleeping area did not close all the way, layout was tight/weird, upper bunk bed was not made up, the blinds did not work (had to get maintenance to fix them), and rooms are loud (traffic from the street & hallway noise).   The check-in took a while because only one person was working at the front desk and the air freshener in the lobby is extremely intense.
Manager Response: Your feedback matters! Thank you for sharing with us what you liked and disliked. Both play such important roles for us when looking at our reviews to make improvements. I will take your feedback back to the rest of my team for consideration. We hope that you enjoyed your time in our area!

Summary: The hotel was amazing! They went above and beyond to make our family stay memorable.  Even though we were only there were 1 night it was such a good experience.  Traveling with twin toddlers us stressful and when the staff goes the extra mile it really makes such a difference..Margarita in the food area is a gem. She helped our family with breakfast and was an extra hand when she didn't need to be. She was so helpful and really made us want to come back again..From the front desk check in to everyone we encountered through check out, we were impressed.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience during your most recent stay. We hope that you and your guests, sincerely, enjoyed our accommodations and amenities at the hotel.

Summary Heading: To stay or not to stay
Summary: This hotel was good. It was nice to have a hot breakfast and the breakfast was so so. Eggs, sausage, waffles or french toast ( not that good), fruit, oatmeal, and more. Coffee was good. Water pressure for shower was not good but at least you could get clean. Would I stay here again…..yes I would. Staff was great and friendly. It was close to Disneyland which is what we wanted and wasn’t nearly as expensive as Disney hotel options.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know what you liked and disliked during your time with us. Your feedback helps us focus on specific things, so thank you for giving us the opportunity to improve. We hope you enjoyed your stay overall.

Summary: Great room close to Disneyland. We got the bunk bed room which our kiss loved.  Breakfast everymorning was great and the staff held out bags so we could enjoy Disneyland before our late flight out.   Being next to Walgreens was fantastic as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. Your satisfaction with your stay is of the upmost importance to us. We hope that we were able to meet your expectations.

Summary: Was a great place for our family of 6 to stay(2 parents and 4 kids). It had plenty of room, have the kitchen was nice so we didn’t have to buy every meal at the park. Also loved the breakfast in the morning. They had a great selection of food offered. Was close enough of a walk from Disneyland that we were able to go back mid-day and take naps. Would highly recommend staying here, and plan to stay here again the next time we come back
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to support you during your visit to our area. We hope that you were able to complete all the vacation goals you had for this trip!

Summary Heading: Best hotel in Anaheim for big families on a budget but very stylish and convenient!
Summary: Got the room with 2 queens and a kitchen!  So nice and spacious!  Also had a pull out couch and a 40 inch tv.  Stove, microwave, mini fridge, sink, and dishwasher included.  Kitchen island to eat on.  Bathroom was pretty spacious too with a tub and single sink.  Looks like a minimalist home but with a modern style.  I recommend to stay as close to the elevator as possible since the ice room, gym, spa, pool, and the laundromat is within 15-20 yards from the elevator.  The parking garage had a funky smell so I ended up parking lobby level by Walgreens.  Breakfast was good.  Coffee, juice, tea, cereal, toast, bagel, meat/vegan..  dining area always had space and there is also an outdoor area.  Employees are very helpful!  Small bar/food area and small area to buy fast food snacks.
Manager Response: Thank you for you for coming in to Anaheim and spending your stay with us. It is great to hear you were able to enjoy the various amenities we have to offer our guests.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Hyatt House. This was our first stay here. We stayed in the One Bedroom King Suite with Bunk beds and it was a good size for our family of 5. (For reference, my kids are 14, 11 & 8.) The bunk beds worked well for the 8 & 11 year old and my 14 year old slept on the pull out sofa bed. The bed was comfortable and the room and bathroom were clean. We normally stay at the Hyatt Regency for our Disney trips but wanted to try out this property. We were not disappointed. In fact, my kids loved the hotel. The free breakfast was great to start our days! We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed every minute of your time with us! Our team strives to provide exceptional experiences. We are glad to see we were able to do that for you.

Summary: Rooms need some TLC, plugs for your electronics next to your bed will be nice, also a better sound abatement strategy because you can hear almost everything that’s happening in the floors above you or the hallways.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. Your satisfaction with your stay is of the upmost importance to us. We hope that we were able to meet your expectations.

Summary: Fantastic hotel with a great staff. Had our room ready before we expected and made our stay easy breezy. Complimentary breakfast looked fantastic. We did not partake since we had plans at the resort. But it was a nice option.
Manager Response: We know why our guests come to our hotel. It is family time! We are grateful that you chose to use our hotel for your stay during such an important time. We hope that everyone enjoyed their stay!

Summary: Initially checked into a premium suite at Hyatt Regency OC 8p Sunday. Knew immediately we'd be checking out early as pullout bed was littered with stray hairs (Housekeeping uncovered more as they remade the previously unmade bed).   Even though we checked into HH 28+ hours ahead of schedule we were accommodated into a pristine suite right away that smelled of cinnamon. Closest Hyatt property to Disneyland, impeccable facilities, cortial affable staff. HH is our go-to OC hotel from now on.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience during your most recent stay. We hope that you and your guests, sincerely, enjoyed our accommodations and amenities at the hotel.

Summary: A great stay at Hyatt House, didn't realise how convenient it was for our family trip to Disney. Everything else we could need was easily accessible and close. Rooms were perfect for family of 4 with teenage children, beds were very comfortable. Thank you Hyatt House
Manager Response: Greetings and many thanks for choosing us for your hotel stay! We hope that whatever brought you to the area, you were able to fulfill your goals while staying with us! Have a wonderful holiday season!

Summary: Our room was on the 3rd floor facing the street and was very noisy when trying to sleep. Also, room above us there was a lot of thumping and loud noise in the middle of night and both caused difficulty sleeping. Overall good stay just loud.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Close to Disneyland, clean rooms great staff and a very good free breakfast. Starbucks, Blaze Pizza and Walgreens are on the hotel property for your convenience. We have stayed here multiple times and have always had a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us feedback. Your loyalty to our hotel and the effort put into leaving feedback is greatly appreciated.

Summary Heading: Great experience at the Hyatt House
Summary: We recently trvelled to Anaheim for a trip with our kids and grandkids. The Hyatt House is a great place to stay with family and having one room with bunk beds for the kids and the other with a kitchen was key to our trip being such a success. All of the staff were friendly and helpful. Special kudos to Joey at the front desk for going above and beyond to make sure we had rooms close together that worked for us. We will return!
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to Hyatt! Hearing back from our guests is one of the best tools we have to strengthen our team. We hope that everyone was able to enjoy the area and do everything you planned to do!

Summary Heading: Clean hotel 15 min walk to Disneyland
Summary: The set up of the family suite was excellent for a family of five. The room splits into two rooms with a frosted French door. The three kids all got their own bed - no fighting. Breakfast and hot tub were great. Very spacious and clean hotel.
Manager Response: Your loyalty to our hotel is greatly appreciated and sorely needed. Your loyalty and your feedback help other guests find out how awesome we are here in Anaheim. Thank you for continuing to stay with us!

Summary: The front desk staff upon arrival was very friendly and made us feel welcome. Our room was clean and the well stocked kitchen was impressive ( although we didn’t utilize it as we were in the Disney parks for our meals except breakfast ).  Lots of breakfast items to choose from before our days adventures and the staff in the breakfast room were friendly and efficient about clearing tables and restocking food items.  The only negative is that on our last night, after a long day at Disney, the front desk staff person was not at all helpful when we had an issue with our toilet. I was offered to change rooms but at almost 1 am, this seemed like a lengthy process and not a good option. All I needed was a plunger but apparently there were none to be found until 08:07 the next morning (
Manager Response: Your feedback matters! Thank you for sharing with us what you liked and disliked. Both play such important roles for us when looking at our reviews to make improvements. I will take your feedback back to the rest of my team for consideration. We hope that you enjoyed your time in our area!

Summary: We had a great stay here for 6 nights.  We were greeted by Angel at the front desk when checking in and were upgraded to a theme park/fireworks view without us asking.  Angel was so kind to confirm if we would be fine with the room, given it’s on the street side and I am a light sleeper as I had noted on my reservation.  The room has all the amenities, although it is a little basic as it is not like a timeshare type 1-bedroom suite with higher grade finishes.  The layout, as many probably mentioned, is a little odd with the kitchen by the window and seating area by the door.  The bathroom door also hits the bedroom door when both are opened and also auto closes.  For us, it was no big deal as we just tied the handles to keep both doors opened.    Breakfast was very convenient
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. We realize you have many options to choose from for hotel accommodations. We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary: We had a suite with a king bed and bunks. The bed was probably the worst I have slept in at a hyatt, so incredibly hard and uncomfortable. This made the walk to the parks very difficult each day. Maybe if we had rested well, the mile each way wouldn't have been such a big deal. There was no shuttle. There was a smell in our room similar to urine, although it appeared clean. The room itself was pretty run down, for example,  the dresser drawers finish was chipped and wouldn't stay shut. So we just walked around them open all week. The staff was the best part of our stay, extremely helpful and attentive. I wouldn't recommend due to the value of what you get for the price. Not something I would expect in that price range.
Manager Response: Your feedback matters! Thank you for sharing with us what you liked and disliked. Both play such important roles for us when looking at our reviews to make improvements. I will take your feedback back to the rest of my team for consideration. We hope that you enjoyed your time in our area!

Summary: We stayed here because the location was very convenient to Disneyland. Everything you need is within walking distance. The property itself and rooms are a bit dated.   We had a confirmed upgrade that wasn't honored. When checking in, the front desk attempted to upsell us the room that was already assigned. The Assistant General Manager Richard R. reached out initially after we voiced our concern but subsequent emails went unanswered. Communication could be improved upon.
Manager Response: A review such as the one you have prepared and posted for us is what makes hospitality our favorite industry! We hope that you all enjoyed your time in Anaheim while staying with us. We are happy to hear you were able to take full advantage of the amenities we have to offer our guests.

Summary: Highly recommend. Great proximity to disney. Room size was great. Only downfall was that the pool was not heated and very cold. Overall happy with our experience. Would stay there again! The family room was perfect for our family of 4!
Manager Response: We are grateful to have had the opportunity to accommodate you and your family’s hotel needs while traveling to the Anaheim resort area. We hope that we lived up to the expectations you had for us!

Summary: Speedy check in and beautiful suite! Had more than enough space for this family of three! A bonus is being so close to Disneyland. The walk was a straight shot and if you get a view room you get to see the fireworks from your room! Will definitely make this my top choice the next time I do Disneyland
Manager Response: Greetings and many thanks for choosing us for your hotel stay! We hope that whatever brought you to the area, you were able to fulfill your goals while staying with us! Have a wonderful holiday season!

Summary: Great Service from All Staff from the Hotel , but One person made the difference her name is Margarita from the restaurant AMazing Work, Her service always Put her atención in our Needs, se made my stay an amazing one , the Hotel very very recomend
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience during your most recent stay. We hope that you and your guests, sincerely, enjoyed our accommodations and amenities at the hotel.

Summary Heading: Excellent Staff!!!!!  Close to Disney … but STAFF IS WONDERFUL!!!
Summary: I always stay at Hyatt House. It is clean , friendly and steps away from Disneyland.   But… it is the STAFF that keeps me coming back.  I stay here when I’m working in the area and Angela R.  Is  always so helpful.  A special shout out to Efrain and Joey for checking me in and always remembering my name.    The entire staff goes above and beyond to exceed expectations.   Thanks all!!!!
Manager Response: We know why our guests come to our hotel. It is family time! We are grateful that you chose to use our hotel for your stay during such an important time. We hope that everyone enjoyed their stay!

Summary Heading: Not a trustworthy place to stay
Summary: We felt absolutely betrayed by the management at this property. We were checked out of our room without any regard to our personal belongings after being told that we had at 4 pm checkout. This is a blatant disregard for the contract that we made with the front desk. Our food and ice pack were thrown away and that was the reason we needed the room until 4. Our private belongings were left at the front desk because they thought we left the property without checking out. We were at Disneyland and had to come back early to sort this mess out. I would not trust this management to stand by the globalist late check out policy!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know your experience. Your feedback helps us focus on specific things, so thank you for giving us the opportunity to improve. We hope you enjoyed your stay overall.

Summary Heading: The best and friendliest staff are in this hotel!
Summary: Over the years we have stayed in many hotels and I have a degree in hotel management. This is the one hotel that has the best, friendliest, most helpful staff by far.  And the unbelievable thing is all the staff- front desk, food service, housekeeping, etc are all so nice and polite.  The facilities are also very very nice.  We felt pampered and treated as VIPs in this hotel.  I give this hotel an A+++ rating.  Congratulations to the management of this fine fine hotel and all your wonderful staff.  We would come back to this hotel whenever we’re in the area.  👍
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us here! We hope that you had an exceptional experience staying with us in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary: Nice, clean and spacious rooms. Conveniently located within walking distance to Disneyland. Walgreens next door fir odds and ends and lots of restaurants within walking distance as well. Nice breakfast spread with lots of hot and cold options. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary: I have stayed at the Hyatt house once before, but this time, going back there, the entire staff, was super amazing and friendly  , Angela and her staff made us feel like we were home, the next morning, when we down to the breakfast area to our surprise, one of the staff members there her name is Margarita recognize me from five years ago she made us feel so comfortable I was very surprised that she recognizes, she is such a sweetheart she was not only taking care of us, but the rest of the guests there the place was full and everyone was enjoying themselves, I would definitely recommend staying at the Hyatt House of Anaheim I would not only give them a five stars but I’ll definitely give them a 100% job well done
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to Hyatt House for such a spectacular celebration, and congratulations! Thank you for not only leaving feedback, but taking the effort to remember and mention some of the team at HH that stood out during your visit. Have a wonderful new year and best of luck!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for your family Disney vacation.
Summary: We loved our room and the breakfast. Covered parking was a nice perk, as was the walkable distance to Disneyland. The staff members were nice and the rooms were clean and comfortable. The perfect family spot for a family Disney adventure.
Manager Response: good morning, joshlF4322VK, thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback regarding your most recent stay with us. Your loyalty and feedback are both greatly appreciated. We hope everyone had fun while visiting the parks.

Summary: Wonderful room and staff! Definitely would stay again! Great place for a family! The rooms were clean and breakfast was great! Bunkbeds were perfect for our family! Location was ideal! Quick walk to Disneyland and restaurants attached to the hotel. Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Good morning, Jaclyn R, thank you for always choosing to stay at Hyatt House. We hope that your kids were able to enjoy the bunk beds! We know how much kids look forward to bunk beds when visiting. It was a pleasure to support you during your stay.

Summary: Amazing staff! I am so glad we chose to stay at this location again. This was our 3rd time staying here while visiting Disneyland. My husband was out in the hospital while there and the staff was so helpful.
Manager Response: We are so grateful for your loyalty to Hyatt House here in Anaheim. We take pride in supporting our guests to be their very best each day. We hope your husband has a speedy recovery. Best of luck to you all in 2023.

Summary: I was traveling with my 3 and 4 year old to Disneyland and this property was the perfect choice! The staff were all incredibly helpful and accommodating, especially Angel at reception, who helped me with a cart and ensured my family member rooms were on the same floor as us. The hotel is an easy walk to Disneyland, the breakfast was excellent, rooms very clean and the staff were all incredibly kind and helpful. We will be back!
Manager Response: Hi lauralratajczak, thank you for providing feedback regarding your most recent stay in Anaheim. We are so happy to have had the chance to accommodate you and your guests. We hope that everyone enjoyed breakfast, and the short-walk to Disneyland parks.

Summary: I would like a some sort of refund for my experience. I had a barely working fridge, I had to remove calcium buildup from shower head, was served multiple ego breakfast meals(previous stay had a different meal every day). Shower grout was covered over multiple times instead of correcting properly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Big rooms with a nice kitchen. It’s a 15 min walk to Disneyland, and we strolled our toddler and also walked her too. Amazing breakfast that was well stocked and staffed. Parking was a breeze since they have it right below their hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary: 5 of us in a room with two queens and a sofa bed.  The good: Beds very comfy Breakfast spread was awesome Bathroom was not cramped, very nice Staff very friendly and helpful Hotel kept sparkling, really nice Location is great for Disney Kitchenette seemed well stocked, though we didn’t use it much, aside from the sink.  Ice right down the hall Walgreens and CVS right there, very handy.   The less good; The room was cramped because of the tv and shelving being right in the middle of the room.   Only good mirror was in the bathroom—second mirror located by the door was not large and not well lit at all, so it was difficult to use. when 5 people are getting ready in the morning, you need a good second mirror/vanity area outside of the bathroom.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear back from you on a guest survey! We hope that you were able to do everything you planned to do for this trip! We hope we provided an exceptional experience for you and your valued guests.

Summary: Anaheim Hyatt House staff are superb. They welcomed our family-breakfast was delicious and kitchen team so sweet with all our little kids. Front desk was kind & accommodating! Had my first ever early check in at a hotel. Easy walk to Disney with kids. Rooms spacious and beds comfortable. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Greetings and many thanks for choosing us for your hotel stay! We hope that whatever brought you to the area, you were able to fulfill your goals while staying with us! Have a wonderful holiday season!

Summary: When going to Disneyland, this place is walking distance from the parks, there’s a Starbucks, food locations all around 697 & their customer service was phenomenal! We would definitely stay here again, Hyatt never seems to disappoint us! :0)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. Your satisfaction with your stay is of the upmost importance to us. We hope that we were able to meet your expectations.

Summary: In shorty i don't recommend this property.  The experience I had with this hotel is almost same as what I get from a cheap road side motel. There are better hotels with better prices and location. Property is at least quite clean    Bad things with this Hotel.  unfriendly staff. Most of them do very basic only. don't expect welcoming atmosphere or anything special. Some just looked mad all the time. I am unsure if they are overworked or just work atmosphere with the hotel.   sewage smell from underground parking. it spreads through elevator. Ask them to give you above ground parking pass. They didn't tell me and I had to learn from another guest. The smell is really bad to go to the parking.   Slow internet. it is on and off. The slowest was 0.6 mb/s download when I stayed. If
Manager Response: Your feedback is going to help shape us for the future. Thank you for sharing what you liked and disliked as these are valuable tools for us to build off of when looking for areas of improvement. Please note that I will share your feedback with my team to work off. I hope that everyone enjoyed their time in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Comfortable Stay but erroneous charges on bill
Summary: We stayed one night at the Hyatt House on a recent visit to Disneyland. The rooms are decently sized and comofortable. It’s nice to have a small kitchenette with a refrigerator. Breakfast was good as well. The only issue was that upon checking our credit card a week later, we saw an extra $50 charge. I called the hotel and was put on hold for 20 minutes after which they claimed it was an accidental charge and would be refunded.  Not ideal but at least they refunded us the charge, good thing we checked! For this issue, I would rate the hotel a 3 star vs 4
Manager Response: Thank you for you for coming in to Anaheim and spending your stay with us. It is great to hear you were able to enjoy the various amenities we have to offer our guests.

Summary: The staff was knowledgeable, quick, and efficient. The information provided about the hotel and surrounding area was very complete. There is also a Walgreens, Starbucks, and blaze Pizza on the premises, as well as a CVS across the street so you can find whatever you need.
Manager Response: Your loyalty drives us forward! Thank you for choosing our hotel for your accommodations while visiting the Anaheim Resort area. We hope that your experience with us was nothing short of exceptional.

Summary Heading: Great family hotel with EV charging
Summary: We stayed with young children in the family suite. The kids loved the bunk beds. The front staff were friendly and very accommodating: they allowed a very early check in and 2 vehicles for parking (each charged separately). The breakfast staff were very friendly too.  There are 4 EV chargers (2 Tesla and 2 clipper creek).  We were considering staying at the Disney Grand Californian again for convenience, but we’re glad we stayed here instead at 1/3 of the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to support you during your visit to our area. We hope that you were able to complete all the vacation goals you had for this trip!

Summary: Poor follow up from management regarding concerns with the room. They did not respond to messages or voicemails requesting a call back. Staff at counter and at breakfast were great. I would not recommend this hotel for families traveling with small children.
Manager Response: Your feedback matters! Thank you for sharing with us what you liked and disliked. Both play such important roles for us when looking at our reviews to make improvements. I will take your feedback back to the rest of my team for consideration. We hope that you enjoyed your time in our area!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The location is great - close to both Disneyland and the Gardenwalk shops and restaurants.  We stayed in a 1 bedroom suite, and we loved the extra space and full kitchen.  There were only a couple of negatives: the fold-out bed mattress was so thin that you could feel every spring. Also, the floor hadn't been vacuumed very well before our arrival. Overall, though, we were happy with the hotel. The service was great, and we would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Your loyalty to our hotel is greatly appreciated and sorely needed. Your loyalty and your feedback help other guests find out how awesome we are here in Anaheim. Thank you for continuing to stay with us!

Summary: We were delighted with an early check in to a spacious room walking distance to Disneyland. Celebrating my daughter’s birthday we were surprised by a gift bag of treats and personalized card. All staff were friendly and greeted us like it was our home away from home. Excellent service and experience!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed every minute of your time with us! Our team strives to provide exceptional experiences. We are glad to see we were able to do that for you.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and many restaurants
Summary: The room was very nice and modern and the front desk was always friendly.  The breakfast was good with a nice selection of hot foods and fresh fruit.  However, they only clean your room if you stay at least 4 nights.  So people would leave their trash outside their doors and many times the trash would sit in the hallways more than 1-2 days.  Gross.  Housekeeping should at least pick up the trash in the hallways once a day.  We also had to ask them for toilet paper and lotion, etc. which we ran out of after 3 days.  But otherwise the location of the hotel was close walking distance to Disneyland and there were many convenient restaurants right downstairs and across the street from the hotel.  Also Walgreens and CVS downstairs.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear back from you on a guest survey! We hope that you were able to do everything you planned to do for this trip! We hope we provided an exceptional experience for you and your valued guests.

Summary Heading: This place is a well oiled machine!
Summary: This place is a well oiled machine and I would not stay anywhere else when going to Disney.  It’s a 10 minute walk to Disneyland which we did every day with our three children and my parents.  The breakfast you get with your stay is huge! In warming trays there was always fresh scrambled eggs, sausage, potatoes, pancakes which rotates with waffles. Then there was cereal, bread, yogurt, fresh fruit to put in your yogurt. A pot of hot oatmeal, various juices, coffee and water. And the staff was constantly clearing tables and preparing for the next group that would walk in. They were also consistently filling the food trays. Everything was very clean and every staff member was helpful and nice.   We had a suite with kitchenette which was nice and spacious. Even without a suite
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to Hyatt! Hearing back from our guests is one of the best tools we have to strengthen our team. We hope that everyone was able to enjoy the area and do everything you planned to do!

Summary Heading: Great for large families visiting Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is close to Disney and very family friendly. Everyone on staff is so personable and helpful. Highly recommend for a Disney trip, especially if you have a big family.  There’s a Starbucks, Walgreens, and a pizza place that are connected to the hotel. Felt very safe.
Manager Response: It is great to hear from you! Thank you for staying with us at Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center! Our future guests and the hotel staff rely on your feedback

Summary: We came out with the family for a Disney trip and the Hyatt House was perfect! The location was very close to the park entrance and restaurants.  Bella was so nice and accommodating.  She helped us with parking and made sure everything was perfect with our stay.  Thank you Bella! We will definitely come back!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed every minute of your time with us! Our team strives to provide exceptional experiences. We are glad to see we were able to do that for you.

Summary: This was the first time I’ve used Hyatt house and I am glad I did. The rooms were a nice and easy walk to Disneyland. There’s a couple places to order food from and Starbucks. We placed a mobile order and grabbed it on our way to rope drop. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful! We didn’t try their breakfast but pleased with our overall stay. I will definitely book with them again!
Manager Response: Your loyalty drives us forward! Thank you for choosing our hotel for your accommodations while visiting the Anaheim Resort area. We hope that your experience with us was nothing short of exceptional.

Summary: Well worth the money. We booked a family suite. Came with a full kitchen and pull out sofa. Large bathroom with plenty of hooks to hang towels, swimsuits etc. staff was amazing. Delicious breakfast buffet with tons of choices and a beautiful lobby and bar. A 10-15 min walk from Disneyland too! Beautifully kept grounds and sparkly clean
Manager Response: Thank you for you for coming in to Anaheim and spending your stay with us. It is great to hear you were able to enjoy the various amenities we have to offer our guests.

Summary: We got a king room and it had decent view of the area. Rooms were good. We left a new jacket we had got at Disneyland for Christmas. (Christmas sweater) and contacted the hotel they gave us options to pick it up or ship it out. We paid for shipping and it arrived before Christmas. Stayed on 12/16 got it back 12/21. Amazing! Thank you all. Again I will be back, oh and the Walgreens and food nearby is very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to support you during your visit to our area. We hope that you were able to complete all the vacation goals you had for this trip!

Summary Heading: Great staff, spacious rooms, short walk to Disneyland
Summary: Short walk to Disney, comfortable beds, really nice and helpful staff (thank you, Margarita!), great breakfast spread, spacious rooms to spread out. Shower head/pressure wasn’t great but hot water was plentiful. Definitely a good value for the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. Your satisfaction with your stay is of the upmost importance to us. We hope that we were able to meet your expectations.

Summary: The Hyatt House hosted a holiday party for families that we serve at Illumination Foundation.  The staff was SO helpful and attentive from Marinna our event coordinator and John, the Food and Beverage Manager who helped us throughout the evening.  They both went out of their way to check in prior to and throughout the event.  Alex and Tomas were also so helpful in ensuring that we had everything we needed throughout the evening. The lobby became a winter wonderland for our families who created memories at the event that will last a lifetime.  Thank you so much to Managers,  Bonnie and Richard that allowed us to have our event at such an amazing location and to everyone who made this evening possible.  We are so grateful!
Manager Response: We know why our guests come to our hotel. It is family time! We are grateful that you chose to use our hotel for your stay during such an important time. We hope that everyone enjoyed their stay!

Summary: This hotel is so clean super nice and staff is friendly ! The rooms are always nice and breakfast is delicious! The Coffee is also very good and parking is nearby as well as other stores and restaurants
Manager Response: Good morning, thank you for your kind words. We are so happy to hear you had nothing but exceptional experiences with our family here at Hyatt House. Thank you for sharing your experience with us.

Summary: Great affordable hotel close to Disney. We got a family suite and it was nice to have a separate space, especially since one kid wanted to sleep and another still wanted to stay up. We were able to walk to Disneyland (about 10-15 min walk if you’re a fast walker) and came home in early evening for a break before heading back out for the Christmas parade. The breakfast was hearty and very well run. The staff is so efficient at refilling every station, clearing tables, and are so friendly. They’re very good at managing the Disney crowds. There’s a Walgreens and Starbucks on the first floor so that was convenient. The only thing was that the blankets were a bit thin but other than that, everything was great.
Manager Response: Good morning, thank you for your kind words. We are so happy to hear you had nothing but exceptional experiences with our family here at Hyatt House. Thank you for sharing your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Very convenient, modern hotel for Disney visits
Summary: Had a pleasant 3 night stay here in a 1BR suite with Disney View.  Modern, spacious hotel, at a GREAT location with everything you could need at a short walk away (Walgreens/CVS, bus stop, pizza, cafes, souvenir shops, Gardenwalk mall). It was about a 12 min walk to Disney security checkpoints from the hotel lobby. We did the walk several times during our stay, and it was manageable. ART buses and Uber/Lyft were also options, but walking seemed like the most reliable option.  The parking does feel quite expensive at $28/night, especially after paying a mini fortune for the stay. But they did let us leave our car in the lot till midnight after checkout, which was super. The hotel has a couple of Tesla chargers (and two other EV chargers). We got lucky and were able to find an
Manager Response: We are grateful to have had the opportunity to accommodate you and your family’s hotel needs while traveling to the Anaheim resort area. We hope that we lived up to the expectations you had for us!

Summary: Overall amazing stay. Bed and shower made me feel at home, amenities in the room made my experience feel just that much better, breakfast was pretty good, no complaints at all. Finally the staff were very kind and being a rewards member I really appreciated how they gave me 2 water bottles each day while I was there to some it may not be much but believe you and me..it made my day. Thank you guys for the amazing work..hyatt could never do it without you.
Manager Response: Your loyalty to our hotel is greatly appreciated and sorely needed. Your loyalty and your feedback help other guests find out how awesome we are here in Anaheim. Thank you for continuing to stay with us!

Summary: We felt welcome from the moment we walked in. Rooms were clean and well stocked. From toiletries and towels to silverware and pots and pans. Perfect location. Not too far from Disneyland. Walgreens, IHOP and Starbucks are just a few steps away plus many other restaurants and convenience stores pretty close by. We requested a few items from the front desk and they brought them up quite promptly.
Manager Response: It is great to hear from you! Thank you for staying with us at Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center! Our future guests and the hotel staff rely on your feedback

Summary: Me & my family had a great experience! We will definitely be staying here again. Customer service was great and friendly. Our rooms were nice clean and comfy. Breakfast was also awesome, Margarita was very helpful and friend especially my kids were being messy :/ thank you again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. We realize you have many options to choose from for hotel accommodations. We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel a short walk/drive to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is sparkling clean. Rooms are comfortable and in good condition. They include a refrigerator and microwave. Some have bunk beds or sofa beds(depending on your choice of room). Breakfast buffet has lots of choices from hot foods(eggs, pancakes or waffles sausage), fresh fruit, oatmeal bar, various breads for roasting, tea and coffee and juices. Better than many other Hyatt’s buffets. There is a small bar in the lobby. Hotel is very secure with guests needing room keys to access elevators. Very Nearby is Walgreens/CVS. Approximately 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland park. We walked there and took an Uber home each day. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear back from you on a guest survey! We hope that you were able to do everything you planned to do for this trip! We hope we provided an exceptional experience for you and your valued guests.

Summary: The family suite was more money than the regular rooms and it was dirty, small the mirror light didn’t work. I travel alot and this was one of the worst rooms I’ve stayed in with my kids. The beds weren’t even made when we arrived. Walls were so thin I barely got quality sleep
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the opportunity to accommodate you and your guests. It was an absolute pleasure to meet you all! Thank you for being so loyal to us through the years.

Summary Heading: Great place, especially all the staff, Margarita...
Summary: Hotel is clean and comfortable! Margarita in the breakfast room was amazing! Every morning, smiles, greets, checks in on you at table, and , upon request, helped us with our Spanish. Margarita, nosotros apreciamos tu trabajo!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us for our future guests to see! Your loyalty to Hyatt is everything! We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Margarita made breakfast fun and enjoyable, I would definitely come back and see her. She made sure we had everything we needed and always said hello to us in the morning! I would defiantly say she provided the best service out of any hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us here! We hope that you had an exceptional experience staying with us in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary: Everything at the Hyatt location was great. Staff very helpful and friendly. Location of this Hyatt Hotel is perfect for Disneyland Park. Restaurants and attractions nearby are plenty. The Gymnasium is well equipped.
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Hyatt House! Your loyalty is so appreciated! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your entire stay with us and had lots of fun together!

Summary: The staff was welcoming and helpful but the room was dark and worn feeling. There was a strong unpleasant smell to the room. The hot breakfast was excellent! The walk to Disneyland was farther than anticipated but still walkable if not carrying too much with you. Not sure if we would choose to stay again unless some updates or deep cleaning was done to the rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for you for coming in to Anaheim and spending your stay with us. It is great to hear you were able to enjoy the various amenities we have to offer our guests.

Summary: Great time, Hotel was clean, friendly staff nice pool and hot tub.  Breakfast bar was good easy start to your day. Loved our room plenty of space to be comfortable.  I would definitely stay at Hyatt House again. It was also in a great location
Manager Response: Your loyalty drives us forward! Thank you for choosing our hotel for your accommodations while visiting the Anaheim Resort area. We hope that your experience with us was nothing short of exceptional.

Summary: Facilities were nice and staff was very friendly. Continental breakfast was awesome the staff kept food full and tables clean. We never had to wait for a table for breakfast because dining hall was huge!! Also variety of food for everyone in our family
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to support you during your visit to our area. We hope that you were able to complete all the vacation goals you had for this trip!

Summary Heading: New go to hotel for Disneyland!
Summary: Great location!  The walk to and from Disneyland was effortless.  Cross the street and walk on the Disney side for a smooth, straight walk to the parks.  The entire staff was warm and welcoming.  Free breakfast is great with plenty of options for everyone.  The room was clean and tidy.  Having the optional kitchen was great for making small meals for the kids.  This hotel is our new top choice for Disneyland!
Manager Response: Greetings and many thanks for choosing us for your hotel stay! We hope that whatever brought you to the area, you were able to fulfill your goals while staying with us! Have a wonderful holiday season!

Summary: Left my credit card on breakfast table. Alma and Margarita employees working breakfast room found it and kept it safe for me. Super friendly atmosphere. Very clean hotel.  The Blue Hawaii drink from the bar was delicious.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience during your most recent stay. We hope that you and your guests, sincerely, enjoyed our accommodations and amenities at the hotel.

Summary: We have stayed at Hyatt House before. The apartment style accommodation means there’s a lot more room for our family of four - two teenage daughters. The beds are comfy and the bathroom is big. Having a Walgreens and Starbucks at the property are a big bonus as well. Thank you Kellie for allowing us to check in early!! It’s exactly what we needed after a long flight from Australia.
Manager Response: We know why our guests come to our hotel. It is family time! We are grateful that you chose to use our hotel for your stay during such an important time. We hope that everyone enjoyed their stay!

Summary: The hotel was so clean. Even the elevators and restrooms off the lobby were spotless. breakfast was great every morning - plenty variety for our 6 night stay between eggs (scrambled or boiled), yogurt and granola, fruit, oatmeal, potatoes, waffles (or pancakes or French toast some days) cereals with almond and oat milk. Staff was friendly and accommodating. About a 10 minute walk to Disney. The kitchen in the suite was very well equipped. Beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. Your satisfaction with your stay is of the upmost importance to us. We hope that we were able to meet your expectations.

Summary: This has been my place of stay since 2021. I have looked at other places and I always land here. This time around Angel’s customer service skills were great. He was welcoming, answered my questions, and helped with with my two different bookings.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to support you during your visit to our area. We hope that you were able to complete all the vacation goals you had for this trip!

Summary: We've stayed here several times and love it.  The rooms are big with kitchenettes, dishes, dish washer, etc.  Prices are reasonable.  The walk is 10-15 minutes to the park, which is important when you're travel with little ones and don't want to take a shuttle (and break down a stroller.). And they provide a nice, free breakfast in the morning.
Manager Response: Your loyalty drives us forward! Thank you for choosing our hotel for your accommodations while visiting the Anaheim Resort area. We hope that your experience with us was nothing short of expceptional.

Summary: Perfect location for Disneyland as it was a quick walk for us. The hotel was nice and super convenient (Walgreens and CVS right there). Our only complaint was the outside traffic noise. We could hear so many cars going by at like 2/3AM and would wake us up. I eventually turned out a white noise app which helped to drown it out but some cars were super loud.
Manager Response: Thank you for you for coming in to Anaheim and spending your stay with us. It is great to hear you were able to enjoy the various amenities we have to offer our guests.

Summary: The staff was very friendly, and facility was super clean. Decided to extend my stay and at first I was told I had to move rooms but they ended up making some change so that I didn’t have to move around so thoughtfully! Special thank you to Margarita from kitchen staff she was always there to help and greet us good morning!
