Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed every minute of your time with us! Our team strives to provide exceptional experiences. We are glad to see we were able to do that for you.

Summary: Excellent hotel, clean great service and location. Kids had bunkers which was a huge hit with them.  Walling distance to Disneyland and to food. Good breakfast Nd happy hour. Will stay again next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Hyatt House! Your loyalty is so appreciated! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your entire stay with us and had lots of fun together!

Summary: Hotel was clean and service was good. We enjoyed our stay. However, I understand the theory behind unplugging all the appliances in the room, but the set up makes it VERY difficult to plug them in without a lot of effort.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us for our future guests to see! Your loyalty to Hyatt is everything! We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Came into Hyatt Place for Disneyland! Was welcomed by Bella, she was super friendly, helpful and very willing to satisfy me, the customer. Came back from a stressful flight and Bella made sure I felt welcomed and helped me quickly and attentively! Our room got upgraded since I am traveling with a friend and made me feel so happy! Thank you Bella!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us here! We hope that you had an exceptional experience staying with us in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary: Amazing clean hotel walking distance to Disney.  The  hotel does have some road noise but it did not stop us from having an amazing night sleep.  Cleanest hotel this close to the parks.  You will be happy with the chocie to stay here
Manager Response: Thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary: This Hotel was by far one of the nicest and cleanest ive stayed at, but what stood out the most was Margerita. She works down at the restaurant, margerita is very kind and super attentive, shes always walking around asking if we needed anything,making sure she picks up the plates of food we are finished with and always cleaning. She definitely takes pride in her job and Hyatt Hotels should be grateful to have such an amazing employee. Make sure to look for her the next time you stay here at Hyatt House Anaheim.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear back from you on a guest survey! We hope that you were able to do everything you planned to do for this trip! We hope we provided an exceptional experience for you and your valued guests.

Summary Heading: Stay here for ease of access to both parks!
Summary: Great stay! We arrived early (around 10am), and was pleasantly surprised to see our room was ready. Parking was easy and check in a breeze. Rooms are nicely appointed and quiet. The shower head wasn’t great, the pressure was weak. If staying 2 nights or under as we did, there is no housekeeping but we were advised of that, upon check in.   Breakfast was amazing! So much to choose from. The hotel location is awesome. It’s a 10 minute walk to the parks. There is a shuttle which costs $6 but honestly, just walk if you can. Lots of people walking back at night so felt safe.   Downstairs, there is a Walgreens, Starbucks etc so lots of place to buy items, that you may have forgotten. Overall, very happy and we will be back. I’d highly recommend due location.
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to Hyatt! Hearing back from our guests is one of the best tools we have to strengthen our team. We hope that everyone was able to enjoy the area and do everything you planned to do!

Summary: We stayed at the Hyatt House while we visited Disneyland. It was only a short walk to Disneyland which was very nice. We loved our suite that had the separate bedroom and living room/kitchenette combo. The breakfast was great and the staff was excellent. Definitely will stay again.
Manager Response: It is great to hear from you! Thank you for staying with us at Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center! Our future guests and the hotel staff rely on your feedback

Summary: We had a wonderful time at the Hyatt House Anaheim. Our room was clean and spacious. All the staff was friendly and accommodating, especially Margarita in the breakfast buffet service. She went out of her way to get to know my family and make us feel welcomed.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. We realize you have many options to choose from for hotel accommodations. We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights the week of Thanksgiving.  Room was ready when we checked in at 2pm.  Love the buffet breakfast, especially since we had long days at Disneyland and California Disney back to back days.  Picked this hotel d/t proximity to Disney so we could just walk.  Would stay here again!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear back from you on a guest survey! We hope that you were able to do everything you planned to do for this trip! We hope we provided an exceptional experience for you and your valued guests.

Summary: We’ve stayed here before, and this solidified that we will return again.  Once again, friendly and helpful staff all around.  So grateful for a seamless stay.  Breakfast was basic and good enough for our family on the run,
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Hyatt House! Your loyalty is so appreciated! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your entire stay with us and had lots of fun together!

Summary Heading: Great staff, good location & proximity to Disneyland
Summary: Great staff, from front desk, breakfast staff, housekeeping and maintenance. All very personable and took their job seriously.  After unexpected delay in checking in due to traffic and other personal issues, front desk made it so easy to check in.  breakfast staff was always very accommodating and helpful and seemed genuinely in a good mood.  Lots of maintenance and housekeeping staff all around hotel and they were all busy working but always willing to help.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us here! We hope that you had an exceptional experience staying with us in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary: Loved the breakfast and loved Margarita’s service even more. She was very attentive and caring of our children during breakfast hours. She would always check in on us and bus our tables. Would come back for sure
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us for our future guests to see! Your loyalty to Hyatt is everything! We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary: My family and I had a great stay. Clean rooms, great breakfast and easy walk to Disneyland (10min walk). Margarita (Hyatt employee) in the breakfast area is amazing. She has a great attitude and was always on top of everything. Thank you
Manager Response: Good morning, explorer, thank you for staying with us and allowing us to support you during your family trip. We hope that we were able to meet and exceed your expectations for hospitality. Hearing back from our guests and having them mention our employees by name is such a nice thing! Thank you for taking the time to let us know how much of an impact Margarita had on your experience. We share these reviews at our all-staff meetings, so thank you! We will make sure Margarita knows her dedication does not go unnoticed.

Summary: Richard and Joey-  they are THE BEST!  I travel for work and service is important to me.  I love Hyatt properties, but Richard went above and beyond!  He was very professional. I was super impressed watching him deal with a “difficult” guest with grace. And it was very busy- but Joey and Richard both worked together to make sure that check in went smoothly for not just me, but several other guests as well.  Also- having a Starbucks right in the lobby is an added bonus! Hands down, the best service and great value.  I’ll stay at this property EVERY TIME, from now on!
Manager Response: Good morning, Z9261OTsusanb,  Thank you so much for staying with us and taking the time to leave us some feedback. It really goes such a long way for us! I hope that our attention to your needs shows just how much we appreciate and value your loyalty. Making good connections with our guests and enjoying the conversations is the best part of our day :)

Summary: Everything about our stay was great! The breakfast was excellent and super well organized, room was perfect for our family, and you can't beat the proximity to Disneyland. Very highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Good morning, jdc27513. Thank you for your loyalty to us when visiting the area. We are so delighted to hear everyone enjoyed their time with us and at the parks! Please let us know how we can be of service any time!

Summary Heading: Great stay!!! One of the better hotels
Summary: Bella and the other gentlemen at the front desk were amazing! Happy, friendly and helpful no matter what. The room was big and spacious, and even though it was facing the street, the noise wasn’t too bad from the bedroom at least. The kitchen has everything you need if you plan on cooking in your suite. The walk to Disneyland was maybe 10 min or less. We were super comfortable overall. The pool was big and  right in the sun! But it’s not heated, really cold and the hot tub wasn’t very hot, more like a warm bath. So that is one of my complaints (pool and hot tub temps). My only other complaints is the breakfast. The eggs and oatmeal were very watery. I saw people try their eggs and leave them there. They need to be cooked a bit more. There is only French toast, no pancakes or
Manager Response: Thank you so much, biancaj503!! Your detailed review goes such a long way for us and for future guests. We hope that you and your family got to do everything you planned for during your trip. Lastly, thank you for mentioning the service Bella and her team mates provided. I will make sure they know how much of an impact they have had on your stay. Thank you, sincerely!

Summary: We would like to thank all staff for the hospitality and making my son feel very special on his special day his birthday Hyatt is one of our favorite places to stay we thank you we love staying there excellent cleanness fast service we would definitely recommend to our family in France to stay there the location is super convenient for us specially when we visit Disneyland we love the Buffay for the morning breakfast awesome food was really good once again we just want to thank you all for doing an excellent job keep up the good work teamv
Manager Response: Your loyalty drives us forward! Thank you for choosing our hotel for your accommodations while visiting the Anaheim Resort area. We hope that your experience with us was nothing short of expceptional.

Summary: I loved staying at the Hyatt House.  The room was clean and spacious.  I loved having the kitchenette and all the amentities that came with the room.  It was great having a hot breakfast every morning.  The front desk staff was pleasant and courteous.  Great place to stay.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed every minute of your time with us! Our team strives to provide exceptional experiences. We are glad to see we were able to do that for you.

Summary Heading: Wonderful, Attentive, and Super Friendly Service
Summary: I rarely post reviews, but I absolutely must give props to Margarita, one of our breakfast hostesses.  My grandson and I had the pleasure of meeting Margarita over our 3 day stay at the resort.  She was very attentive in helping us get situated and comfortable.  She was especially wonderful with my grandson, very warm and friendly, and made him feel welcome and loved.  We looked out for her on our last day, and she was so effusive of my grandson’s manners, cheerfulness, and noticing that he is “so very smart!!!” My grandson hugged her as we left, she is a credit to the hospitality industry!!!  P.S., Since I’m writing, I should also call out Rey!!!  Another great host, he was also very kind, attentive, and wonderful to us, and especially to my grandson.  Regarding both
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. We realize you have many options to choose from for hotel accommodations. We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim! We will make sure our breakfast team knows how much their hard work impacts our guests stays!

Summary Heading: By far the best hotel and hotel staff!
Summary: Best hotel to stay while visiting Disneyland.  Awesome managment and staff. Clean rooms with full kitchen. Great breakfast in the morning.  Beautiful pool and a great fitness facility. Great location from the park. A+
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear back from you on a guest survey! We hope that you were able to do everything you planned to do for this trip! We hope we provided an exceptional experience for you and your valued guests.

Summary: Great location, walking distance to Disney parks, closer to convention center.  Friendly staff, clean rooms, hard to beat the space of a suite.  Only complaint s that they had a staff member with a cold, hopefully nothing more, working on the front desk checking people in, what were they thinking.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary: The Hyatt House was perfect for our family of 5 to attend Disneyland. The entrance of the park is less than 1 mile away and easy to get to.  The Hyatt House had great accommodations and Margarita in particular was so welcoming and helpful. Thanks to her and everyone at Hyatt House for making this a magical stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us here! We hope that you had an exceptional experience staying with us in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary: We had a comfortable stay during our Disney trip. Upon check in we asked if the room came with a refrigerator (since our baby needs it for his milk). To our surprise, we were given a complimentary upgrade with a full kitchen! Not expected but very much appreciated. Kudos to Margarita in the kitchen who was exceptional. She went above and beyond for many families.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us for our future guests to see! Your loyalty to Hyatt is everything! We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a Disney family trip was a short walk to disney the hotel was great no smoke smell & was pretty quiet. The free breakfast was great Margarita cleaned our table and gave us stupendous service. She was attentive the 3 mornings we had breakfast there.
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Hyatt House! Your loyalty is so appreciated! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your entire stay with us and had lots of fun together!

Summary: The expanded kitchen suite we booked was spacious and well laid out. Nice big bathroom with good storage underneath. We would have preferred a few more dishes (only 4 plates, 4 sets of cutlery, etc. for our family of four.) The sofa was the only real miss: terribly uncomfortable, with saggy cushions and worn upholstery. The sofa bed was as you'd expect. 😉  Buffet staff were friendly and super efficient. There were always screened and boiled eggs, with sausage and either pancakes, French toast or waffles, plus toast, cereal, fresh fruit, yogurt, etc.  Front desk staff were similarly friendly and check in was smooth. We had to follow up whenever we called down for kitchen towels, dish soap, sofa bedding, though it arrived eventually.  Overall it met our needs and was a pleasant
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear back from you on a guest survey! We hope that you were able to do everything you planned to do for this trip! We hope we provided an exceptional experience for you and your valued guests.

Summary Heading: Wonderful Stay for a Long Weekend at Disneyland!
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort. The staff were friendly and helpful. We were upgraded to a suite upon check-in - we love Hyatt House as a brand because of their spacious suites. We had contacted the hotel ahead of time to let them know we were celebrating our anniversary and they gifted us a wonderful welcome package in our room with local treats. The breakfast buffet was great before long days at the Disney parks. The hotel is within walking distance of the entrance to Disneyland & DCA - about a 10 minute walk.
Manager Response: Good morning, ashmeg19,  Thank you for spending your stay with us at Hyatt House. Your loyalty to us means the world to us. We hope that the early check in allowed you extra time to celebrate your anniversary! Thank you for coming out to our hotel for such an occasion.

Summary: This hotel is a great option for staying with friends and family. We loved our room and services. They offer a delicious breakfast and every employee is warm and friendly, specially Margarita from the breakfast staff. She speak English and Spanish and made us feel welcomed and made sure that we had our great experience. 100% recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you so much, j0rlaned, for leaving feedback and making the effort to shout out, Margarita! We will make sure she knows how much her hard work and dedication made an impact on your experience.

Summary: Staff is knowledgeable, accommodating and very nice. They were able to give us complementary upgrade to the family suite that the kids loved and quite honestly it was nice to be able to have separate rooms.
Manager Response: Good morning, fadflaca, Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback regarding your most recent stay in the Disney area. We hope that you and your family were able to enjoy and see all the things you had set out to do on this trip. It was a pleasure to support you all!

Summary Heading: Excellent Staff!  Great Location!!! Clean rooms.
Summary: The Hyatt House is always my "go to" hotel when I work in the Anaheim area.  The rooms are clean, fresh and lots of sunlight if wanted.  it truly is the Staff that makes this Hyatt fantastic.  Angel, Angela, Kellie and Joey always make check in a breeze.
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Hyatt House! Your loyalty is so appreciated! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your entire stay with us and had lots of fun together!

Summary: Very clean, great breakfast, great staff. We had a great stay. Bed is very comfortable and had a great night sleep. Kids enjoyed the stay and the comfort of the beds as well. Staff was very friendly and always greeted with a smile.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us here! We hope that you had an exceptional experience staying with us in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary Heading: Basic and overpriced, but location is good for Disneyland visitors
Summary: Other than the location, this is a 2-star hotel, charging 4+ star prices. Rooms and hotel overall are so-so, beds are fine, sofabed not so much. Staff was friendly enough. We were not impressed, but being close to Disneyland made up for a disappointing hotel stay.
Manager Response: Good evening, Onno H, Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us and future guests. We are sorry to see you had a less than exceptional experience. If you have any other feedback you would be willing to share about your experience with us, please reach out to me!

Summary: Good stay - would have preferred to have a room that's not facing the street. There was a lot of noise from the traffic. Easy walkable access to Disney. Convenient and right off the highway. Front desk employees were great and very helpful coordinating the family to be near each other. Would stay again...poolside.
Manager Response: Good evening and thank you so much for providing feedback regarding your most recent stay! Thank you for sharing your experience! We, definitely, recommend the non-disney view suites for guests who find the traffic noise level unacceptable. We hope you were able to get rested for each day of fun!

Summary: Jessica at this Hyatt made our family’s experience the best. She made extra efforts for my daughter’s birthday and was attentive to all our needs. Definitely ask for Jessica. I will always go to Hyatt.
Manager Response: Your loyalty drives us forward! Thank you for choosing our hotel for your accommodations while visiting the Anaheim Resort area. We hope that your experience with us was nothing short of expceptional.

Summary Heading: Great and proximate stay to Disneyland. Issues right near hotel.
Summary: Stayed at this property for our visit to Disneyland.  Pros: - Great family rooms with bunk beds which kids enjoyed. - Excellent and friendly staff, everything was clean and well-maintained especially at breakfast. - Wonderful proximity to Disneyland and nearby eateries (Starbucks, Blaze Pizza)  Cons: - This isn’t necessarily a “Hyatt” problem but it does affect the ability for a family to stay here. When we walked out with our two small children, a homeless man was masterbating in the breezeway between hotel and Walgreens. I know homelessness is an issue for most of our cities but anything the hotel can do to pressure Anaheim PD to help patrol outside the Disneyland friendly neighbor hotels would be seemingly important. After all, tourism drives the economy here. - As the case
Manager Response: It is great to hear from you! Thank you for staying with us at Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center! Our future guests and the hotel staff rely on your feedback

Summary: Breakfast was the highlight of our stay. Very good food and a verity. Enough room for people to sit down and enjoy eating.  Rooms were clean and easy to find. Parking had a lot of spaces. Bed was comfy and spacious. A mini fridge and microwave in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. We realize you have many options to choose from for hotel accommodations. We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary: I will be recommending this Hyatt to everyone going to Disneyland and or the Anaheim area! The check out and check in process was a smooth. The pool and spa area was so refreshing after a long flight. The location makes for a great hotel if you are going to be spending your vacation at Disneyland or California Adventure, less then a 15 mins walk to the park gates.
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to Hyatt! Hearing back from our guests is one of the best tools we have to strengthen our team. We hope that everyone was able to enjoy the area and do everything you planned to do!

Summary: We stayed in the bunk bed and king bed suite. The room was very comfortable for our family of 4. We had a quick and easy walk to Disneyland. Hotel includes a full breakfast as well. Definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Hyatt House! Your loyalty is so appreciated! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your entire stay with us and had lots of fun together!

Summary: Have stayed here before and were pleased, this time during our 4 night stay for 2 rooms we were told it was Hyatt policy not to clean the rooms!  Just call front desk for more towels!  We won't be staying here again on family holidays even though it is a great location.    Sheesh!
Manager Response: Your feedback matters! Thank you for sharing with us what you liked and disliked. Both play such important roles for us when looking at our reviews to make improvements. I will take your feedback back to the rest of my team for consideration. We hope that you enjoyed your time in our area!

Summary Heading: Very nice staff, quality service, we love the location, and we enjoyed the birthday breakfast and gifts for my daughter:
Summary: Very nice staff, quality service, great location near disney land, quick check in and check out, the best birthday breakfast and gifts for our birthday girl:) The room was clean and just enough for 6 of us:)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us here! We hope that you had an exceptional experience staying with us in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary: Excellent customer service. Rooms were clean and nice.  Breakfast was very good, hot and cold food variety.  Needed extra towels, blankets etc and they delivered immediately.  Close to restaurants and Disneyland.  Easy 10 minutes walk to park.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to support you during your visit to our area. We hope that you were able to complete all the vacation goals you had for this trip!

Summary: We always love staying at the Hyatt. Everyone is great and professional and it’s close to everything you need. Even walking distance! The hotel is always clean and the breakfast is plenty for everyone! Thanks Efrain!
Manager Response: Thank you for you for coming in to Anaheim and spending your stay with us. It is great to hear you were able to enjoy the various amenities we have to offer our guests.

Summary Heading: 5 Stars for this Hyatt Property… -1 Star on World of Hyatt Rewards
Summary: We loved everything about this properly. It was clean, modern, spacious, and quiet. We were also welcomed as Globalist, and given our waters, as well as offered Late Checkout (though we did not need it).  We also enjoyed food from the bar (delicious) as well as the included breakfast (also delicious), and we were literally walking distance to Disneyland!  The staff was more than great, my only complaint is with the communication between the World of Hyatt Globalist Reservations line and the hotel.   We had an award night that was soon to expire, and asked to apply it to the trip. You cannot book these awards yourself, you’re required to call in. So we did, and we’re told they could use the award night for Sunday only. Great! We thought it was all taken care of.  We found out
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know what you liked and disliked during your time with us. Your feedback helps us focus on specific things, so thank you for giving us the opportunity to improve. We hope you enjoyed your stay overall.

Summary: The staff at the lobby were very friendly and accommodating . The breakfast was great to have right before heading into Disneyland. The rooms were very clean and the space was well designed with even a space to hold your shoes.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience during your most recent stay. We hope that you and your guests, sincerely, enjoyed our accommodations and amenities at the hotel.

Summary: Rooms are big and clean. Beds were comfortable. The breakfast here is the best anywhere! Have stayed here three times and will stay again. It’s a close and easy walk to the Disney parks. Love the free water.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to support you during your visit to our area. We hope that you were able to complete all the vacation goals you had for this trip!

Summary Heading: Hyatt Place Resort Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: Thank you to Melisa the Front Desk Supervisor for giving us such warm welcome to the Hyatt Place.   Our check in experience was amazingly fast. Richard Rosales the AGM also gave us a warm welcome and made sure we had a great stay.  Pathway from parking to elevator to room is streamlined. Quality of room extremely neat, clean and felt safe entire trip. Will definitely book here again.....  Thank you Hyatt Place Team!  Keep up the great work!
Manager Response: Thank you for you for coming in to Anaheim and spending your stay with us. It is great to hear you were able to enjoy the various amenities we have to offer our guests.

Summary: The Hyatt House exceeded our expectations. Whole property was clean and tidy. All employees were friendly and professional. Breakfast was very convenient and the location in proximity to the Disneyland parks was phenomenal. A quick 15- minute walk and you’re there.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary: Breakfast was amazing, staff was friendly, rooms and hotel were clean.  Walking distance to Disney (12-15mins) with a Walgreens and Starbucks on site (and a Target and Vons within a 5 minute drive) Parking garage is easily accessible
Manager Response: It is great to hear from you! Thank you for staying with us at Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center! Our future guests and the hotel staff rely on your feedback

Summary Heading: Clean, welcoming, good breakfast. What more do you need?
Summary: Awesome staff, very clean, good breakfast. The bar tender knows how to make good drinks as well, had a tasty “old fashioned” their. All it needs is a bar by the pool. The rooms were super clean as well as the sheets. The BBQ grills needed a little attention, other than that it was really nice and worth the money.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed every minute of your time with us! Our team strives to provide exceptional experiences. We are glad to see we were able to do that for you.

Summary: Pros: fantastic location, comfortable beds/ mattresses, very good breakfast included, good staff. Cons: no daily housekeeping so rooms/ carpets are not well maintained.  Overall, very convenient stay, only 0.4 miles from Disney, comfortable beds, you can grab what you need from desk downstairs, absence of regular housekeeping not a big deal but definitely affects the overall room's maintenance. Overall, very convenient and comfortable but nothing fancy.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience during your most recent stay. We hope that you and your guests, sincerely, enjoyed our accommodations and amenities at the hotel.

Summary: We travelled to Disneyland with our daughter and her family. It's described as "walking distance" to Disney.  My daughter and her family had no problems with the distance, at 69 years old, I would say that the distance is probably the farthest that we would stay.  We walked to Disneyland and back twice a day for three days.  My legs were definitely feeling it.  In all, it was worth it.
Manager Response: We know why our guests come to our hotel. It is family time! We are grateful that you chose to use our hotel for your stay during such an important time. We hope that everyone enjoyed their stay!

Summary: Hotel was clean and rooms were nice, but there was no housekeeping service for 1st 4 nights.  After 11pm I had to go down to main lobby to pick up fresh towels and toiletries.  The hallways were lined with garbage bags and empty takeout boxes most days due to lack of housekeeping.

Summary: We had a pretty great experience at this property. The room was spacious and comfortable. The breakfast was great and it was close enough to the parks that we could walk. It would’ve been nice to have the room cleaned at least once but that’s just the new normal.

Summary: Margarita was very friendly helpful and pleasant. We enjoy the facility. My only complaint is the noise from the street but I’ll request a pool facing room next time. I’ve stayed there twice and I think I’m Over the firework view.  Front desk staff was very nice.

Summary: Breakfast buffet was great with a lot of variety. Special thanks to Margarita, who works the morning there. She was very nice, attentive and accommodating.  Love working with polite staff and Margarita was great.

Summary: Check-in and check-out was easy and quick. Hotel lobby was welcoming and upscale. Staff were very helpful. Breakfast menu had good variety. Beds were comfortable and there was no street noise all day so had good sleep/rest.
Manager Response: Good morning, thank you for your kind words. We are so happy to hear you had nothing but exceptional experiences with our family here at Hyatt House. Thank you for sharing your experience with us.

Summary: Booked a 4 night stay. Not one single day did they come to the room and resupply towels.  We had to put trash outside the door. We had to call front desk for towels and new trash bags.  We will be booking with another hotel next time.

Summary: The Hyatt is always our choice when we plan our trips to Disneyland! Wether it’s adults only or when we bring our family. Rooms are always clean and are able to park our vehicles before our check in time. The charger for our car is a super plus !

Summary: Fantastic stay, fantastic service, fantastic breaky, great proximity to multiple services and only a 10 min walk to the parks. The team at the front desk were very accommodating and always more then happy to help

Summary: I would recommend this hotel to any family who’s headed to Disneyland. Great breakfast. Clean, spacious rooms. Awesome pool for families. Short 10 min walk to Disney gates. Free bottles of water daily.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary Heading: great place to stay when going to disneyland
Summary: Nice and quiet place (despite being on a busy corner). Services very close (pharmacy and supermarket). The parks can be reached on foot.  The room was the right size. They had left us coffee and pot. They gave us two bottles of water per day staying.  The breakfast was varied, rich, and they were always replenishing. There you felt the human warmth of Rey and Margarita. They certainly make a difference!  Everyone's attention was very good, except for the girl who received me the night we arrived (I had notified my check-in time). He gave me half the information that the group before me. Several things I had to ask, and it was very clear that he was not happy with attending me.  The only person in the entire hotel with that treatment towards me.  Although it was not clarified
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear back from you on a guest survey! We hope that you were able to do everything you planned to do for this trip! We hope we provided an exceptional experience for you and your valued guests.

Summary: During our stay we enjoyed the morning breakfast; but the delight of every day was the Service provided by Margarita, she was so kind and helpfull and loved her smile. Truly made our mornings during our stay
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us here in Anaheim and letting us know what you liked most about your stay! We will make sure Margarita knows that her hospitality did not go unnoticed!

Summary: We stayed at this property for 3 nights while visiting Disneyland.  Pros: close walk to Disneyland, great proximity to a number of restaurants (and a Starbucks just a few doors down!), breakfast was an excellent selection and the employees who were working in the breakfast area were so friendly!  My family also enjoyed the pool and hot tub a couple times during our stay.  Cons: it feels like there is no soundproofing whatsoever in the hotel.  We were woken up every single night of our stay by noise in the hallway - not even loud noise, just other people having normal voice level conversations.  However, this would not deter me from staying at this location in the future.  I'll just make sure to bring my white noise machine next time :)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know what you liked and disliked during your time with us. Your feedback helps us focus on specific things, so thank you for giving us the opportunity to improve. We hope you enjoyed your stay overall.

Summary: Room was very clean love the plates and utensils in the dishwasher ,spacious. The only slight issue was the water pressure was a little weak and I got bit by some spiders in the room Everything else was really great. The close proximity to the Walgreens and Starbucks was very convenient.
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to Hyatt! Hearing back from our guests is one of the best tools we have to strengthen our team. We hope that everyone was able to enjoy the area and do everything you planned to do!

Summary: Taking family to Disneyland for our granddaughters birthday.  The room was clean and had a great view of evening fireworks.  Great accommodations.  The granddaughters and their parents where down the hall a couple of doors which was great.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us for our future guests to see! Your loyalty to Hyatt is everything! We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Noisy, thin walls and thin ceiling, no water pressure
Summary: Disappointing stay for a Disneyland weekend. Noisy rooms. We were unfortunate enough to be staying in a connecting room. The family next-door woke up every morning at 5:30am and sounded as if they were in our room. I requested a different room but was told I could not change unless I wanted to spend an additional $250 per night. The family in the room above us sounded as if they were bowling all the time. I get it that many of the guests have kids with them, as did I, but no one in my family was able to get any rest during our stay. Additionally there is hardly any water pressure that comes out of the showers. You would have better success washing up using the bathroom sink.

Summary: Traveled to the area to visit Disneyland as a family of 5. Breakfast was great, the gym was huge, pool was perfect and the hotel had a nice feature of needing a key card to access guest room areas. Would definitely stay again.

Summary: I had booked a king bed room and one wasn’t available when we checked in (what’s the point of reserving a specific room type if it’s given away or if it’s not available why does it show up on the direct Hyatt hotel website? We were moved to a 2 queen disability accessible room. We did receive a small discount for this after we asked. Room tip: the blinds open and close via a control panel next to the bed. It’s very hard to figure out how the blackout blind and regular blinds worked instructions would have been nice. Hotel is close to the park and the breakfast is wonderful and has a large eating area. Would be a great place for families I saw some of the rooms had mini kitchens in them.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. We realize you have many options to choose from for hotel accommodations. We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Clean rooms, comfortable beds, easy walk to Disney, nice breakfast selection, friendly staff. We stayed in the suite with a kitchen and sofa area. The kitchen was nice and had everything if you needed make a quick dinner or lunch. Full size fridge was helpful. The pull out bed was not the most comfortable so the little ones slept on the sofa instead.
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to Hyatt! Hearing back from our guests is one of the best tools we have to strengthen our team. We hope that everyone was able to enjoy the area and do everything you planned to do!

Summary: The location was perfectly above the Walgreens, Starbucks (closes at 1pm) and blaze pizza. It is a 15 min walk to the gates of Disneyland. In the heat it is exhausting but doable with two kids. Some of the walk has shade but be aware there is homelessness in the area and they also seek refuge in the shade, i mention only to watch the overly excited children from running into them and/or tripping over their belongings. It is a reality for most cities, it did not bother me but being aware of it is good when walking with young children and kids.  Hotel was clean, our room was clean. We got the studio with kitchen which was nicely stocked of kitchen supplies, pots/pans, dishwashing liquid, brush, dishes, mugs etc. these are two long Vegas size blocks so it is not as close as you
Manager Response: We are grateful to have had the opportunity to accommodate you and your family’s hotel needs while traveling to the Anaheim resort area. We hope that we lived up to the expectations you had for us!

Summary: We had an amazing time at this hotel! It was so close to the park, had wonderful morning breakfast options, great family friendly room setups and the kindest wait staff! Margarite was particularly accommodating at breakfast! We hope to stay here again soon!
Manager Response: Your loyalty to our hotel is greatly appreciated and sorely needed. Your loyalty and your feedback help other guests find out how awesome we are here in Anaheim. Thank you for continuing to stay with us!

Summary: This hotel does everything right.  Clean rooms, great pool, large work-out room, nice bar, bath tubs, plenty of coin-op washers and dryers, and the best complimentary breakfast I've ever had in a hotel.

Summary: This hotel goes above and beyond to satisfy their customers during their stay. We had originally booked 4 nights but decided to add 2 extra nights and they were able to give us the same room. We were especially impressed with the breakfast offered - there was something for everyone even with special diets. All of the staff were friendly and very accommodating.

Summary: The staff at this Hyatt House was the most accommodating and welcoming hospitality staff we've ever had the pleasure to stay with. Special shout out to Angela who was a literal angel and went out of her way to fix my mistake for me

Summary: We chose to stay at the Hyatt house for the fact that it has a breakfast buffet which is included in the overall costs (“free” if you will.) The breakfast was great with quite a few selections. The family was very pleased with it. The room was very clean and tidy on arrival. The only major downfall was that they do not clean the rooms every day. You have to requests a room cleaning on day 3 in order for them to actually do the cleaning on day 4. They say that this is due to Covid, but I mean…nothing else in the hotel seemed to have restrictions due to Covid (staff weren’t in masks, breakfast buffet was open). To me, this is just a way for them to cut costs but the rooms fees remain the same price.  Also, if you plan to stay here to walk to Disneyland, it can seem like quite a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. Your satisfaction with your stay is of the upmost importance to us. We hope that we were able to meet your expectations.

Summary: Checkin was a joke, we were arrived at 11:30 in the morning & told room would be ready within 15 minutes to 4:00. Understanding checkin is at 4:00. Room was not ready until after 5:30 & we had to customer service multiple times to find out when the room would be ready have 2 small children that were extremely tired & getting cranky by then. It was a joke. The lady was rude.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us feedback, 440dm2022, your feedback is so important to our success! We that you and your guests enjoyed every minute of your vacation with us.

Summary: Everything was great except our surprise that during our 4 day stay, never did housekeeping come into our room to clean do to new company policy.  It seems that Hyatt wants to compete with AirB&B. For my next trip, I will consider it.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your concerns. Please note that the service on your 4th day must be requested with the front desk team on that day. We also allow our guests to call or stop by the front desk to have items delivered to the room, or to pick them up with us at the front desk directly.

Summary Heading: Everything you want in a great hotel
Summary: This was our first stay at Hyatt House, having previously used a hotel much closer to the Disney gates. The extra walk was WORTH IT. The rooms were spacious, clean and well stocked. The staff was friendly, helpful and always available.   Breakfast was fantastic; the food is simple but plentiful and well cooked. They opened early enough to eat and get to the Disney gates in time for rope drop without feeling overly rushed.  We estimate about a 12-15 minute walk from the hotel doors to the Disney security gates. As Hyatt rewards members we were provided 2 bottles of water daily which was a fantastic bonus. Membership is free, so join and get the app before you arrive.  Be aware that the water pressure in the shower could be better, and the mattresses could be softer....but this
Manager Response: Your loyalty drives us forward! Thank you for choosing our hotel for your accommodations while visiting the Anaheim Resort area. We hope that your experience with us was nothing short of expceptional.

Summary Heading: Back in over a year still a wonderful hotel
Summary: First of all the hotel is clean, entryway safe inviting, linens, clean, housekeeping does a wonderful job hard workers,  breakfast crew really works hard replenishing, cleaning I’m so glad now they have a tip jar.  The crew works so hard breakfast is free they deserve the tips.  They have varieties of juices, cereal, milk, hot entry items, breads, fruits, condiments, coffee, tea, bagels, pastries.    They also have a good rapport with DnR mobility scooters, DnR is the best they deliver to the hotel, always full of charge and scooters clean sanitized. DnR number is 714 422-2853, it’s run by Davey, Orlando, and Rita the nicest people.  Also the propert houses walgreen 24 hrs and right across the street is cvs.  And the proximity to the parks is so close there is a target down the
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to Hyatt! Hearing back from our guests is one of the best tools we have to strengthen our team. We hope that everyone was able to enjoy the area and do everything you planned to do!

Summary: This was one of the best hotels we have ever stayed at! The entire staff was amazing, especially Angel at the Front Desk! Fantastic location near Disneyland. Hotel was immaculate, pool was crystal-clear clean. Room was perfect. Breakfast was stellar. We WILL be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us here! We hope that you had an exceptional experience staying with us in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary: Front desk staff helped me with a problem I was having with my scooter rental. They went above and beyond to solve my problem with an outside company, both saving me money and my trip. This level of support had guaranteed our return.
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Hyatt House! Your loyalty is so appreciated! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your entire stay with us and had lots of fun together!

Summary Heading: Cocated exactly 1 km walking from Disneyland security
Summary: It’s located exactly 1 km walking from Disneyland security and a great option. Great breakfast (they are prepared for the rush hour), great parking, a nice pool, and great rooms. We stayed in a suite that is perfect for a midday break.  We were hesitant to book this hotel but we contacted the Hotel to ask for our necessities and Oscar Pastrana provided all the information and arrange it to satisfy our necessities (and we booked. Thanks Oscar!!)  Be aware that the hotel does not offer daily housekeeping (and not an easy solution if you need something)  Our only complaint is the Reception Desk. Except for one young lady that worked at night, in general, all were unhelpful and unfriendly. (This review is not 5 star for that reason)
Manager Response: Your feedback is going to help shape us for the future. Thank you for sharing what you liked and disliked as these are valuable tools for us to build off of when looking for areas of improvement. Please note that I will share your feedback with my team to work off. I hope that everyone enjoyed their time in Anaheim.

Summary: When booking this hotel I was not familiar with the Hyatt House type of hotel. I was pleasantly surprised with the space of our room, which had two queen beds, a seating area, and a kitchen. The space was great for an 8-day vacation. The breakfast room was really large with a nice selection each morning. Margarita in the dining area was very nice and attentive to our needs as we traveled with someone in a wheelchair. The staff at the front desk were also very nice and easy to work with. I would recommend this hotel for a Disneyland or Anaheim Convention Center stay. Very easy and quick walk to both the parks and convention center.

Summary: We booked for the D23 convention and loved the proximity to the convention center. The rooms were an excellent size, and well furnished, we loved the bunk beds for kids in the family suite even though we didn’t have any with us. The breakfast was great and always slightly different every morning, and gave us a great start to the day. Myrna, Rey, and Margarita in the breakfast room were so great to interact with every morning.

Summary: Hotel is beautiful. The close walkable proximity to both the Disneyland Resort and the convention center make this resort ideally located. There are a number of restaurants a couple minute walk away. The pool, spa, and exercise facilities are also very nice.

Summary: The Hyatt House never disappoints.  This is our preferred place to stay when we visit Disneyland.   The rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable.   The free breakfast is a bonus.  The staff is always friendly and helpful.  Thank you for the great service.

Summary: We stayed at Hyatt House Anaheim for 9 full days and we traveled with 3 young children. Overall it was great. For visitors we highly suggested you walk to the Disneyland and this hotel is about 5-10 minutes walk to the park, many people do that and it is better than drive there. We also walked back around midnight and many people walked with us. We felt safe. An Uber ride would cost about 12 bucks which is not bad. We stayed in an expanded one bed room with kitchen. The kitchen has a electric stove with full fridge, we needed that to warm some simple meal and it was super helpful. There were two beds in the bedroom and one sofa bed in the separate living area, we chose this because we needed a complete separate area for more space. Breakfast is great, but at time there would be
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear back from you on a guest survey! We hope that you were able to do everything you planned to do for this trip! We hope we provided an exceptional experience for you and your valued guests.

Summary: Pros Comfy beds Good breakfast   Cons No ceiling lights in the bedroom - only a lamp so very dim Shower pressure terrible NO service - at check in they advise that you can book a housekeeping service after 4 days only. None prior to that allowed.  We are here for 7 days. When we enter the room we find we only have 2 toilet rolls, 4 towels , one of each toiletry item , 2 tea bags and 4 coffee. So this has to last 3 adults for 4 days. We have had to buy toilet roll and bin bags as you also don’t get your bins emptied until day 4 and there is nowhere to empty these yourself. So it’s like camping that is pretending to be a hotel.  They also took 4273 au $ out of my account on check in and then explained I would have to pay this again at checkout and then 7 days after check out they

Summary Heading: Avoid better options around the area
Summary: - Dirty hallways  - Dirty pool smells like urine - No housekeeping in a daily basis  - Old furniture curtains are falling down and the AC noise is like a truck parked in your room  - Slow internet  - Basic breakfast everyday  - Unprofessional staff (you need to follow up in everything because they will just ignore you)  - I celebrate my daughter’s birthday and I mentioned that during my reservation and check in but they did nothing  - I regret staying there for a long term stay as the area full of great option

Summary: What makes a great experience isn’t the sweet treat under your pillow…… it’s the staff, it’s always the staff and the people behind the scenes who train the staff. Kiki at the front desk was beyond pleasant, treated us as if we were her first guests ever. Everyone was great including Rey at breakfast, he took the time to make sure our kids had everything at our table, even engaged in school conversation with our kids while we were getting our food. Aside from being a convenient place to stay for your Disneyland visit it is also across the street from great restaurants for the family and for the Starbucks lovers, they have one right outside the lobby.   Needless to say, it’s our new #1 choice for a great stay near Disneyland or for a business trip to Anaheim.   Thank you all for
Manager Response: Greetings and many thanks for choosing us for your hotel stay! We hope that whatever brought you to the area, you were able to fulfill your goals while staying with us! Have a wonderful holiday season!

Summary Heading: If you are doing Disney with kids, stay here!
Summary: This hotel was a quick walk to the parks and had a great breakfast. The breakfast staff in particular was amazing. They learned it was my daughters birthday and brought her a cupcake with a candle and sang to her. The food was above average and the room was great.

Summary: The accommodations are spacious and very clean.  Every staff member we interacted with during our two-night stay was polite, friendly, and responsive.  The pool and spa provided a much-needed escape from the heat wave we've been experiencing in So Cal.

Summary Heading: Family vacation with kids and in-laws
Summary: This hotel's 1 bedroom suite was perfect for our family vacation. It was very clean and in a great location for Disneyland. Staff was all very friendly and helpful (especially with a few minor issues that were quickly resolved).

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located next to the convention center and Disneyland.  There are many places to eat within walking distance.  The only issue we had with our stay was the tv that did not work and the hallways smelled odd.  Fortunately the rooms did not smell.  There was a hairball on the kitchen cupboard when we first entered the room.   Other than that, the staff was helpful and friendly.  The breakfast was as expected and the dining room was clean.

Summary: Air conditioning worked so well. Really clean, smelled good. Saw fireworks from my room. Great family hotel layout , loved having a kitchen. We live locally and this was great for back to back Disney days. Easy walk to the park. I will definitely be back.

Summary Heading: Great stay here for our Disneyland visit
Summary: Our family of 5 stayed here for 3 nights (Aug 31st to Sep 3rd), after staying at an Airbnb for 7 nights in LA. As many people have recommended, you really SHOULD stay in Anaheim while doing Disneyland. It's so different from Walt Disney World, there are several hotels around the gates of the park and you can walk back and forth.  I moved my reservation among 3 different hotels and, at the end, chose Hyatt House and I'm so glad we chose this one.  Everyone was so nice at the hotel, I got a good vibe from people there.  We ended up arriving extremely early (around 10 AM) and our room wasn't ready. The guy working reception was very nice and offered to keep our bags and gave us a key so we could use the pool. By the way, they also kept our bags after we checked out, there were lots

Restaurants were a block away and we dined at the Cheesecake Factory and PF Changs. Both were very good.   Below the hotel is a Blaze Pizza and a Starbucks. Loved the 2 Queen Studio with a Park View room, although I was awakened a few times by traffic during the night.  Regardless, I would still choose this room again.  Awesome breakfast with so many choices.  We decided we need to build in a rest day next trip so we can enjoy all of the amenities!   Checkout at 12pm (as opposed to the usual 11am for most places) was appreciated.  See

Summary: There are some real pros to this hotel but it is average at the end of the day. Could also walk about 5 min to hop on Toy Story shuttle but we never did.  Cons:The rooms are in need of a refresh, the carpet was quite dingy, the beds are very uncomfortable, and the rooms loud. We could hear our neighbors entire conversations and I’m sure we also annoyed them with our loud toddler. The breakfast was fine but the time was inconvenient if you’re going for rope drop at Disney, so we were not able to utilize it most days. Overall, it was convenient but we slept terribly and that part was rough.

The location is very optimal as it has a Walgreens downstairs, parking on site, as well as a 10-15 min walk to the front gates of Disneyland. These are very good! They offer breakfast, but I opted not to partake in them due to time. The only negative would be the immediate surrounding homeless and agitated folks sleeping or walking outside the Hotel. Plan to leave the hotel by 7:00AM to ensure you are front of the horde at the ticket gate and rope-drop areas.

This is a clear indicator that nobody has been watching over or maintaining the pool and spa for a while. For the prices being paid at this hotel (To include $28 a night to park your car), I would expect it to have a decent pool and spa. Especially considering we're here on vacation in sunny California. The hotel was kept clean and smelling nice. The complimentary bottle of water for members daily was a great benefit. Parking is $28 per night if you plan to do other stuff other than Disneyland. They have a parking garage that is underground and needs to be accessed with your room key. The same also applies to getting to your room in the elevator. Summary: We stayed at Hyatt House in Anaheim for 6 nights during our trip to Disney. Overall the hotel was great. The rooms were comfortable with the addition of a mini fridge and microwave. The breakfast was FREE and hot, not just pastries. Great little bar downstairs for cocktails, plus there is a Starbucks just off the hotel lobby with mobile ordering. The only complaint I have is about the shortage of housekeeping. Our room was cleaned once while we were there because of our length of stay. The staff was prompt to bring extra towels and TP when they were needed. However, guests are not really given an option of where to dispose of their trash or dirty linen. There were many rooms which had dirty linen and trash sitting in the hallway outside of their room for housekeeping to pick up.

Summary: Friendly staff, clean room, nice breakfast and great coffee!  We felt safe in the well lit garage as we went back and forth to our car.  The need to use our key to access room floors was also a security measure we appreciated.  Staying at the Hyatt House was everything we needed to make our Disney trip even better!
Manager Response: Good morning and thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary: As always a very nice stay at the Hyatt Anaheim for our large family. When we go to Disney this is our hotel to book, it never disappoints us. It is a very short walk to restaurants and of course Disneyland. Very friendly service from all of it’s staff and the breakfast although limited ( because of nationwide shortages, I assume) was a huge plus and tasty.  I would definitely recommend the hotel.
Manager Response: Good morning and thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for Star Wars Celebration and an extended holiday. It was a very pleasant stay and the hotel provided everything I needed. Would definitely stay here again - the staff was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Hyatt House! Your loyalty is so appreciated! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your entire stay with us and had lots of fun together!

Summary Heading: Very nice rooms, pleasant experience overall.
Summary: We highly recommend the Hyatt House for couples or families or friends. We had a king bed with two bunk beds, which would work great for people splitting a room for the nearby Anaheim Convention center, or families going to Disneyland. Breakfast was great and staff were very nice and helpful.  The hotel is very accessible and easy to walk or take Anaheim Transit to Disneyland or the Convention Center. It's great to have a Walgreens and several fast food places located right in the building. The pool area is clean and well maintained.  The only downside at least during our stay was, I think the cleaning staff forgot to get our room. We were there for six nights and did not recieve fresh towels or garbage can emptied. I should note though that they were cleaning other rooms on our
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Hyatt House! Your loyalty is so appreciated! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your entire stay with us and had lots of fun together!

Summary: Hotel was at a great location and was a great stay! Room was very spacious and would highly recommend. Below hotel had Starbucks, Blaze pizza, and a Walgreens. I will definitely stay here again and try to get the same room.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us for our future guests to see! Your loyalty to Hyatt is everything! We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Good option for families that’s walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Overall a solid choice for families since it has a kitchenette/dining area. It’s also within a 15m walk to Disneyland. I think the residence inn down the street is a little bit nicer (a bit more up to date, bigger rooms) but is a little bit pricier. The other benefit of the Hyatt House is there’s a Walgreens and a Starbucks really close by as well.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us for our future guests to see! Your loyalty to Hyatt is everything! We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Star wars Convention and Disneyland  vacation
Summary: The hotel was perfect location , located right in the middle of both. Maybe 14 minutes each. We were greeted with free waters and a warm smile. Front desk were accommodating with our high floor and close to elevator. The free breakfast was more than adequate. Eggs sausage and a rotating starch . We were there for 12 nights and the kitchen style rooms were just perfect. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Good morning and thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary Heading: Best stay in a long time
Summary: We have stayed at numerous hotels over the years… and a good number of them recently before during and right after Covid… This one is by far the best, most accommodating, convenient, comfortable and safest hotel I have stayed at in a while especially for the price definitely the best bang for your buck… I can’t wait to stay again and or use them at other destinations
Manager Response: Good morning and thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary: Came to vacation with family. Went to Disney and stayed here for 3 nights. It was great. Front desk was great. They told me if I need anything to call and provided her name. She was very attentive to us and explained fees, room service, etc.
Manager Response: Good morning and thank you for providing feedback for us on how we performed during your stay with us! We hope that you and your party enjoyed every moment of your stay with us!

Summary: Great option when planning a Disneyland vacation. Close enough to the parks you can walk! That alone almost makes it worth it. They do offer complimentary breakfast, another huge plus!! Most of the front desk staff is friendly and helpful. All the staff working breakfast are fantastic! Rooms could use a little bit of an update. But overall the rooms are clean, spacious and our room had a great view of Disneyland. We will definitely be back again for our next Disney trip
Manager Response: Good morning and thank you for sharing your experience with us here! We hope that you had an exceptional experience staying with us in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary Heading: Perfect for our stay while visiting Disneyland|!
Summary: I would definitely stay here again. Some perks include: 1. 10-15 min walk to Disney 2. access to a heated outdoor pool 3. family adjoining rooms available subject to availability (e.g. two rooms joined together) 4. A variety of HOT breakfast everyday. Including scrambled eggs, sausages, pancakes, bacon, fruit, oatmeal, cereal. This is a timesaver! As soon as you wake up, you can have breakfast and get on with your busy day and not have to worry about where to eat or wasting time to wait in lines. Also, saves money as it's included in your stay.  5. Access to gas bbq at the pool deck. If you're on a budget and want to avoid eating out, you can make your own food.  6. Every room has a full kitchen including stove, microwave, fridge and dishwasher.  7. Access to 24/7 Walgreens
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us for our future guests to see! Your loyalty to Hyatt is everything! We hope that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Had a great time here been to the Hyatt place in Oahu last December I like this Hyatt House better bec the staff are friendly too but the breakfast was great nice and clean and pleasant staff.the kitchen are was great all complete spotless can’t ask for anything more:) Will plan to stay here just to unwind and swim in the pool which is on the same floor of our room!
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Hyatt House! Your loyalty is so appreciated! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your entire stay with us and had lots of fun together!

Summary: There was chrome cast but couldn’t get it to work! Tried everything! It was so frustrating! Room was well equipped for meal prep. Short walk to Disneyland. Good breakfast every morning. Staff very attentive to requests.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us, meinfrank! So sorry to hear you had a negative experience with our tv! I am going to follow up with my team here.

Summary: Had a lot of potential to be a great hotel. Great location and many restaurants close by. Beautiful lobby. Rooms seem a bit cold and sterile; didn’t care for lighting in the bunk room. No USB chargers. I would not recommend this place for anyone who sleeps lightly. I was awake a good portion of the night. Seems like the walls are very thin. I could hear traffic and everything in the bathroom, even with a small travel fan and sound machine. Also, I think the elevator needing a room key is a great idea from the main floor to go up, but not when I’m trying to leave or go down a floor to visit family in another room. Overall, it was just “OK” and I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Good evening, TRDCo, thank you for spending the time with us when going to the parks. We appreciate you sharing with us what you liked and disliked. It is feedback like this that helps us improve for the future!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: Our family of four stayed here when visiting Disneyland. It was a very easy less than 10 minute walk to the park. We stayed for six nights and never had a single complaint. My boys loved their bunk beds and my husband was very impressed with the breakfast. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and for staying at our hotel! We hope that everyone enjoyed their time with us and was able to do everything you all planned!

Summary: We did 3 days in Disneyland it would have been nice to have shuttle service also alittle info on what services you have there such as food etc… we haven’t traveled in a very long time and theres so much going on it would have helped to just have been informed.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback, maripg67. I think it is extremely critical that our staff offer help with navigating the area. I am so sorry we failed to do so for you. I will take this feedback back to my team and review it together for how we can improve!

Summary: Pros:  Location was amazing, short walk to Disneyland and a Starbucks, Walgreens, and Blaze Pizza downstairs.  Room was spacious and kitchenette was nice to have.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  The free breakfast was decent -- eggs, sausage, potatoes, toast, whole fruit, cereal, and the usual beverages.  And free.  Nice that there is a bar in the lobby though I did not use it. Cons:  Really the only con was the mattress on the sofa pullout is uncomfortable and not suitable for anyone other than a young child IMO.  I had two 10-year olds who, unsolicited, when they stretched out on it said no WAY they would rather sleep with their parent.  The 8-year old was fine with it.  I would have felt it for days had I been the one relegated to sleep on it.
Manager Response: Good evening, Heather R, thank you for sharing your important feedback regarding your pros & cons! This type of response really helps paint a picture of what you experienced for future guests to consider when choosing a hotel.

Summary: This Hotel is the perfect location... with the perfect amenities. It is right next to Disneyland within walking distance. It has fast food right across the street or you walk down a little farther and dine in restaurants are right there. I would definitely stay here agian along with recommendation to anyone Thinking about places to stay near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Good evening, Rvj98257, and thank you for your time in submitting feedback for us. Our future guests and the hotel staff relies on guest reviews for what to expect and improve on. We hope that you had an exceptional stay.

Summary: Me and my family were in a bind at the last minute at night and when we arrive at your the hotel, Kiki was there and she helped us out greatly! She was so nice, very friendly, and professional. She helped us out greatly and our other family members book rooms, so our vacation trip was made awesome. Kiki deserves recognition for her excellent customer service. Your hotel was also very nice and clean and had very friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us accommodate you and your family. It is so rewarding to hear back from our guests about the positive experience you had with us!

Summary Heading: Overall happy with our stay, but a few things can be improved.
Summary: Our room with a kitchenette was spacious and bright. The 2 queen beds and the pillows were very comfortable.  The air conditioning in the room worked well and was nice and quiet unlike some of those wall mount units so many hotels have.  The room was clean on arrival with the exception of a visible layer of dust and lint on the hardwood floor in the kitchenette and entry area. This was still there after our 2 room cleanings. Seems they don't vaccuum the floors, perhaps just using a sweeper or something. Otherwise, we had no complaint with the cleanliness of our room.  Full housekeeping is only offered after 3 nights and could be handled better. We should not have to keep phoning the front desk to get more toilet tissue and washcloths when booking an 8 night stay. The room should
Manager Response: Good evening, thank you for sharing your experience with us, tourbytransit! Your feedback helps our future guests and the hotel learn about what we offer and how are guests feel about those amenities. We hope you had a wonderful time in the area!

Summary Heading: A great place for family at Disney.
Summary: The room is great for the grandkids. The buckbeds and the sofa bed are comfortable.  We left items in the closet and there was anproblem getting them back. We have the items back. We recommend this hotel. The breakfast is improving since covid shutdown.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, caringajn! Our team's so happy to have accommodated you and your family. Thank you for bringing everyone in to stay with us.

Summary: Only reason I’m not giving it 5 stars is because of only having housekeeping services after 3 night stay. With small kiddos and hotel stays we need the housekeeping and also if I’m staying in a hotel that’s what I appreciate and why I didn’t stay in an Airbnb. All other services were exceptional from the room itself, staff, hot breakfast, and overall experience.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your survey response! Your feedback is so important to our success!

Summary Heading: Hyatt experience during 2 day disneyland trip
Summary: Nice people, great service, very accommodating. Allowed me to park my car at the hotel even though my check in was at 4 that day so I didn’t have to pay for Disneyland parking. Clean hotel room, free breakfast from 6-9, and only about a 5 min walk down the street from Disneyland entrance.
Manager Response: Good evening, 136alainaa, thank you so much for your kind words and feedback! We are, sincerely, happy you all enjoyed each day with us.

Summary Heading: Valuables STOLEN from Room on First Night
Summary: Please Stay away from this Hotel. Our bedroom was broken into the first night. First day we were out all day at Disneyland, returned around 10 pm to only find out ALL of our valuables had been taken. The kids iPads, AirPods, all makeup, a travel backpack that had personal items including a passport, also took prescription glasses, and rental car keys. They only left behind our clothes. Once we notified the hotel staff, all they told us to do was fill a form and to wait for their third party insurance company to reach us. This appears to be a regular Occurrence for this hotel as there’s been a few reviews on both google and yelp from families also mentioning their rooms had been broken into and items stolen. Please STAY AWAY or take all your valuables when you leave.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our family of 6 stayed here for a week while on a Disneyland vacation. The walk was easily doable, though it seemed a bit long after a day in the parks, but even our 8-year-old made it fine. The rooms were spacious for our family. I do wish the refrigerator was larger. The mattresses were much too firm for our liking. The breakfast was very good and filling and the breakfast staff was amazing.  We had a problem during our stay, but the staff went above and beyond to rectify it.
Manager Response: Hi there, Glynis N, we appreciate you staying with us and submitting a survey. Your feedback helps us understand how we are doing and how we can improve. We hope that you all have a wonderful rest of the year and think of us!

Summary: WOW!!!!!!!!! I will be back to this hotel if I go to Disneyland again. Hotel was CLEAN, STAFF OMG very welcoming and always with great attitude. My respect for Housekeeping, entire hotel, rooms, pool area really clean.Breakfast had a variety of cereal, scramble eggs, sausage, hash browns, pancakes, juices, coffee it was great.Needs a bar close to the pool area, we don't want to go to 1st floor for drinks being wet.But overall great hotel.
Manager Response: Good evening, Jpaezdiaz41st, thank you for staying with us and taking the time to let us know how your stay went. We rely on our guests to improve; so, thank you for your kind words! We hope that you think of us again!

Summary: It’s only a ten minute walk away from Disneyland. the staff were lovely and very friendly. We were able to get an early check in which was amazing because our arrival was alot earlier. Perfect for kids the room was big and having the kitchen was awesome. Only thing is I wish that we had housekeeping daily.
Manager Response: Good evening, klwaters2022, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us all. We hope that you had a wonderful experience and think of us again!

Summary: for my first visit at the hotel i was pleasantly surprised at the staff at how welcoming they were and accommodating to my request to small or big they were. Oscar checked us in and gave me all the benefits that this hotel had to offer as well as some tips for disneyland thanks again! will book again soon
Manager Response: Good evening, I2442Enicka, thank you so much for giving us a try! We are so happy you had an exceptional experience and we hope to provide it to you and your family once more in the future!

Summary: Amazing hotel, Margarita (restaurant) was super helpful, she was very tentative to my family and was always willing to assist in whatever way possible. Thank you for making our stay enjoyable, and thank you Margarita for your amazing service.
Manager Response: Good evening, thank you so much for staying with us, 335eddyg, we are so happy to hear everyone had a great experience. We will make sure Margarita knows how much of a positive impact she had on your stay.

Summary: All staff members we encountered were pleasant & helpful,front desk, security,& housekeeping. Hotel was clean comfortable, convenient to everything. Nice breakfast setup. Could use some pastry’s, danish or donuts? Great bed & linen. Mostly quiet except not as much on some “street side” rooms.Would certainly stay here in a future visit
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Midge M, thank you for staying with us! Thank you for sharing your favorite things about your recent stay with us. We hope to provide another exceptional stay for you in the future!

Summary: The hotel was clean, comfortable, and safe. The front desk and security staff, and housekeepers were very friendly and accommodating. The breakfast was very good and the breakfast staff did a great job. The hotel is a 10-minute walk to the Disneyland Resort. Overall, Hyatt House is a wonderful place to stay in Anaheim. I look forward to staying there again soon.
Manager Response: Good afternoon EdW721, thank you so much for providing feedback for us to refer to when looking to improve. We take our guest's feedback seriously. So, thank you for this information, and we hope that everyone enjoyed their time with us!

Summary: Our stay at Hyatt House was great. The room was great. We had two studios. Having the microwave, small refrigerator and stovetop if needed was great. Even a dishwasher. It was well stocked. Nice to have a real knife to cut our caramel apples. The TV swivels from the couch seating area to the bed area. The breakfast buffet was nice, they still are serving the eggs, protein and pancakes or waffles but we didn’t mind that at all. It is an easy walk to Disney, it’s a little less than a mile. There is a Walgreens and Starbucks attached to the Hotel. Along with a pizza place.
Manager Response: Good evening, dazerts, thank you so much for staying with us and providing us with feedback to build off. We hope that you all enjoyed every moment of your time with us!

Summary: My husband looked around for a quick hotel reservation seeing we go to Disneyland alot we usually stay at Disneyland Hotel but we chose a more thrifty way of going.  To my surprise I was very happy with his choice and have stayed here twice in the last couple months.  Clean friendly and relaxing is what we take from this hotel. We will be staying again at the end of the month for another Disney trip👏👏👏😁
