Manager Response: Good afternoon, fivehernandez, thank you so much for your kind feedback! We hope that we can provide an exceptional stay for you in the future!

Summary Heading: Great family hotel and close to Disney.
Summary: Easy and fast checkin. Had a little studio. Clean and tidy and big enough for 4. 10 min walk to Disneyland. Walgreens in convenient in case you forget anything. Starbucks next door. Breakfast was included. All very easy convenient.  Left the car there for the day when we checked out and grabbed it upon our departure back home.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Isabel Y, thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us! We hope that your stay was exceptional!

Summary: 1/2 mile from Disneyland, so the walk wasn’t bad at all. The hotel was super clean, which was very impressive especially with the foot traffic this area has and the staff was very friendly. Will book again on our next trip!
Manager Response: Good afternoon, chrisambriz22, we, sincerely, appreciate your loyalty to Hyatt. We hope that you enjoyed your time at our hotel and the disney area.

Summary: I’ve been to multiple hotels near Disneyland is this is the one to stay at. It is reasonably close to the park and it is very clean and spacious with great service and staff. All rooms were clean and spacious. You do have to request room service if not then it’s every 3 days but overall very convenient and very great. I liked that there was a starbucks and blaze pizza with a Walgreens downstairs!! Overall this hotel is my go to hotel for when I go to Disney.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, and thank you so much for choosing Hyatt House! We hope that everything worked out well for your vacation time in our area.

Summary: Awesome service. Walking distance to Disneyland. Beautiful room. Upgrade to a room facing the theme park so you can see the fireworks. Convenient underground parking. Nice to have a Walgreens in the same building.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing our hotel for your vacation! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your time with us! And we hope that upgraded room made your stay even more special!

Summary Heading: Decent place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: This was a decent place to stay within walking distance of Disneyland, although I probably would opt to try another property once I lose my Hyatt status. However I certainly would not hesitate to stay here again.  My interactions with their staff were pleasant. I appreciated the text messages leading up to my stay- I think that’s a great gesture!  Yes, I had to wait awhile to be helped at the front desk (my digital key didn’t work) but every hotel is dealing with staffing issues so it’s best to be patient, they’re doing the best they can. Pre-arrival instructions on parking would’ve been helpful - I checked in online prior to arriving so I took a ticket when pulling into the parking garage, when I should’ve used my key (which didn’t work anyway lol). Fortunately they rectified
Manager Response: Good afternoon, thank you very much for staying with us for your vacation! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. The knowledge provided by you will serve to help improve future guest experiences.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because it was close to Disney and a 5min walk to the park. We choose this too because it has a full kitchen so we could cook. It came with everything we needed. It was more than expected and we will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Good afternoon,rae112022, thank you very much for choosing our hotel for your visit to Anaheim. We hope you were all able to do everything you planned for during your vacation.

Summary: I’d like to start by saying I attempted to reach the manager of this property Bonnie and handle this privately before writing this review. I both emailed and left a voicemail. Waited a week and still never heard back. As a Globalist with Hyatt I found this off putting… Now on to my review.   I realize this is a Hyatt House by Disneyland and it’s expected to have some wear and tear. I’m realistic with my expectations. Unfortunately, things were still pretty tough. For starters the carpet was disgusting. We showered upon arrival, walked around a bit and when getting into bed our feet were black. In multiple areas there were boogers stuck to walls. The blinds were also stained and tarnished.   Things out of the hotel’s control also lead to a rough night. Roughly 3am we awoke to a
Manager Response: Good afternoon, imsayin13, thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience. Addtiionally, thank you very much for your loyalty to Hyatt. We are sorry that your most recent stay was less than exceptional. Using the notes you have left, we will be able to improve.

Summary: Great for families, lovely pool, excellent breakfast! Would not recommend booking through 3rd parties, but would stay here again! Loved having a suite with kitchen for in-room meals & space to spread out!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, Sharon M! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your time at the parks and at our hotel.

Summary: We came to Hyatt for our sons first Disney trip. When we arrived, Oscar : The front desk clerk; was helpful and courteous. The room and the amenities: Gym, Swimming Pool, and Breakfast; perfect. Margarita gave excellent service while we had breakfast. Would come again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is our goal to make our guests feel welcomed and to deliver service beyond our guests' expectations. We hope to see you and your family again in the future when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: The staff was very welcoming, helpful, and friendly. Everything in my room was very clean and organized. I very much enjoyed my stay and if I were to come back to Anaheim, I'd stay here again! Thanks!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is our goal to make our guests feel welcomed and to deliver service beyond our guests' expectations. We hope to see you and your family again in the future when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: Went to Disney for the weekend . Sunday morning we had breakfast there and the staff was very polite and attentive even tho we got there a bit late 10 minutes before they stop serving breakfast , we weren’t rush instead the staff made us feel comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is our goal to make our guests feel welcomed and to deliver service beyond our guests' expectations. We hope to see you and your family again in the future when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: Staff are very warm, friendly and pleasant, very helpful to my brother  to print his document., my family and I enjoyed the suite, clean, really worth it, bed is comfortable. Breakfast is good, I’ll be back there for sure😊
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is our goal to make our guests feel welcomed and to deliver service beyond our guests' expectations. We hope to see you and your family again in the future when visiting Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Modern Hotel 0.5 miles from Disney Parks
Summary: Came here April 2022 to stay couple nights to go to Disney for the weekend using my free nights and points.  Really liked how I could just park and walk to the Disney parks 10-15m away and when I was tired mid day - a $10 Uber ride one way).  Stayed in room on the 2nd floor above Walgreens facing the road but it’s a nice room with a view of the Disney fireworks at night which had 1 large king bed and a pull out couch.    There was only 2 of us but it feels like you could fit 6 people or more if they sleep on the couch.  I really like how dark the room got and how cold it was in addition to the bathroom.  For quietness it’s like a 3.5-4/5 as I could hear people or loud footsteps.  I had forgotten my toothbrush and the hotel gave me one.  I also like how Walgreens is right
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is our goal to make our guests feel welcomed and to deliver service beyond our guests' expectations. We hope to see you and your family again in the future when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: We have stayed at this resort previously in 2019 for a family trip to Disney and had a great stay. However this visit was disappointing. The hotel was quite dirty. Especially corridor’s and the front entry.  There was also no room servicing for the first three days of our stay. I believe this was why every public garbage was full throughout the hotel. Normal upkeep of both the rooms and public spaces seem to have fallen aside for the last few years.  It was also very noisy, which isn’t unusual for a resort full of families. If you don’t have kids, don’t stay here.  I would not recommend this property for the $395 per night price tag and we will not be back on our next trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good news first…the location is great for walking to Disneyland and the customer service is very good. Staff is responsive, courteous and  prompt in response to a request. But was really disappointed in the rooms that are not up to par with most Hyatt hotels which I have always been very satisfied with. Booked 3 rooms for our family and each had a problem that we had to call front desk to have fixed. The rooms were pretty clean except for the carpets which looked dingy. Beds were also uncomfortable which was surprising and unexpected. Rooms definitely need some updating. I’ve always felt like I could count on Hyatt to provide a great stay but sadly not this time.
Manager Response: Good morning, Pam Y, thank you very much for being honest and providing feedback for us to build upon. These are notes I can share with my team so that we can improve! We hope that you and your family were able to enjoy your stay after getting those room issues resolved. Please rest assured as these are matters that we will be addressing.

Summary: I stayed here with my wife the second  week of april.  We were hoping to use this as a jump off point to visit the Disney parks.  I fell very ill with a bad cold.  We had to cut our trip short as I felt horrible and would have been very contagious to the public as well.  Oscar the front dest manager was so very kind and helpful with getting us out early and no fuss over our refund of points.  I cant say enough about how well the employees treat their customers, truly magical albeit a very sickly visit for me.  We will stay again when we return in 2023. I highly recommend this hotel.  You will not be sorry..
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is our goal to make our guests feel welcomed and to deliver service beyond our guests' expectations. We hope to see you and your family again in the future when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: Amazing hotel, with super friendly staff, the rooms are nicely stocked, spacious, has kitchenette and is well planned for family, especially with kids.  Heated pool/jacuzzi is icing on the cake. Right next to Disneyland, highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is our goal to make our guests feel welcomed and to deliver service beyond our guests' expectations. We hope to see you and your family again in the future when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: Hyatt House - (Home Away From Home) -  The only place to stay for comfort, cleanliness and excellent customer service.  The room exceeded expectations and the facility and staff are wonderful !  With Disney literally a 5 minute walk, and the Walgreens, Starbucks, Blaze Pizza and other at your finger tip places of convenience, their just is not a better place to stay.   (I do not typically write reviews and am a world travel, so for me to do this I was impressed.)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is our goal to make our guests feel welcomed and to deliver service beyond our guests' expectations. We hope to see you and your family again in the future when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: Great place to stay if you are going to the parks. Only a 10 minute walk.  Staff was wonderful.  Starbucks right next door, daily breakfast, super convenient. The ONLY disappointment but a decently big one, is that there is no housekeeping service. We had a kitchen that required sweeping every day due to, well, having a kitchen. There was no broom for us to do it ourselves. We stayed 5 nights but were told housekeeping was only available to come clean/straighten up the rooms after 5 nights. How long are hotels going to use COVID as a reason for not staffing  properly but still charging the same with less service? Easily could be 5 stars with housekeeping services.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is our goal to make our guests feel welcomed and to deliver service beyond our guests' expectations. We hope to see you and your family again in the future when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: We go to Disneyland once every two to three years.  In choosing hotels, we try to find a good balance between location, amenities and cost.  Five stars for room conditions.  Very new and clean.  Kitchens were great and full service.  Bathrooms were large and clean.  Five stars for pool and jacuzzi. Towels were available until the late hours.  Five stars for the gym which was also very clean AND 24hr access.  That seems like a nice perk.  Four stars for the continental breakfast.  Breakfast staff were great.  Location is five stars.  About 3 long blocks to Disneyland.  Easily walkable.  There is a Starbucks in the same building and a Walgreens.  Many food options within 50 yards.  Plenty of on-site parking but it will cost you $26 per night.  I think that is probably standard.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is our goal to make our guests feel welcomed and to deliver service beyond our guests' expectations. We hope to see you and your family again in the future when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: The staff at the Hyatt house was excellent. Paulina and Margarita went above and beyond to make sure we had breakfast after we had showed up late. Their generosity and kindness isn’t something  you encounter every  day. Pool area and gym were clean.   Our room on the other hand was supposed to be a firework view of Disneyland park along Katela avenue. The street noise throughout the night was so loud it was  hard to sleep. Kept hearing cars drive by, big trucks supplying the local stores and fire trucks. I wouldn’t recommend the street view.   The employees made this trip an (5) excellent. The room noise made the trip (3) average. Location was very convenient, local stores are Walgreens, Starbucks, Blaze pizza.
Manager Response: Good morning, Power_X_Surge_X, thank you for staying with us. We know you had a lot of choices for hotel accommodations. We are so grateful to hear back and to hear that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: hotel was great and walking distance to Disney. they weren’t cleaning rooms due to covid still, but would have been nice to have towels dropped every couple days without having to ask, as we would forget and it would be too late. Hot breakfast is decent, nothing special. rooms were good size and it was nice having the kitchen for stuff to keep for the kids.
Manager Response: Good morning, baileywrenn2022, thank you so for staying with us! That is a great suggestion regarding towel refreshments! Perhaps this is an area where we can improve vastly. Thank you for your time in submitting feedback for us. We hope that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Nice rooms and friendly staff.  We were greeted by a very friendly staff who was extremely helpful.  This hotel elevators were a bit slow and one or two not working.   Nice to stay here with your family/children.
Manager Response: Good morning, P1015ORrobertv, thank you for staying with us! We are happy to provide an exceptional stay for you and your family. We hope you all had a great time with us and the parks - if that is where you all were headed! We hope that you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Excellent customer service and near Disney!
Summary: We are able to come and go to the park. There is a Walgreens, Starbucks and Pizza in the same complex. Checked in at 8 am without any trouble and check out in a breeze. The room was clean with fridge and microwave. They only provided with sheets with out comforter for the sofa bed, that would be my only issue. But everything else was ok. Chromecast available for tv streaming id also available.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is our goal to make our guests feel welcomed and to deliver service beyond our guests' expectations. We hope to see you and your family again in the future when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: We were originally planning on staying at a different hotel, but changed to this location a couple of weeks before arrival.  It was a good choice.  This is right on the corner of Katella and Harbor and lots of dining nearby.  Within the complex of the hotel itself is Walgreens, Blaze Pizza, Starbucks.  It's walkable to Disneyland and I even had to walk back to Disney at 11 PM (there was plenty of foot traffic, so always felt safe).  There are some homeless around, but never they did not bother anyone.  We arrived early so did not have a room ready, but they texted us when ready.  Check in staff was friendly, recognized Globalist status and made us feel welcome.  Room included a small kitchen including plates, small stove, sink and mini fridge. We  did not cook, but I suppose it
Manager Response: Good morning, vpar4, thank you for your continued loyalty to Hyatt! It is great to hear from our Globalists about what they experienced while staying with us. We are so happy to provide an exceptional stay for you and your family. Thank you for sharing what you would like to see change, as well! These notes are crucial to our improvement as a team.

Summary: Staff were friendly and helpful. Very welcoming! My family and I stayed here for our Disney land trip which is about a 10-15 minute walk to the theme park. We will definitely stay at the Hyatt House during our next visit to Disney land.
Manager Response: Good morning juliesowell10, thank you for staying with us. We are glad to hear you and your family had an awesome time with us! We hope you all were able to get everything done that you had set out to do for this trip!

Summary: Nice room for the rate. However, once I saw 3 black hairs on the untouched pillow on the bed the first night, I was instantly grossed out for the rest of the stay. More than likely will not be staying again.
Manager Response: Good morning, Kelsey B, thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us. Sharing experiences with us - good or bad - is extremely crucial to our improvement as a team here at Hyatt House in Anaheim. We hope that you were able to enjoy our amenities and your time at the parks!

Summary: Awesome hotel and location! Close proximity to Disneyland/California Adventure. Staff was so friendly and helpful. Hotel was clean and well maintained. Would recommend for any occasion. Overall an awesome experience.
Manager Response: Good morning, susanb13132022, and thank you for sharing your feedback with us; we value your time in doing so. It is our sincerest hope that you and your family enjoyed every second of your stay with us and at the parks!

Summary: The location is ideal for disneyland access. Parking garage is big and easy to maneuver. Starbucks and Walgreens on site was great. Breakfast was exceptional. Cons: rooms with a fireworks view or street side are very loud. The road noise is all night long. The pull out bed was awful. Zero water pressure in the shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience during your recent stay with us, M96339UZjamiec, it is so important to our growth to hear back from our guests. We hope that you were able to take advantage of all the amenities we have to offer.

Summary: Nice facility, great staff and great location. Great way to start our stay with Kellie pre-checking us in before heading to Disneyland. Kellie was sweet, kind and beyond helpful. Kudos to Kellie! The staff at the hotel were all helpful and friendly. The rooms were large, clean and comfortable. Nice breakfast and easy walk to Disneyland. I would definitely recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for submitting your feedback for us. We are so happy to hear you were more than satisfied with Kellie's hospitality during your recent stay with us! Additionally, thank you for sharing your experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Wonderful retreat Walking Distance to Disney
Summary: Stayed here for a birthday trip to Disneyland with friends. Could not have loved the stay more.  Clean welcoming hotel. Wonderful staff throughout the stay. Easy check in and check out, which I was able to extend. Great breakfast included. Hot food and a good variety, oatmeal, toast, coffee and tea assortment. Hot food changed daily: Eggs, variety of sausage, tater tots, French toast sticks.12 minute walk to the gates of the Disney Parks.   Elevators get a little backed up around breakfast finishing around 9am and park opening around 8am. (factor into planning)
Manager Response: Good morning, basketball109, thank you so much for providing your tips/feedback for us and our future guests! That information you provided is going to be so helpful for parents planning each detail of their trip - as we know Disneyland parks demand. We hope that you all enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: Due to the hidden fees I would never come back to any Hyatt at all I’m extremely disappointed on how you can set up a rate online and you pay more than what you expected traveling to your hotel stop with the hidden fees that’s not OK.
Manager Response: Good morning, jstarjules, thank you for staying with us and thank you for providing feedback. We are sorry to hear that there was a miscommunication regarding the charges that would be incurred while staying with us. Please note that our parking fee is $26.00/night, we require a $50.00 incidental deposit/night (up to $300 max for longer stays). If you needed help with your bill further, please reach out to us - we are always available to assist.

Summary: Hands down great hotel to call home. Convenient in all aspects. Breakfast is a huge plus! Prefect check out time. Gym and pool available. Front staff always so welcoming. Walking distance to the happiest place on earth. Thank you Hyatt House!
Manager Response: Good morning, bgain15,  Thank you for submitting a survey on behalf of Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort. We hope that you and your family were able to enjoy all the amenities we have to offer. Thank you for staying with us and letting us know what you loved about your stay.

Summary Heading: Great for Disney access and close to everything!
Summary: Clean fresh and easy place to stay! Will def come back. We mainly stayed here because we were going to Disneyland/CA and it was a 10 minute walk! They even upgraded our room. For being a couple with no kids the hotel was pretty quite as well which was nice! Hotel employees were very kind!!
Manager Response: Good morning, jessicaleahnewman, we hoe that our accommodations suited you and your partner well. We are always so grateful to hear back from our guests about what they liked and disliked. We want to thank you for submitting feedback and for staying loyal to Hyatt. We hope that you all enjoyed your stay.

Summary: This place is great. Family oriented, rooms are comfortable and spacious. All the amenities you need for a trip to Disneyland. Free breakfast starts the day off right. Beautiful outdoor pool.  Safe underground on site parking for a fee. But we left the vehicle there after check out for hours and they accommodated us.
Manager Response: Good morning, heathm928, thank you for submitting feedback for your recent stay. It is always so nice to hear that our guests were able to enjoy all the amenities we have to to offer. We are always happy to help check bags before/after check in/check out and we are always happy to help accommodate early/late parking.

Summary: Great hotel! Family of 6 stayed for 3 days. Got in at 10:00 and were able to check in early. Room had a full fridge, oven top, no stove. Also had dishes, pots and pans for cooking. Took my family about 10 minutes to walk to the park. Loved the pool, it is a little small but plenty of places to hang out and sit. We would stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Good morning, Lvs2vaca, thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and for your time in submitting feedback. We are so happy to be able to provide an exceptional stay for you and your family. We hope that you all were able to do everything you had set out to do on your most recent trip.

Summary: Over all cleanliness is excellent! I just wish Filipino attendants front desk and food service are kind to their own kind. They are racist to their own kind.  But proximity to all establishment is so covenient.
Manager Response: Good morning, mkiwiv, we are so sorry you felt that way about the service provided to you by our agents/breakfast attendants. We do value each and every guest that stays with us, whether that is someone local or traveling internationally. We, sincerely, hope that you and your family enjoyed your time with us.

Summary: Great location - 10 minute walk to Disneyland. They serve breakfast every morning. Starbucks and Walgreens just downstairs. Room was quiet and clean! Overall great stay for families! Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Good morning, chellebellz, thank you very much for staying with us and providing feedback. We hope that you and your family were able to do everything you wanted at the parks! Have a wonderful day.

Summary: Great hotel, always very clean and they are fully staffed; unlike some other hotel near Disneyland that they stil use use COVID as an excuse not to be fully staff and use it as an excuse for poor service.  Couple great thing about this hotel, they serve legit warm breakfast buffet, eggs, protein and on rotation waffle/French toast/pancakes, ceraals and coffee, with nice to go cups.  Another bonus it’s conveniently right above. Walgreen which is open 24/7 you can buy additional waters or snack or any other items.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, 854sherwins, thank you for letting us know what you thought about your most recent stay with us. We are so happy to hear you had such an exceptional stay with us. We hope that everyone got to do what was on their bucketlist for our area.

Summary: Efrain was wonderful at checkin and made everything a breeze.  I was upgraded as a globalist, checked in, and on my way to Disneyland in no time. The walk is short which is sooooo great. I have stayed at the Hyatt Place and the walk was much farther. Breakfast was okay, they had pancakes one day and French toast the other, but they weren't out of this world or anything. The room was clean and very comfortable; plenty of towels stocked and they were still fluffy :) I stayed in the one bedroom suite with a full kitchen but I didn't use anything other than the fridge. I was very pleased with my stay and will be staying here again on my next trip in a few months. Thank you!
Manager Response: Good evening, Born2TravelTheGlobe, we are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Efrain is an integral part of our team and we are excited to share with him what you thought of his hospitality.

Summary: Hotel is a close walk to Disney and right above a Walgreens and Starbucks but other than that it was just meh. Housekeeping is running a skeleton crew and after staying for six nights we had to remove our own trash a few times, request more bedding (the blankets were like sheets), request shampoo and soap, get our own TP from the cleaning cart etc. Also, the pool deck area has seen better days. Many of the umbrellas are torn up and faded. The place just needs a little love. For $2000 I would normally expect better but the walk to Disneyland was the reason we chose it and decided to stay, even though it wasn’t up to our normal expectations.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, PetuniaGFitch, thank you very much for letting us know what you thought of your recent stay with us. feedback such as yours will help us to improve as a team here at Hyatt House. We hope that you have a wonderful and safe rest of 2022.

Summary: Overall, I gave three stars based on .5 mile distance from Disneyland and the pool. The hot tub was foaming daily which is usually a sign of lack of sanitizer. Breakfast was mediocre at best; instant eggs and a protein. No waffles etc. We had the one bedroom kitchen suite that had only two mismatched chairs to dine with at the island with a family of four. No housekeeping so we had to put trash out daily. We stayed three nights.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, nicolecardbone, thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to see you had a less than exceptional stay. We actually do not provide two of the same chairs in our kitchen suites. We try to provide one normal bar chair and one working chair that is designed for longer hours for working guests.   We hope that you consider us again in the future.

Summary: Booked for 6 days with kids due to proximity to Disney land  Pros - very close to Disney land   Cons -  No cleaning service they clean the room once in 5 days - no cleaning on other days even if you request , if you are traveling with kids you can’t expect the room to be clean for 5 days -  You have to call front desk for everything toilet paper , towels soap and wait another half an hour for them to deliver. The reason for not cleaning is COVID 19 , this is such a lame excuse . If you are staying for more than 2 days find a different hotel
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Kishan867,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your most recent visit to our hotel. We understand how frustrating the policy for cleaning service was handled. However, I am happy to say that we have switched to Hyatt's new standard, every 3 nights. We hope that this helps ease some of your concerns.

Summary: Everything felt better than expected and almost too good to be true. The customer service, the gym, the pool, the free Wi-Fi, and the complementary amenities. The price point matched with the hotel location presents an unrivaled advantage and we haven't even gotten started with the room space. All in all, would recommend the Hyatt House or the Hyatt Place a block over if you're planning your stay here.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, J_Money_2900, we are happy to hear you had a positive experience with us and our sister property down the way. We hope that you have a wonderful rest of 2022 and think of us in the future!

Summary: Lots of noise after midnight from other guests made it difficult to sleep. When we complained to management they said this is a known party hotel and if we wanted a good nights sleep we should switch hotels.
Manager Response: Hi there, cyne15,   Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your most recent stay. We are sorry to hear that the noise you experienced in your room was unacceptable. While we are not a party hotel, as we do our best to observe quiet hours, we do experience many guests coming back late at night due to the time that Disneyland theme parks close. We are so sorry that impacted your stay.

Summary: This was the perfect hotel for our family vaca! We had a one bedroom suite with full kitchen for 3 of us. The room was very clean and put together AND gave us a good view of the disney fireworks every night.Having the full kitchen allowed us to save lots of money on eating out. We went to the grocery store the day we got there,(which was only roughly a mile from the hotel) and got food for the 4 days we were there. Every time I went into the fridge I felt like I was saving $20!😄  Our urber/lyft was a super cost effective ride and getting into the park was pretty breezy. I definitely recommended catching an uber/lyft to the park and forego walking as you will be doing so much walking at the Park. Save your legs and feet and catch a ride.   overall experience I give a 5/5 but as
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out our guest survey. Here at Hyatt we take every response into consideration as it allows us to continually grow as a team and as a hotel. I am glad that we were able to meet your expectations and provide you excellent service. We do our very best to try and care for all of our guests so that they can be their best. Thank you for deciding to stay with us and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: We stayed here on a family Disney vacation in a two bedroom suite with kitchenette. Everything was excellent. Location was perfect. Easy walk to the parks and could come back for our baby’s nap during the day no problem. Breakfast, beds, room view, pool and bar were all wonderful. Highly recommend staying here. We will be staying here on all our Disneyland trips!
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary: The hotel isn’t bad.  The breakfast is serviceable, the people at desk are friendly.  Convenient with a Walgreens, a pizza place, a Starbucks, and hotel restaurant all on site.  The rooms are small and already seem dated, hallways need a cleaning.  Staffing is light so they don’t clean your room at all, even if you request it.  Close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary: My 10-year old daughter and I stayed at the Hyatt House this past weekend for my daughter's cheer competition at the nearby Anaheim Convention Center. We had a very comfortable stay. The staff was very friendly and helpful, and the location just a 10-minute walk to the convention center. We especially liked the ease of the underground parking, the daily hot breakfast and the two free water bottles provided. We also received a free upgrade to our room which was a pleasant surprise. We would definitely stay again. Thank you Hyatt House!
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary: We didn't get the room that we booked for! We stayed there for a 5 night and our room didn't get any cleaning services, front desk says that is a hotel  policy that they replace blankets, trash bags and everything else after day six of visit! And if you want everything change we have to do it on our own!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything was clean, efficient, and a great price.  We were very happy with the location and breakfast options.  The price was excellent considering we had a fully stocked kitchen.  After having done much research and staying at a few neighbouring hotels, we will keep coming back to Hyatt House.
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located by Disneyland. Lots of food options nearby within walking distance. Breakfast was okay - nothing special. Parking lot does have EV chargers but it was used most of the time. Hotel was very clean.
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary: Originally booked a three night stay at another hotel and had a bad check in/ room cleanliness situation.  Booked the Hyatt house via the app with no problem. Joey at the front desk was so nice and understanding and was even able to allow checkin before normal time.  Entire Hotel staff was nice and accommodating. It’s a Disneyland area hotel so families and excited  children are to be expected. Great location with a number of restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary Heading: excellent location, good room, fast check in and check out
Summary: I went to natural products expo this year and I could definitely come back every year.  excellent location, good room, fast check in and check out  things to work out: healthier options in breakfast  room cleaning everyday
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary: My dad and I stayed here for a hockey game at the Honda Center. Of course, being so close to Disney, there were a lot of families and kids staying at this hotel. The hotel is located on a main street amongst several other hotels. There is a charge for parking in the garage. Our room was a good size and had a kitchen, though we were at the very end of a hallway and a decent walk away from the elevator. As I said before, lots of families and as a result, lots of kid noises (crying, yelling, running around). I have two young kids at home so I get it. Breakfast was included and was good, although the unsupervised kids running amok got a little annoying. The hotel does try to limit the chaos by having staff serve the hot food (eggs, sausage, potatoes). We did need to sit far away
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary: I recommend staying at this place if you’re planning a Disneyland trip. It’s walking distance to Disney. Complimentary breakfast is included with your stay. Walgreens is just downstairs in case you need anything like toothpaste or snacks. The staff is always great and helpful. We’re Disney pass holders and go at least once a month.
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary: Everyone was professional, helpful and polite. Beds were super comfortables. Room as also very clean and comfortable. My husband and I enjoyed our stayed, and will stay there again on our next visit to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary Heading: No recognition for the loyal Explorist Hyatt member
Summary: Nothing special here. The service was just OK and if your a Hyatt Explorist member don't expect anything special. In fact, staying at a Motel 6 might be more welcoming. No customer service and/or training to front desk staff.
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary: We got the king bunk suite for our family of 4 during a recent trip to Disneyland/California Adventure. Great location on top of a Starbucks and Walgreens, and the 10-minute walk to Disneyland was easy in the morning and still tolerable at night for my 6 and 10yos after having walked over 10 miles a day! Really great breakfast with lots of choices was a big plus. Room and bathrooms were clean and the beds comfortable. Staff were all super friendly and nice. Garage parking was easy, but incurred an additional charge. Pool and hot tub were clean and well maintained. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary: Great stay. Rooms were big and clean. Kitchenette had all amenities of a small kitchen. Island had computer hookups and was convenient as a work space. Breakfast every morning was adequate and the space was big.  Will visit again.
Manager Response: Everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. These are the types of reviews - we know - will make a huge impact on future guests choices for hotels. So, thank you for providing feedback on your personal experience with us. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2022.

Summary: This hotel offered EVERYTHING we needed for a conference of 60 people. Marina and Reina we’re great at setting up the block of rooms and conference room plan. Joey, Kiki, Kellie, Rosanna, Oscar and others were so helpful at the front desk. Ana was a great bartender. Paulina, Rey, Alma, Tomas and Ana worked so hard on the food and beverage side. Richard fixed anything that went wrong and Angel was always there to bring guests what they needed in their room.   There are dozens of food options nearby including a Starbucks on site. This was great because it minimized having to organize meals.    There are a couple things you should know:   1. The bar/lobby restaurant in only open weekdays after 5PM. This definitely put a wrench in our scheduled plan of Happy Hour/mixers and we
Manager Response: Thank you so much for everyone, Jill D, it was an absolute pleasure working with you!

Summary Heading: the refrigerator wasn't working well and no change in breakfast menu
Summary: the refrigerator wasn't working well and no change in breakfast menu while we were staying at that hotel for 7 days. Our food was trashed after 3 days of keeping them inside refrigerator even though we complained about the refrigerator earlier. They said it was working fine. We knew it was not! Not satisfied with the overall experience compared to hyatt house level.
Manager Response: Good evening, Md Ali M, thank you for completing a survey regarding your stay. We are glad to see everyone enough their stay!

Summary: This is an excellent hotel that provides incredible Service . It’s very clean and the employees are very responsive . The breakfast was amazing with excellent service. Margarita provided outstanding service to my family and made our stay very memorable . We will definitely be returning back to this hotel .
Manager Response: Good evening! Thank you for choosing our hotel! We hope everyone had a great time while staying us.

Summary Heading: Great hotel walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: We will definitely stay here again!! Rooms were very spacious, modern, and clean. Staff was very courteous and accommodating. Free breakfast and there is a Starbucks and a Walgreen downstairs  as well incase you need any last minute items.  Only a 15 minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Good evening, A8886TWamyv, thank you for spending your time with us! We hope that everyone had a fun time!

Summary: Hotel staff was nice and rooms and common areas were clean. Short walk to Disney which was great for our trip. Lots of food options near by and Walgreens was right downstairs which was a major plus. It was kind of a bummer that there is still no housekeeping services so whenever we asked for more towels or soap or anything we had to wait for it to be brought up. Not a huge deal as they were fast but I could see it being more of an issue if it took a while for someone to come up. Breakfast was great! Margarita who worked in the cafe was there 3 out of our 5 days and she was always so friendly and smiling. Nice to see a friendly face in the mornings. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Good evening, KylaST, thank you for sharing your experience with us and potential future guests. We hope that you and your family enjoyed every part of your vacation.

Summary: This was our 3rd time staying here. We enjoy staying at this location because of the convenience of everything nearby. We love the kitchen/apt feel. We did have trouble with pool area due to a parent letting their child in their with no diaper they had to close down the pool. But, the front desk were accommodating and got it fixed the very next day. Thanks to Oscar the supervisor he was able to help us out with our child who has special needs. We will continue staying here for our future visits.
Manager Response: Good evening, Mafuahayes, thank you for completing a survey on behalf of HH Anaheim. We hope that everyone had a great time at the parks!

Summary: We had a nice stay here. It's around 1 hour from LA, and very close to Disney. The rooms were clean, and had amenities as advertised. The breakfast didn't have that many options for vegetarian people.
Manager Response: Good afternoon Darthvader_7, thank you for staying with us and letting us know how your stay went. We hope everyone enjoyed their time with us!

Summary Heading: Overall services are great, checking in a disappointment
Summary: The hotel is a great place to stay, rooms are good to fit any need, beds comfortable and cleaning is excellent.  Breakfast is simple, but great flavor and staff is super friendly.   Sadly, the check-in process was below the standard; at 16:00 is really the latest check-in time I've seen in any hotel around the world, and still, they managed to deliver the room 35 minutes later.  Would still recommend, is a great location to visit the parks.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, elmkw,  Thank you for sharing your feedback with our team. While we provide the 16:00 check-in time, we also provide the 12:00 pm check out, so there is a bit of give and take there. I hope you were able to enjoy the extra hour at the end of your stay!

Summary: I give this hotel an excellent ratings.  I thought the whole experience was excellent overall from check in to breakfast and customer service.  Would highly recommend this hotel in the future.  The pool was nice and the suite had everything we needed for our trip.
Manager Response: Good evening, bickmdk, thank you for sharing your experience with us during your stay. We hope that you and your family were able to enjoy the area.

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay near Disney
Summary: There are not many properties that have the suite option, and this hotel does. It is so helpful when you have kids!! Very close to the park and restaurants. Very clean and helpful staff. The breakfast was very good, and had lots of options. I appreciated having a hot breakfast. There are plenty of elevators to service all the guests, so we didn't have to wait long to get to where we needed.
Manager Response: Good evening, Kristal S,  Thank you for choosing our hotel and staying with us. We hope that you had a wonderful time with us and enjoyed the area as well!

Summary: If you want to stay in a room that has doors LITERALLY coming off the hinges, this is the place for you. If you love the experience of sleeping in a sewer, this place is for you. When their sewage pipe breaks, the best they got for you is to spray febreze.   Watch your bill closely too. Somehow, the things that happened to our bill came as a surprise that they didn't understand.
Manager Response: Good evening, joenruschia,  Thank you for sharing your concerns and experience with us. We are so sorry that you were with us during the emergency situation that occurred on the night of 02/18. We have issued the correct compensation for guests staying that night because after we found out it was a major issue - we felt this was only appropriate for us to do so.

Summary Heading: A nice hotel, but currently not well maintained or managed
Summary: I had a great first impression when the hotel texted me, prior to arrival, to welcome me and ask if I had any questions. Upon arrival, we waited about 20 minutes in line to check in. Upon check-in, we were informed that rooms would only be cleaned every 5th day (COVID-19 reasons). This should have been addressed during booking rather than leaving the front desk person to deliver the bad news. This meant occasional field trips to ask cleaning staff for new towels or shampoo.  On the 3rd day of our stay, there was some sort of sewage leak, in the parking garage, that made the hallways smell so bad I nearly threw up (thankfully I was wearing a mask). Fortunately, the ventilation system kept the smell out of the individual rooms. While the smell began in early morning, management
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed Feb 21 - 25.  When we arrived, hotel seemed very nice and clean.  Got to our room and we opened the sleeper sofa, dirt and crumbs had fallen on to the bedding.  So it hadn't been changed prior to our visit.  As others noted, the room isn't cleaned until you have stayed for 5 days.  That is a long time for nobody to come in your room to do anything.  Garbage, towels, etc.  When we were leaving, we put our dishes in the dishwasher, and there were already dishes in there, so again, this was not emptied prior to our visit.  When we encountered staff, they were all very friendly, and breakfast service was good.  Overall, very disappointed in this hotel considering what we paid for "service".
Manager Response: Hi, thomaslP6364UP, thank you for submitting feedback for us. I would love to follow up with you further about your negative experience with us. It sounds like we failed to provide exceptional hospitality and for that, we want to apologize.   While we are only servicing after the 5th night, all our guests are encouraged to communicate with our front desk team to get what they need to be sent to their room. We hope that you had a wonderful stay with us otherwise.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland but over priced
Summary: We stayed at the Hyatt recently while going to Disneyland. The room we were in faced Disney so we were able to see the fireworks from our room. This was nice. We were very close to the Disney park so we’re able to walk there every day. Good points of the hotel: good breakfast, nice staff, distance from Disney Poor points: over priced, room needed new carpet (had holes), in 6 days the room wasn’t cleaned once
Manager Response: Hi GeraldJ190, thank you very much for spending your time in Anaheim with us. Thank you for mentioning items that require our attention in your feedback for us. Please, in the future, let us know after the fifth night, if you need full service. Currently, that is what we can offer to our guests. We hope that you had a wonderful stay with us.

Summary: Location is very convenient. Having Walgreens right next is very useful. Disney parks and restaurants are all walkable. Breakfast is okay and saves some time and money in the morning. Kitchen with all appliances is helpful.
Manager Response: Great Arunasuren, thank you for sharing what you liked about your stay with us. We hope that you and your family had a wonderful time at the Disney parks and in our hotel.

Summary: Everything about our stay was wonderful! Beds were comfortable. Room was quiet. Breakfast was good. Hotel staff was incredibly nice & helpful! Parking was reasonably priced. The location was excellent!
Manager Response: Good afternoon, 190nicholel, thank you for spending your time in our area with us. We are so happy to hear you were able to fully utilize what we have to offer. It is our hope that you and your family had a wonderful stay.

Summary Heading: Very nice, easy walk to Disney
Summary: Friendly/helpful staff and very clean facilities / room, with easy access - 10-minute walk north on Harbor Blvd to eastside security gate at Disney. Across the street from Garden Walk outdoor mall with decent food options and some fun entertainment. Room with bunks was great for our family of 4 (6 & 2 year old)...and would fit up to 6 close family members pretty comfortably. Made some suggestions to Hyatt on improving the family suites w/ bunk better for those w/ small children –– non-auto-close bathroom door, blackout windows on sliding doors dividing rooms to keep out light from main bedroom during naps, adding a hand-vac for quick clean0-ups) –– definitely not deal-breakers, tho, just suggestions.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, pshawnirvin, thank you for choosing our hotel for your stay. We are delighted to hear that everyone enjoyed their stay. Thank you for sharing some valuable suggestions with us.

Summary: Our experience had a rough start, a sewer line/pump had ruptured in the underground parking garage, and the smell in there  was unbearable,  luckily the smell was not noticeable inside the room or  in the restaurant.  I had two connected rooms. Rooms are spacious, clean and well maintained, nice to have the kitchenette and the sofa bed in case you need it. Less than Expected  wear and tear for a hotel this close to Disney, lobby and dining area are nice.  Some COVID restrictions were still in place, no daily maid services and limited breakfast options (staff will serve eggs / sausage / French toast for you) and you have your basic oatmeal, apple, bananas, bread and cereal options.  What looked like an average stay was turned into an great experience by one of the staff members
Manager Response: Good afternoon Nomad31658072964, thank you for your time in submitting a survey for us. We want to sincerely apologize for the hard situation caused by maintenance on the grease trap on property. The smell that was throughout the hotel was horrible to be sure. Thank you for pointing out our valued team member, Margarita. We agree, she is amazing - and we will make sure she knows you thought so highly of her hospitality.

Summary: We ended up at Hyatt House due to our original hotel not being up to our standard. Glad we made the move. Rooms were spacious, clean and comfortable. Staff was amazing to deal with. After a day at the park it was nice to relax in the room and take a dip in the pool and hot tub.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time with us, Daina L. We are so delighted to hear you were able to enjoy the amenities we have to offer. Have a great rest of the year, Daina L.

Summary Heading: Joey at front desk was great!
Summary: The front desk staff was friendly and very courteous. Joey made our Valentines day special! upgraded the room and made the whole trip very memorable. Absolutly will be back to enjoy a great and special stay!
Manager Response: Hi there, roberthA389AU, thank you very much for your kind words. I am very happy to hear back from you in the form of a review. Everyone at HH Anaheim hopes that you had a wonderful time with your loved ones.

Summary: The Hyatt House is excellent for visiting the Disney Parks. Nice big rooms, kitchen and bathroom. Plenty of spacious underground parking. Very nice and friendly staff. We alway enjoy our stay at the Hyatt properties in Anaheim
Manager Response: Thank you for your time and loyalty to Hyatt, damcfarl. We work as a team to deliver the best hospitality that we can. We hope everyone enjoyed their stay with us.

Summary Heading: Stay Here if your family is going to Disneyland!
Summary: Wonderful staff, clean hotel, comfortable beds, nicely appointed kitchen, walking distance to Disneyland.  Great breakfast, stroller rentals. Walgreens, Starbucks and Pizza downstairs.  Can't say enough about this hotel - everything you would want when traveling with kids.
Manager Response: Hi there, S6443GQlindar, thank you for your time in submitting a review for us. We are very happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us while visiting the parks. We always try to help even after check out - remember, check your bags, leave the car, and enjoy your last day in the area - if you would like.

Summary: One block from Disneyland and family friendly. We had two rooms. One had a separate room with bunk beds and kitchenette. The other was a suite with a larger kitchen, two queen beds and a sofa bed. The sofa bed was so uncomfortable but the room as large and we were able to fit all seven of us in here for meals. The other room worked perfectly for my son’s family as he had a separate room for his toddler. Pool and spa were nice although we didn’t spend much time there. They had BBQ grills available which could be nice for a family. It’s an easy walk to Disneyland. Walgreens, Starbucks and Blaze Pizza are right below the rooms on the lobby level.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, L6157KLannag, we were happy to accommodate you. It is a real joy to hear you were able to utilize the amenities we offer and the area we are located. We hope that everyone enjoyed their time in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary: Great location for Disneyland. Easy walk to and from with Walgreens and CVS next door. Plenty of food options as well. The only thing we need to contact the front desk for was more towels and toilet paper due to the current room cleaning every 5 days due to covid. This wasn't a problem though
Manager Response: Hi, azweaver, thank you for staying with us and leaving us some feedback to build on. We are happy to hear our front desk team was able to assist with what you needed in the room in lieu of housekeeping services.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Hyatt.  The staff is super friendly and everyone took great care of us.  The breakfast was good also.  In the spirit of Disneyland resort, this place rocks.  It’s a good place for family of any age
Manager Response: Good morning, Discover297639, thank you for taking the time to submit feedback for us and for staying with us. We hope you had an exceptional stay with us.

Summary: very pleasant. enough parking underground. parking spaces were spacious. room was clean.. a little small. but comfortable. seating area was great for relaxing. refrigerator and microwave were very useful! hotel was very quiet — which was nice. staff was friendly and accommodated my early check in request!
Manager Response: Good morning, jsebastian5, thank you for sharing your experience with us and our future guests. We hope that you had a wonderful time while visiting the attractions nearby.

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel room for Disneyland Trip
Summary: Overall it was a great hotel, we got the Queen bed Suite so it came with a kitchen which was convenient. They provided us with extra towels and sheets which was great. The down side is on the sofa-bed it fits 2 people but only 1 person could fit and it was extremely uncomfortable to sleep on.
Manager Response: Good morning, natnn1021, thank you for sharing your experience with us and sharing what you liked and disliked. These notes are extremely important for our improvement and success. We hope you enjoyed your stay otherwise.

Summary: This Hyatt was perfect for our Disney visit! The rooms are spacious and the beds were so comfy! The lobby is beautiful and the game room/lounge space was a nice addition. Pool area is great and they have grills guests can use! The hotel is about two blocks, or a ten minute walk to Disneyland, which is perfect for us. Close enough to be an easy walk and see the fireworks at night but just far enough away to be quiet and cozy.
Manager Response: Good morning, liseyb2022, thank you for staying with us! We hope that you and your family enjoyed your vacation with us.

Summary: Not recommended.  Do not stay at this hotel if you have any kind of allergy.  The staff is not compliant with your requests.  the front desk is employed with young adults that say one thing and do another.
Manager Response: Hi, chrisJ686TK, I am so sorry to hear you had a negative stay with HP Anaheim, our sister property. We take the allergy notes recorded by guests seriously at HH Anaheim. We hope that is evident when staying with us.

Summary: Great value for visiting Disneyland.  15 min walk to entrance, very nice hotel with soft beds and newer finishes.  Free breakfast that is sufficient and the kitchen staff were super nice.  The parking is pricey ($25/night) but worth it to be so close.  Walgreens on corner and pool is nice for kids.  Highly recommend
Manager Response: Hi, MGWSF, Thank you so much for staying with us and leaving us valuable feedback. We hope that you enjoyed your time with us.

Summary Heading: Convenient and walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed in a connecting room suite. Great amount of space for a family with children or another family. Breakfast was accommodating for specific diets/allergies. All items in working order. Used laundry facilities as well. Coin operated. The only con was the carpeting needs a good cleaning as our sock test left some gray on them. Close to Disneyland and a good modest 18min walk. Easy and plentiful parking.
Manager Response: Good morning, smile702, thank you for allowing us to accommodate you during your stay. We hope that everyone enjoyed their time in Anaheim.

Summary: Clean hotel located within a 15 minute walk from Disneyland. There is an underground parking area for $24 a day, which was nice. Parking spots may be limited though, so be prepared. I was there at 8am on a Saturday morning and got lucky when someone was just pulling out. The breakfast is fine and we loved that we could eat in the semi outdoor patio area away from other people and germs.
Manager Response: Hi, Cindi G, thank you for staying with us and leaving us feedback regarding your most recent stay. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: As always, this is hands down the best off-site Disney hotel option!!! Always immaculate, ample parking, great hot breakfast and waters upon check in. Staff are always so helpful and kind, love the kitchens in the rooms and love that Starbucks is downstairs- not to mention the drugstore in case you run out of wine! Honestly it’s a gem of a hotel amongst a lot of shabby and overrated others. Will always only stay here when not on site!
Manager Response: Good morning, Lauren C, thank you so much for submitting feedback regarding your most recent stay with us. We are so happy to hear everyone enjoyed their time with us.

Summary: If all goes as planned, most reservations are painless.  It’s been difficult to follow up afterwards via the phone and operators are difficult to understand.  This text character minimum is also very frustrating as a person who wants to keep texts to a minimum.
Manager Response: Hi there, lalvarez27, great point about the texting option. Please note you can always request to have texting limited or removed. We hope that you and your family were able to enjoy your time with us.

Summary: Stayed here for a quick trip Disney. It was an easy walk to the park. Our room was comfortable and clean. Customer service was top notch! We will definitely stay here again for future Disney trips. Having a Starbucks and Walgreens so close was an added bonus
Manager Response: Great to hear, Bresund! Thank you for staying with us and letting us know what you liked most. We hope you have a wonderful 2022.

Summary: Stayed 4 nights as part of package with our Disney tickets. We opted for the 2 bed kitchen suite. It was great to have the beds in a separate room !!! My wife and daughter would go to sleep early early after spending all day at the parks and I could get work done and not bother them at all. The full kitchen was stocked with silverware, dishes, microwave, toaster, even dish washer detergent! The continental breakfast every morning was great, all of the staff were very friendly and accommodating, close to restaurants and convenient stores.  If I had to list any complaints I have 2: 1: after walking to the park and walking around all day we would have to Uber back (although it’s only 1/2 mile walk we averaged 8 miles of walking a day) we were spent. My point is it would be nice if
Manager Response: Grea to hear, F2058DQjohng, thank you for spending your time in Anaheim with us. We sincerely hope everyone had a great time with us and at the parks!

Summary: A bit over due.  My family of 6 stayed here this past November.  The hotel was nice and it was great that we were able to sleep 6 of us in one room!  Lots of places require 2 rooms for this size family.  The room was clean and big enough that we were not crashing into one another.  Breakfast was included and was great!  A variety of items to choose from and not just a cold bagel, what other hotels advertise as continental. Margarita, who works at the restaurant was wonderful!  She was very  friendly and greeted us with a smile every morning.  The hotel was a 12-13 min walk to Disneyland.  Not too bad.  We will definitely be returning!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your family trip time with us, 729judyv. We are so happy to hear you all were able to make it out to the Disney parks together! After the time we are having, we all could use some family time, right? We hope you had a wonderful stay.

Summary: Thin blankets, flat pillows, AC vents very dusty, lack of toiletries and services, very noisy rooms, constant loud water pipes and doors slamming all night. Just not a good quality experience like I have at the Hilton hotels
Manager Response: Good morning, jramos808, thank you for submitting a survey on our behalf. We want to thank you for sharing your experience with us so that we may improve. We hope you were able to enjoy your time in our area.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay with large group. So close walking distance to Disneyland.
Summary: Room size is comfortable for 3-4 adults. Breakfast have limited choices but fillings. Wish they have yogurt and more bread choices. On-site Parking is a plus. Wish they have more food choices near by.
Manager Response: everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. Summary: Our family of four stayed in a one-bedroom Queen suite with a view for a Disneyland vacation. The pros: great room with plenty of space with about a 12–minute walk to Disneyland (with a 10 and six year old). Free breakfast with eggs, sausage, cereal, toast, and fruit each day with a rotation of either hash browns (tater tots) or pancakes. The con: the rooms with a view of the park are quite noisy from Katella and Harbor Blvd.  The staff was great and we will definitely consider a stay here again if we end up back in the area.  Thanks Hyatt!

I’m an event planner and I travel internationally, this is the absolute worst hotel I’ve ever stayed in.  Good luck!

Summary Heading: Great location to Disneyland but arrive at least 1 hour after the promised check-in time to actually check-in.
Summary: I've stayed at Hyatt House several times over the last 7 to 8 years and I've seen it change over the years. Location and convenience are still the biggest reasons we choose to stay here. The walk to the Disneyland entrance is still the biggest plus and not to mention that Walgreens and Starbucks are nearby. The biggest issue I and many other guests had upon check in was that our rooms weren't ready when promised. There was no compensation except telling all of us that our rooms hadn't been cleaned yet. After traveling all morning and most of the afternoon, we just wanted a room to crash in. I wish I'd known this was an issue because I would've timed things better and booked later flights to accommodate Hyatt's lack of missing their own company promise.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Families close to Disneyland!!!
Summary: Everyone was extremely nice and welcoming!! It was a short walk to Disneyland and great amenities surrounding the hotel. Sufficient free breakfast that had a little something for everyone. The website said it was a heated pool but it was definitely a little chilly. There was enough room for our family of 5, which we greatly appreciated!! There is a full kitchen that worked out great to help save cost on a few meals. I understand the limited room service but miss having the floors vacuumed and trash emptied. They even had strollers and electric scooters available in the lobby for rent. We didn’t utilize this service but thought it was a great thing to offer for families. Overall, I would absolutely recommend this hotel for Disney focused families and will stay here again for

Summary Heading: No housekeeping, no supplies, poor service
Summary: Stayed for 4 nights in a one bedroom suite with a kitchen.  There is a 5 night minimum to get housekeeping service.  Only one bar of soap for the bathroom and kitchen.  No dish soap for the sink and no detergent for the dishwasher.  Had to argue with the front desk staff to get an additional bar of soap and extra shampoo.  Would be easier to pack your own.  The hotel hallways looked (and smelled) like a city street on trash day as people set their trash out for collection.  Be prepared to dodge pizza boxes and trash bags of used diapers on your way down to breakfast.

Summary Heading: Margarita and breakfast crew is AWESOME!
Summary: Great start to the day, even when you wake up late and they’re closed, Margarita saves the day and let’s you in anyway. If I didn’t grab breakfast for the fam it would have been a classic dad blunder. Super friendly staff that treat you like family.  Excellent service!

We discovered dry blood stains on the duvet insert which means the bedding had not been changed from the day/night before. Yuck. I would not recommend this location at all. Sadly.

Summary: Our suite was a good size for a family of 5. It was nice to have a kitchen area for sure. Beds were comfy, bathroom nice and big. Sofa bed was a typical sofa bed, not very comfy and we had to ask for bedding as there was only a sheet on it. But that bedding and extra towels came quickly. Breakfast was ok. It was hot and included which was nice but it was plain. Sausages and eggs everyday, would have been nice to switch it up. Third item was always changing, tater tots, French toast or waffles, all of these were pretty gross. There was toast, cereal and oatmeal  offered as well. Location was perfect. Elevators were asked to be one family only but there were 4 so we never had to wait long. Garbage was picked up daily outside the room, we never had our room cleaned while we were

Warm breakfast was good too with options to pick from, I did a pre check in to leave my luggage before coming back to our room from our Disney trip, and I was able to check out an hour later.

Summary: We stayed at the Hyatt House Anaheim Convention Center to take advantage of their great location and proximity to Disneyland. I really love Hyatt properties and this one was great. It’s about a 12-15 min walk to Disneyland, but i think it’s one of the nicest hotels within that walking distance. The complimentary breakfast was quick and efficient and a great start to our early mornings before trekking it to the parks. Another great perk was having the Walgreens basically on-property. We definitely needed to make a few trips there during our week and it was only like 30 steps door-to-door.  The staff was awesome and were great to make things right when we had a couple issues come up. As always, our rooms were clean and spacious and we felt safe and respected with staff and most

We were able to walk back to the hotel for an afternoon nap and get back to the park without driving which saves you from paying to parking at Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Nice property - but watch out for clear communication about what is included
Summary: Clean, feel safe, close to Disneyland, breakfast was fairly good.  Only thing when we checked in we were told parking was included (I was surprised and I repeated, "really, parking is included?" and he said, "yes." We could have parked at my sisters who lives a few blocks away however since I was told it was free, I parked at the their lot.  Well, parking is not free!!!

Summary Heading: Great for families and reservations of up to 5
Summary: We reserved and stayed in the family suite with the two bunk beds, sofa sleeper, and King bed. There's a microwave and fridge.  Everyone here is super nice!  The breakfast is a fast. Parking is underground. I highly recommend to get a room right near the elevators. Ours was at the end of the floor (5th) next to the stairs. We had to walk another 5 mins to our room. There are no stairs from the garage to the floors.   The elevators are super slow. If you do not have your room key, you won't go anywhere even if you have your mobile checking device.  The staff works so hard especially when there are hundreds going through the hotel. It's right down the street to Disneyland. To walk to Disneyland, I would recommend to walk cross the street on the right and stay to the right until
Manager Response: Good afternoon afgam, everyone here at Hyatt House would like to sincerely thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and your detailed feedback. Summary: It is about 10 minutes walking distance from the hotel to Disney. The hotel is great. Staff are friendly and the room is comfortable and clean. The only thing is there are not many choices about the restaurants close to the hotel

Summary: Hotel was very clean, roomy, and family friendly environment. Staff was courteous and attentive. We had the family suite and the kids loved the bunk beds. Good breakfast every morning. Close to disney parks about 15-20min walk including going through security.

Summary: Wasn’t really impressed or satisfied with the lady who helped check us in, she was rude. Other than that the room was nice and clean, pillows weren’t the greatest but we just asked for extra pillows.

Summary: We stayed 4 nights and added an extra day to stay at Disneyland. We never heard anything until after 4 which was normal check in time. We had to ask for towels every night and had trash piled up in our room. The carpet was frayed with super long strings in our hotel near the bathroom door. Carpet looked so nasty and dirty. There was a hair in the bath tub when we arrived. Close proximity to Disneyland which was nice. Breakfast was average for continental. Staff for breakfast was very nice and gave our daughter a balloon which she loved!

We were in an adjoining room and didn’t hear a peep from the people next to us (they were there though, we’ve seen them). The hotel is about a 10 minute walk to the park, 4 minute lyft ride; just know that there are cheaper/better options closer to the Disneyland attractions.

Summary Heading: Great location good value great service
Summary: Awesome location for Disney. Short walk made it easy even with kids. Rooms were plain but clean and spacious.  Staff was VERY helpful and friendly. Breakfast was simple but good. They had eggs and sausage daily with either pancakes or French toast sticks, along with fruit, breads/toast cereal, oatmeal juices milk etc. Pull out bed mattress was awful, kids opted to sleep on regular couch instead. Kitchen was nicely laid out and had simply stocked with plates, cups and cooking wares. Only cleaned rooms every 5 days, so had to put out garbage and ask for towels occasionally. Pool and hot tub are outside but nice enough. Overall great value.

Summary: We frequently visit Disneyland as we are year pass holders. Hyatt House is supposed to be one of the higher quality good neighbor hotels near Disneyland. Unfortunately, I have to disagree as I’ve stayed a number of hotels that are nicer and less expensive.   Pros-We were able to check in early/ Breakfast included in your stay/ Variety of room choices/8 minute walk to Disney.  Cons-Some of these are probably specific to the room we had.  •Dirty piece of toilet paper stuck to wall in restroom  •Dried green streak running down shower wall. (I cleaned it myself with Clorox wipes so that’s just negligence) •When running shower, bath still runs so you get to stand in your dirty soapy water while showering  •I understand Covid protocols, but this hotel policies are pretty bad.

Summary: When my now-husband and I were first engaged 5 years ago, we took a celebratory trip to Disney and booked a room with Hyatt House. Now, five years on, we decided to take the same trip again as a fun little stress break from this crazy year. We booked Hyatt House again because we knew it was clean, safe, and close to Disney… and I’m so glad we did! The staff were so welcoming and kind. They even provided us a complimentary bottle of wine and balloons to celebrate our little anniversary together. We were treated with care and kindness. Rooms are clean, private, and — even close to the park on a holiday weekend — quiet. Thoughtful touches made all the difference. Hoping to make this hotel part of our traditional anniversary trip.

Summary Heading: Disorganized staff and lack of cleanliness
Summary: The breakfast staff was outstanding. They were on top everything. My family just wishes everyone would follow their lead. Halls and hotel entry were full of garbage. Dirty bedding and towels also in hallways. Garbage in halls included dirty diapers. Visually impaired daughter had a hard time navigating.  Pool was very cold with no lights after dark.  Not that close to Disney 25+ min with lights. No bedding for pullout…said they had none. Struggle to get. Plates don’t fit in microwave. Room set up for 4.
