Summary: We have stayed at the Hyatt House many times. The rooms were clean, but this time we had a couple of issues. We were told we would get the 4th night out of our 5 nights a house keeper. That was not done. On our first night there, we arrived around 10:30 or 11:00 at night. I had a king bed and a pull out couch. My grandkids slept on the pull out. There was only a sheet. There was no blanket or no blanket in the closet. I called to request a blanket and they told me they were out of them for the night. I asked them, isn't there suppose to be a blanket with the bed? And she said, yes but they were out. I could not believe it. My grandkids slept with a sheet and we covered them with towels. They did not say a thing to me when I told them this the next morning. They did send us a
Manager Response: Good evening hawaiigal59,  Thank you very much for letting us know where we fell short. This information is critical for us to make improvements. I will make sure to review with our front desk and housekeeping staff to prevent these types of inconveniences from happening to you or anyone else. I am deeply sorry you had to go through this during your stay. We hope you have a wonderful 2021 holiday season!

Summary: Stayed at this location during Thanksgiving week and completely enjoyed our stay. This property is well maintained and very clean. All the staff is very friendly and hard working,   We were greeted by Oscar at the front desk where he efficiently got us checked in and happily answered all our questions.   In the breakfast area it was amazing. Margarita made sure we had everything we needed plus treated us like family,Rey and Ana served us delicious food with a smile, great upbeat attitude making us feel very welcome, while Ibeth (hope I got that name correct) never stopped cleaning and resupplying.   The staff was just the best, very good ambassadors for your company.  We will be back and tell others, thank you for the great service.  Bill and Maureen Bailey
Manager Response: Good evening D5388XSbillb,  Thank you so much for shouting our Margarita in your review! She gets so many guests mentioning her name, but we will definitely let her know that she impacted your stay so positively! We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2021 holiday season.

Summary: We stayed at the hotel while on an overnight trip. The check in and check out process was smooth and the room was clean. The morning hot breakfast was an added bonus for our stay. The room itself was larger than most other hotels.
Manager Response: Good evening 258howardc,  Thank you very much for sharing your feedback regarding your most recent stay with us. We hope that you enjoyed your stay and got to do everything you planned for the area. Have a wonderful and safe 2021 holiday season.

Summary: Check in process was easy, nice that breakfast is included.  The overall condition of the hotel is just OK.  The proximity to the park is just about a 10-15 minute walk.  Very con  There are definitely better hotels in the area for around the same price or cheaper.
Manager Response: Good evening jessicajoyr,  Thank you for completing a survey regarding your most recent stay with us. We are sorry to hear your experience was less than exceptional with us. We hope you have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary Heading: The best hotel we have stayed at.
Summary: We go to Disneyland at least twice a year and we like to try different hotels.  This is the best one so far! Everyone was so friendly and it was very close to the park.  The room was awesome and the breakfast was so good!
Manager Response: Good morning Claudia R,  Thank you so much for leaving us feedback regarding your most recent stay! It is so nice to hear that our guests are enjoying their stays. We hope you all have a wonderful and safe 2021 holiday season!

Summary: This was our first trip with kids to Disneyland and it was fantastic! It was so nice to be able to walk back-and-forth twice each day and come back for naps. We did five days in the parks so we could have an easy pace with little kids. Having a swimming pool in the hotel was very important to us and it was so restorative! I absolutely love that the front desk allows stroller rentals to be picked up and dropped off.  It was waiting for us when we checked in.  We took advantage of the nearby places to grab food and we loved the breakfast provided by the hotel each morning.  We appreciated being allowed to carry our breakfast back to our room! I booked the hotel through a travel agent and told her the wrong  check-in date (one day too early).  I realized my mistake after receiving
Manager Response: Good morning saralynnwarby,  Thank you so much for allowing us to accommodate you and your entire family. We hope that you were all able to do everything you planned at the parks. We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2021 holiday season!

Summary: We booked this hotel as our kick off point to our Disney vacation. We were happy with the experience. The breakfast was good and we were glad that they were serving it again. Many of the reviews said they stopped for a while. The hotel was 7/10ths of a mile from the Disney Park. It does not sound very far, but at the end of a long day it can feel like a long ways. He most negative thing about the whole experience was that they only gave you one room cleaning if you stayed 5 days or more. You could towels and garbage take out any time, but the room did get pretty dirty. The hotel was next to a Walgreens and close to plenty of restaurants to include Cheesecake Factory. I would y recommend this Hotel
Manager Response: Good morning michaelsU4591KE,  Thank you so much for highlighting what you felt stood out during your stay! We are really happy to see you enjoyed your visit with us. We hope everyone was able to do everything they planned at the Disney parks. Have a wonderful 2021 holiday season!

Summary: Everything was perfect! Staff was fantastic at accommodating our large party and ensuring our rooms were right next to each other. The beds were very comfortable and rooms were very spacious. Breakfast was great all 3 days we were there!
Manager Response: Good morning 691rebeccam.  Thank you for completing a review regarding your most recent stay with us. We are so happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your vacation to the Disney area with us! We hope you were able to do everything you planned at the parks. Have a wonderful 2021 holiday season!

Summary: Wonderful place for family with great breakfast to get started in the morning. Safe and convenient walk to the park. Very helpful and friendly staff. Easy access from freeway and park entrance. Rooms are spacious and have full kitchen which is helpful to make lunch before going into park.
Manager Response: Good evening 34788shelly,  Thank you so much for staying with us here at Hyatt House! We are so happy to hear everyone enjoyed their stay with us. Please, have a safe and wonderful 2021 holiday season!

Summary: I booked my room in advance asking for a room next to the elevator when I checked in I was told that my room was now upgraded. The upgraded room was not much different, just was a door into the bedroom. The bedroom door couldn’t be open while the bathroom door was open and vice versa. There were only two USB plugs in the room and the plugs that were located on the nightstand lamp did not work, this made it difficult to charge our phones and other devices by our bedside. The carpet exiting the bathroom was raggedy, stringy, torn up. I moves the curtains once the black out curtains immediately came out of the tracks and already had ever seen evidence of tears.  The convenience of having a full kitchen is worth the price difference of other hotels in the area . The convenience of
Manager Response: Good evening MeAndMyAndrews,  Thank you so much for your feedback and for staying with us! Your notes are something I can definitely take down and bring to our department heads so that they can focus down on the issues you faced in the room. Thank you for informing us and allowing us to accommodate you during your vacation! We hope you have a wonderful and safe 2021 holiday season!

Summary: Great time in Anaheim on short notice. The upgrade for being a Hyatt rewards member and the great location and service were awesome!  The suite was clean and well appointed.  I thoroughly enjoyed my time.
Manager Response: Good evening Scenic696689,  Thank you so much for staying with us and highlighting things that positively impacted your stay! We hope that you have a wonderful and safe 2021 holiday season!

Summary: Had a great time and stay here! We had a room with bunks for the kids, and they loved it. Had a great breakfast spread every morning that was included. It was perfect for walking up the street to Disneyland. Great location connected to a Starbucks and Walgreens, and walking distances to restaurants for dinner. I do recommend!
Manager Response: Good evening daniellehP9625KL,  Thank you so much for submitting feedback on our hotel and your recent stay with us! We are so happy to see everyone enjoyed their stay. We hope that you all have a wonderful 2021 holiday season!

Summary Heading: Every visit it gets a little worse.
Summary: Visited x4 to this Hotel, x2 this year alone. Every time I go it's dirtier and this time the staff member I dealt with was ....WOW.... Not great IDK?  Never gave me anything told me anything had to go back several times and finally called afterwards. The rooms are great IF there clean. With in walking distance to Disney and the Convention Center and other area attractions. Worth a chance for the $$, there trying to improve.
Manager Response: Good evening sharronkepler,  Thank you so much for submitting feedback regarding your most recent stay and for letting us know where we fell short. Even bad feedback is good feedback in our book because it gives us the opportunity to pinpoint areas we need to focus on. I know we spoke at length already, but thank you again for spending your vacation with us. I am very sorry for the inconveniences and please rest assure I will follow up with our agents. We hope you have a wonderful 2021 holiday season!

Summary Heading: Great Rooms and BETTER STAFF!!!!  Thank you Samantha and Joey!!!!!
Summary: The rooms are very clean and it is wonderful to have appliances in a kitchen so I can prepare my own food….. BUT….. it’s the staff that is so amazing. Samantha and Joey… thank you!!!  Samantha goes that extra mile to make sure everything is perfect. Joey was great at arranging a late check out for me.  I often stay at this Hotel as it is right across the street from where I work. So on those all-night shifts, I am at Hyatt!!! Again, thank you to Samantha and Joey this time around. :)
Manager Response: Good evening colby101105,  Thank you so much for acknowledging our service and for staying with us here at Hyatt House!! I am so happy to hear that we were able to positively impact your vacation! Please, have a safe and wonderful 2021 holiday season!

Summary: I had to create an account to log into TripAdvisor to write a review.   Oscar was kind and courteous to us.   It made our time at the front desk more pleasant. If we were ambivalent on this hotel before coming here,  Oscar made us feel like we made the right choice.   If any of his managers are reading this,  someone needs to give him a raise.
Manager Response: Good evening JerryS2534,  Thank you so much for submitting feedback regarding your recent stay with us. And thank you very much for mentioning Oscar's name! We have been working together for a couple years now and he has been consistently growing as an agent day after day! Thank you for acknowledging his service, I will definitely let him know how he positively impacted your stay!

Summary: I’m a dedicated Hyatt customer and since this is the only Hyatt brand close to The House of Blues, we stayed here. The hotel is just across the street from The House of Blues and close walking distance to Disneyland and many restaurants. We were pleasantly surprised that a “regular” breakfast was served (like Pre-COVID times). Wearing masks was optional but the majority of people wore them. There are lots of families with young children staying here because of Disneyland so do t stay here if you want quiet! Otherwise a solid Hyatt House that I recommend.
Manager Response: Good evening RealLifeTravel,  Thank you for staying with us and submitting feedback regarding your stay! We are so happy to hear you are a loyal Hyatt member. Thank you for pointing out what you enjoyed about your stay with us! Have a wonderful 2021 Holiday Season.

Summary Heading: Great hotel- very clean, modern, spacious and very close to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here with my family.  We rented two rooms, one with bunkbeds for the kids who LOVED it.  Both rooms were pristinely clean and convenient and spacious.  Love having the living room space and tables.  It was a 5 min walk to Disneyland....really conveniently located to Disneyland and all the local restaurants.  Loved it- will be staying there again
Manager Response: Thank you for submitting feedback regarding your most recent stay, New_York_Traveler_go. We hope that you enjoyed your stay and have a great 2021 holiday season!

Summary Heading: Checked out as early as I could
Summary: Arrived to the hotel around 3:00-3:30 pm.  ROom was not ready and was told check in would be at 4:00 pm. Oscar at the desk was very helpful and let us hange by the pool while we waited.  I CHecked in via the app and was assigned to 256.  nice size; clean.  when we were winding down for bed, i noticed the room felt really damp and humid.  I called down to the desk at 10 pm and I could hear the employee, but she couldnt here me on the other end.  I finally called on my cell phone.  told her about how damp it was and asked if there was anything we could do with the air condiditoning to help. She apologized and offered a point compensation for the issues.  FInallly figured out the fan NEEDED to be on to elevate the dampness-proble with that, the fan did not stay on.  WOke up the
Manager Response: Good evening sazemar,  Thank you so much for submitting a survey for your most recent visit to our hotel. I am sorry to see this stay was less than exceptional due to room issues. These are extremely important points for us to investigate to prevent from happening in the future; so, we want to thank you for bringing these issues to our attention. Have a wonderful 2021 holiday season!

Summary: I love Hyatt hotels and whenever they’re convenient it is where I will stay. We go to Disneyland a lot and have always stayed on Harbor blvd close to the park entrance. This is much more of a walk than we are used to. It is walkable but not close enough to go back for a midday break like we typically do. The benefit is there are many more restaurants accessible within a close distance from the hotel.  The hotel is clean and welcoming. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. The fridge and microwave are nice. The breakfast was good with eggs, pancakes, sausage, oatmeal, and other items the morning we were there.  Mobile key is handy although the elevators require your key to operate and it was tricky to use especially if your hands are full. The hotel is located on the corner of
Manager Response: Good evening Devin C,  Thank you for submitting a survey for your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay! Thank you for sharing your feedback for future guests to see. You made some pretty important points for us to focus on. We hope you have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary: The Hyatt HOUSE Anaheim Convention Center is what's its called . Don't forget that word HOUSE or you will wind up at the wrong Hyatt , like the one down the street. Absolutely Wonderfull. There is tons of food right out the door , no car required !!! There's a steak house across the street , Mc Cormic and Schmidt , top of the line for Rib Eye steaks my favorite. There's Bubu Gump Shrimp Company next to it . I ate there also , just fantastic !! I Highly Recommend this Hyatt House. Thanks Denis !!😄😁😉
Manager Response: Good evening Trentden,  Thank you so much for telling us what you loved about your stay and adding that ultra-critical note about looking for Hyatt HOUSE. We receive so many guests for different Hyatts, and they probably receive our guests by accident. We are glad you found us and enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Very happy here. Awesome location with lots of nearby amenities as well. You will have a great breakfast with a very friendly staff serving you. Disneyland was about a 10-15 minute walk away and there is even a Starbucks practically in the lobby.
Manager Response: Good evening jpcutty, thank you for shouting our our breakfast team! We are so proud of them because so many of our guests have complimented their service. Thank you for staying with Hyatt House, we hope you have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary Heading: Had a great time staying at Hyatt
Summary: The staff was very courteous and helpful.I also loved the free breakfast. The place is clean and orderly. When I asked for an extra blanket, they gave me not one but two. Also, the kitchen had everything we needed. The pool was also a good size. Overall, the price was reasonable. Will definitely recommend this to everybody visiting Disneylan.
Manager Response: Good evening irenevelascomft, thank you so much for your feedback! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed every bit of your stay. If there is anything else we can help you with, please let us know! Have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary: A hidden gem among other hotel around the area with a reasonable price. clean bath room and pool. I was randomly searching hotel at the last minute searching on google and found this small hotel with a starbuck, walgreen, and pizza place. its a perfect area for the family.
Manager Response: Good evening chantyyoung,  Thank you so much for your kind words and for sharing your experience with us. We happen to agree, we ARE a perfect area for the family :) We hope that you enjoyed your stay with us. Have a great 2021 holiday season.

Summary: This place is perfect for our family vacation to Disneyland. Walking distance to the park so convenient with a Walgreens, Starbucks and a pizza place below. The rooms are fantastic all the kids sleep in a little bunk room together. We can fit four kids in it. Breakfast was excellent every morning and one morning we arrived late but Margarita helped us out and got some cereal for my kids and some fresh fruit and drinks for us she was very kind and helpful!
Manager Response: Good evening krystnfaye,  Thank you so much for leaving us feedback and mentioning our team member who impacted your stay. Margarita's been with us for some time and has always gone above and beyond. Thank you for allowing us to accommodate you and staying loyal to Hyatt. We hope that you have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary: Everything was super clean all the workers were very helpful and welcoming ! They made our stay & trip very enjoyable ! They made sure whatever we needed was available ! Besides of everything going on right now with Covid I have to say it was very clean very nice ! The elevators were being cleaned mostly every time I would use it so that was a Bonus!
Manager Response: Good evening J1595BJmelissae,  Thank you so much for leaving us feedback, J1595BJmelissae. Your feedback really does help the hotel improve and stay motivated. We hope you have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel stay close to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel was exceptional.  The amenities were wonderful, but the best part of the stay were the staff.  Every single person I encountered during my stay appeared to be genuinely happy and helpful.  The staff made my daughter feel so special on her birthday, all without any requests from my family.
Manager Response: Good evening EricaVoisine,   Thank you so much for allowing us to accommodate you and your family for your stay. We know our guests have so many different options for where to stay, so thank you for choosing us. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: Great location. Within walking distance to Disneyland. Hotel was clean and beds were comfortable. Parking garage is well maintained and convenient.  Staff was very friendly. A Walgreens is in the same building and is super convenient.    We would stay again.
Manager Response: Good afternoon xHirschiClanx,  Thank you for your wonderful feedback. We hope you had a wonderful time in Anaheim. We hope to see you and your family again in the near future.

Summary: Stayed at the Anaheim Hyatt House for a trip to Disneyland. We have stayed here before but things seem to have changed for the worse. We asked to have our room serviced after a couple of nights. All that was asked was vacuuming, trash taken out and some clean towels(BTW we tip housekeeping when they show up). We were told to leave the trash in the hall and handed some clean towels. Leave the trash in the halls? Come on! Why have a kitchen if you're not going to collect the trash. I take it out at home more often than that. The breakfast is good. Parking has always been a challenge there but we have made do. We come to Disneyland every year and next time I think we'll look elsewhere for the price and the service.
Manager Response: Good afternoon DriverBruce,  Thank you for your review our your most recent stay at our hotel. I am so sorry to hear your recent stay was less than satisfactory. We have assigned extra staff to circulate between each of the guest room floors to remove trash and old towels as soon as possible. We realize this solution, instead of servicing rooms, presents new challenges for our guests. So thank you for bearing with us during this challenging time. We, sincerely, hope that things are able to change for the better so that you might consider us once again. I hope that you and your family have a wonderful holiday season in 2021.

Summary: My Aunt and I stayed at Hyatt House for 7 days!  We were immediately impressed with the kitchenette, which includes a nice island with white granite top.  The shelves had everything you could possibly want or need for an extended stay - silverware, plates, bowls, a Pyrex measuring cup, pots and pans, a microwave and mini fridge (which had a really spacious fridge and a separate freezer).  The sectional sofa was nice and comfy, and the queen beds/pillows were very comfortable.  I just wish there was a more substantial comforter, as it got chilly at night.  The bathroom was spacious and the sink countertop was large enough to fit a number of toiletries, a hair straightener, etc.  the additional vanity lighting was exceptional - made applying makeup a breeze!  Also, the rubber bath
Manager Response: Good afternoon maryaX6198IA,  Thank you for providing the hotel and future guests with feedback that accurately depicts your experience with us. We are overjoyed to hear everyone enjoyed our hotel and the amenities we offer. Additionally, thank you for informing us about the issues you experienced as well, because this feedback helps us focus on things our guests notice. Have a wonderful holiday season!

Summary: Garbage piled up in the halls daily. It was difficult to get maid service. We were there for five days with small children would have gladly cleaned the room myself just needed to be directed to the cleaning closet. The hot tub was also very disappointing. It could have past for a kiddie pool, it was cold. The bed and bedding are terrible.
Manager Response: Good afternoon mandpan,  First off, please allow us to apologize for the difficulties caused by modified services we have at this time. It must have been difficult to manage for a slightly longer stay with children. We want to thank you for informing us of your experience with the limited service. This type of feedback helps us understand what our guests are experiencing. We hope that you have a wonderful holiday season.

Summary: Always a good experience when staying at the hayatt house.   Employees helpful and friendly.   Rooms roomy and clean.  Amenities were above average and rooms were good sized.   Needed an extra blanket and they ran one right up to us.   They even provided water for  us everyday.  Breakfast was great. Workers were there clearing our tables.
Manager Response: Good evening chuckjuelch,  Thank you for leaving us feedback regarding your recent stay! Your feedback is appreciated and so is your loyalty to Hyatt Resorts. We hope that you will think of HH Anaheim again in the future.

Summary: Very clean rooms. Breakfast was phenomenal. Friendly staff, easy check in and out... 10 minute walk to Disneyland. No trouble with parking. Walgreens, Starbucks and other amenities available with in 2 minute's or less
Manager Response: Good evening Natasha_Curtis,  We love to see feedback like yours. Thank you for sharing your thoughts and feedback! Short and sweet. Well, we hope that everyone enjoyed their stay- it was a pleasure to serve you. Have a happy holiday season.

Summary Heading: Nice location but expected more for the price. Was not impressed with this hotel. The customer service was mediocre.
Summary: Messed up our room reservations to start Didn’t explain parking at all upon check in. The rooms are nice with a kitchen, but couldn’t sleep both night due to the loud banging above. Best thing about the hotel is the location, but besides that I recommend staying somewhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback, cmosorio3208. You sharing your experience, whether positive or negative, is what helps us improve. Going over parking is definitely important, so thank you for letting us know- this will be something we can work on with front desk agents. Lastly, I wanted to thank you for sharing your experience in regard to noise issues. We actually have quiet hours from 10pm-6am, and encourage our guests to report noise issues so that we can assist. I am very sorry if this was attempted on your behalf and we fell short. We hope that you have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary: This was our first stay at Hyatt House. We've stayed at 2 other hotels in the same vicinity, and this was by far our favorite! We had a small family suite with bunk beds; the ability to close the sliding door for some quiet/privacy was glorious! We could see the fireworks from our window, the pool was lovely (and clean!) and the staff was beyond helpful. From the front desk staff, to the breakfast staff, everyone was so friendly. The included hot breakfast was wonderful as well! Will definitely be staying here in the future. Two thumbs up!
Manager Response: Good afternoon amyrJ9591CT,  Thank you for taking valuable time out of your day to stop and leave us feedback. Sharing what you love and letting us know what you experienced during interaction with our staff is so important to our success. We are happy to hear everyone enjoyed their stay. We hope you accommodate you and your family again.

Summary: Want to commend Margarita at food service center for being kind cheerful and outstanding. All morning crew serving breakfast was amazing from the chef to the cleaning lady margarita job well done. Overall great experience
Manager Response: Good afternoon MuaahDeChamps1225,  Thank you for pointing out our valued team member, Margarita. We will, definitely, let her know you thought her service was exceptional. We want to thank you for staying with Hyatt House. Have a wonderful holiday season.

Summary Heading: Never again. Not worth the money
Summary: Upon arriving, the front desk clerk was rude when I asked why I had to pay for parking at $24 per day! Furthermore the room was small and not worth the money that they charge per night. The air conditioning was in the back of the room where there were bunkbeds for the kids and a closing door to separate from the king bed. This was nice however with the AC being in the back of the room it made the front of the room extremely hot, and the back of the room with the kids extremely cold! Very poorly set up. I also called for extra towels that I never received. Very bad customer service. I would never stay again.
Manager Response: Good afternoon gregleon1085,  I am so sorry to hear you had a less than satisfactory stay at Hyatt House. While we are happy to see positive reviews, negative reviews give us a chance to understand where our problems may lie. Thank you for sharing your feedback to help drive us toward improvement. We hope that you have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary: The hotel was perfect for my family of six the only downside right now is that they don’t clean the room every day only if you stay more than five days. Margarita at the breakfast area was really nice and she recommended to buy the ponchos for the rain next to 7 eleven store. So we didn’t have to buy them at Disneyland where they were double the price.  The hotel is five minutes walking distance from Disneyland which I loved. I highly recommend this hotel if you’re going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Good afternoon 801famr,  We so appreciate your kind feedback regarding your recent stay at Hyatt House. Thank you for remembering Margarita's name and the impact she had on your experience. We will make sure to let her know that her service made a positive impact. I hope that you have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary: My husband and I had an excellent stay at the Hyatt House.  The check in process was seamless.  It was an easy walk to Disneyland, and it was nice to be able to come back and relax a bit before returning to the parks for fireworks.  The hotel felt extremely clean.  This is definitely where we will stay in the future.
Manager Response: Good afternoon Sandy N,  Thank you so much for letting us know how your stay went! Reviews like yours help summarize the benefits of staying at Hyatt House Anaheim. We are really happy that you chose to stay with us. Have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary: The only complaints I have are that the sofa bed is not comfortable, if you need to use it for an adult to sleep on. And, the usually lovely bedding is starting to show wear. The quilts on the beds are flattened, grayish, and showing age. The blanket that was brought to us for the sofa bed was raggedy. Other than that is is still my favorite place to stay in walking distance from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Good afternoon Lulube2015,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel with us. Your feedback today will help us improve for tomorrow. We hope that you and your family have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary: Great stay!  Close to everything, short walk to disney, staff was friendly!  The only draw back was the sofa bed was a little uncomfortable!  Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone!  I have stayed at many different hotel near disney and this one by far was the best one yet! We will defiantly stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: Good afternoon barkssn,  Thank you, sincerely, for taking the time to complete a review for us. We are happy to see everyone was able to enjoy the hotel amenities. Lastly, thank you for letting us know what we can improve on as well. We hope that you have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary: He absolutely loved our tripWe got there early they already had our room ready anytime I needed extra stuff it was sent right up! I will definitely stay at this Hyatt again! It’s close to everything and the walk was a quick 10 minute walk!
Manager Response: Good afternoon Susan B,  I am happy to see that our team was able to take care of you during your stay with us. Thank you for sharing your experience with us and our future guests. It was a pleasure to accommodate you. Have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary: We stayed in the family suite with 2 bunk beds. With 2 teens, it was comfy and roomy. Breakfast buffet had a good spread. It was about 15-20 min walk from the Disneyland entrance. The pool and hot tub area looked good but we didn't get a chance to use it.
Manager Response: Good afternoon AmrKal,   Thank you for taking the time to summarize the benefits of staying at Hyatt House. We are happy to see that we were able to meet your expectations. Hopefully, we can see you again in the future! Weather permitting, so that you can have a chance to use our beautiful pool and spa. Have a wonderful 2021 holiday season!

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised after reading and watching some reviews on the hotel we had lower expectations but they definitely exceeded them. We arrived in LA at 6am after a red eye flight and requested a Walt check in which was not guaranteed but when I called after landing to our surprise the room was already ready and waiting for us! We read reviews on the beds being uncomfortable and water pressure being bad but we had no problems with either. We visited the pool, had breakfast, and did laundry there which all above facilities were clean and more than acceptable. All the staff we encountered from front desk, breakfast service, and housekeeping were all so very nice and friendly. It was a very enjoyable stay and worth paying a little higher in price. We will definitely be
Manager Response: Good afternoon kuuleiortiz,  I am so happy to hear that our team was able to accommodate you after a red-eye flight right away. I hope that helped everyone get some rest so that the real vacation could begin. We are looking forward to having you back. Have a wonderful 2021 holiday season.

Summary: We have stayed here a couple times in the past, the service is always above and beyond. The breakfast staff are so friendly and accommodating, Rey and Ibeth definitely made all the kids feel highlighted for their birthdays with some balloons and extra sausage on their plate.  If you’re checking in at night Dante is fantastic and really made sure we had enough blankets and towels before we headed up to the room.  I wish i could give more than five stars because the staff at this hotel make it way more than just a room to crash in after a day at disneyland!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Be aware that if you book a room with a bunk, there are sliding doors that separate the king bed from the bunks.  These sliding doors are loud when they close together.  So, when you are trying to sleep and a family with small kids arrive from Disneyland at midnight, the kids like to play with the doors by slamming them together which will shake the walls in your room. Also, the walls are thin so you can here every footstep in the room next door, and hear the toilet flush and shower run.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were very pleased with our stay. We were pleasantly surprised at the quality of the room. We would refer our family and friends to stay at your hotel. Every employee we encountered was friendly courteous and very helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Easy walk to Disneyland. Safe and clean area. Staff was courteous. No daily cleaning but quick to bring new supplies when needed. Pool and hot tub were nice with comfy seating. Would stay here again when back in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pool water was freezing, towels stained and the bar, which they said it would be open, was not. Our party of 18 was highly disappointed. I also requested a call from the hotel manager and that never happened.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I’m a Hyatt globalist and have been with this company for 25 years. I only stay at Hyatt hotels when traveling. This hotel is in a great location to Disneyland. Our room had ants on the nightstands 457. I have never had this problem at a Hyatt hotel. The front desk was not helpful or friendly. I would rate them one star. The housekeeping and people working the breakfast were five stars. They were so friendly and helpful. I will probably stay at the other Hyatt down the street until the any problem is taken care of 😩
Manager Response: none

Summary: I think they have an issue with ants. I heard others complaining at the same time I was there. Other than that I don’t have any complaints. Breakfast was pretty good also! I do wish the bed was a little bit more comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our room was perfect for our family. We loved the kitchenette and separate living room. Great space for the five of us! It was in walking distance to the park and had convenient places nearby, ie: Starbucks and Walgreens. Our kids celebrated their birthdays while we were there and Margarita made it very special for them! At breakfast, she brought them cupcakes with candles and sang to them. She was so kind! We had a great experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Awesome Hotel in a Perfect Location
Summary: What a wonderful hotel located just a half a mile from Disney!  Plenty of restaurants within a 2 minute walk.  Clean, spacious rooms.  Excellent breakfast and the staff was so helpful and pleasant.  The pool area looked lovely even though we didn't have time to use it.  Definitely will stay there again!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really enjoyed the location and the free breakfast.  The room was spacious and appeared clean; however, the receptionists could work on their hospitality and be a little more friendlier.  Fun Fact Alert : they offer free water in the refrigerators in the Market Place area but they don't tell you about it unless you ask.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Amidst the on going Covid restrictions, the front desk crew and downstairs breakfast stafff in my opinion were very consistent in ensuring guests are welcomed and settled.  Even through the shift changes, the front desk remained consummate professionals.  Breakfast opened on time and though I forgot their names of both ladies in the service line, they remained attentive and friendly.  Margarita, the dinning room attendant maintained cleaned tables and provided a welcoming smile and warm small conversation.  Now, coming from the food area you have a choice of going left or right.  If you go left and sit along the window you will smell cigarettes. The second hand smoke comes in via draft from the emergency exit doors.  For some reason that outside corner area attracts smokers.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was the most convenient Hyatt (booked with points) for going to Disneyland. Still a bit of a walk - probably 15 to get to the entrance of the parks. This was fine for days 1 and 2, but we were feeling it on days 3 and 4. The ART bus stop is pretty convenient if you’re not up for the walk. Rooms were not very well maintained - lots of stains on furniture and carpet and one of the lights in the bathroom was broken. Nothing I couldn’t look past. The hot breakfast is back and was pretty great for a hotel breakfast.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff were helpful and friendly. Very clean, well ran hotel. Loved that Starbucks was right below us and Walgreens was right next door. 12 minute walk to Disneyland was great too!! Would stay again
Manager Response: none

Summary: As a Hyatt elite member, I've stayed at various Hyatts across different states and countries, many of which were Hyatt Houses. I must say this was the most disappointing experience thus far, and my reasons are listed below:  1) Not a true Hyatt Grand Bed - This hotel must've replaced the beds with a cheaper brand because the one that was in my room was not a true Hyatt Grand Bed. I was sinking 20 mins after laying down and this never happens in any Hyatt Grand Beds I've laid on. I woke up with a kink in my neck, which was annoying, and not how I wanted to start Day 1 at Disneyland. After the 1st night, I had to sleep on the floor starting night 2. To pad the floor as much as possible, I asked for blankets but I had to go down to the lobby myself and get them (limited stock, by
Manager Response: none

Summary: one of the best trips we’ve taken in a while to Disneyland. This was all thanks to Samantha at the front desk. She was really accommodating to us and made sure our stay was amazing. Thanks so much Sam!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was good. Need a few updates in the fitness center. Good location near many restaurants. Clean room and the all areas of the hotel. Nice free breakfast. Check in and out process was easy and convenient.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice place to stay, clean; people working here are very friendly and attentive; our suite was big and confortable with a lot of amenities, and beds and sofa bed very comfy. Only one block away from Disneyland and many restaurants and two major pharmacies right at the corner.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is my first time to Anaheim, CA and my first time staying at the Hyatt House Resort. I was hoping the hotel would be nice  because this is a birthday trip for my daughter. I must say… My first impression…I’m blown away by the hospitality. Kellie at check-in not only made it easy, but very enjoyable. She is a great representation of the company. The room is extremely clean and very spacious and I love having a kitchenette… So far, I’m very impressed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This location has such great staff! Everyone was amazing. The warmth and hospitality was felt immediately upon entering. The hotel has super clean rooms, amazing views of Disneyland, and a great breakfast. I can’t wait to return!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were a little concerned after reading a couple of the recent negative reviews of HH, but we had an absolutely positive experience. Obviously, it's very convenient to the parks (less than 15 min stroll), and the rooms are large and clean and the staff is super-friendly (we were greeted by everybody, including the the housekeeping and breakfast staff). Yes, there is a parking charge, but it's clearly noted on the website, plus even if you arrive super early before check-in, you are allowed to park and head over to the parks until later - and then leave your car in the garage until midnight on the day you check out. Happy to note that breakfast is beginning to return to "normal" with scrambled eggs, sausages, and either potatoes or French bread sticks being served (along with
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Genuinely Close to the Magic, Far Enough Away to take a Break
Summary: You can't beat being this close to the Disneyland Resort! It's at the corner of Harbor Blvd and Katella Ave, so expect a 12 to 15 minutes walk, but parking at the hotel was a breeze and is 3 dollars cheaper than at Disney. The room was great! We booked into a "Den Guestroom | King Bed" and it was well laid out as well and had a nice amount of space for two guests to relax completely without being on top of each other. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great staff/Good breakfast/Starbucks and cvs right there.
Summary: Great location, good breakfast just need more variety. Parking is $25 a day which is sad since if you in vacation you never there so they need to make it free or cheaper. In case you need something you have cvs right on there so I loved that part. Room were dusty and hair in the bathroom so they need to work on cleaning but otherwise was great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The service overall was really poor. The elevator was really dirty all the time of my stay. The hall was dirty that gives you feeling you are walking on the street.  They don’t send you a housekeeping and the most important if try to call room service or front disk they don’t answer. In general was my worst place to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hyatt is probably the best hotel I have stayed at so far in this area. The room was comfortable and quiet considering it’s location, the wall to nearby Disneyland wasn’t bad at all, and the free breakfast was a very nice and lately uncommon plus. It was limited, but understandably so in a pandemic.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great experience!  The front desk staff was very helpful in navigating our trip — including offering options for less mobile family members to enjoy the park.  The breakfast options are beyond what we’ve seen offered in other hotels since the pandemic.   Very welcoming overall.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was nice & clean, the staff was very friendly & helpful, their location is great, plus their breakfast was one of the best I’ve had at a hotel. The only downside is, I don’t like underground parking, although they have a security guard out front, it would be nice to have one in the garage as well, & have it better lit up, although everything was fine, it would just make it feel more safe.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was good location, but rooms are noisy and not everything working Properly, price was good for the location and Continental breakfast, families can definitely benefit from the perk of the free continental breakfast, however if you plan is to relax and enjoy the area, rooms are noisy and things seem to be broken inside the rooms, such as toilets constantly leaking water overnight keeping you awake, bathroom doors not staying open, beds and floors the squeak every time you roll over in bed and or anytime you walk around the room, constantly hear people yelling running in or talking in the hallways.
Manager Response: none

Summary: From my past experience, I would not recommend this hotel to anyone that I know. The room was not cleaned properly especially with COVID protocols. Room smelled dusty, and was actually dusty. Bought a purifier to help. Hair in the showers which shows it wasn’t properly cleaned (rushed). My biggest gripe is that the beds were terrible. My wife and I both had sleepless night the three nights we stayed at this location. It’s been a couple of days since the trip and my body still aches from how uncomfortable the bed was. Overall, a terrible experience. At the end of a long day, you want to be able to relax and be comfortable. Didn’t get that this stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Location with friendly staff. Needs some improvements, but good for families and Disneyland.
Summary: Stayed here because Redience Inn across street was not available. Our stay was fine. We actually were upgraded to a streetview room which is good for fireworks when they are running.  However it is not soundproof as advertised.  So be aware of street noise. Beds were ok not bad or great. I've stayed at other category Hyatts with better beds. The location is perfect for Disneyland and convention center. Easy walking. Close to Garden walk and centrally located to drive anywhere. Santa Ana /John Wayne airport is 18 min away-try to fly into there rather than LAX. It's very nice and close to anaheim and beaches! The rooms need refurbishing soon as this hotel is used by many families with children and the rooms show wear. Our outlets were loose and plugs fell out. The only usb outlet
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay at the Hyatt house was absolutely wonderful, the staff went above and beyond for our family. The hotel was very clean, comfortable, roomies and a short walk to Disneyland. Our party aged 3-65 all absolutely enjoyed our stay and we’ll be staying at the Hyatt house again
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not as expected for a Hyatt Brand hotel overall experience.
Summary: Not the usual professional welcoming, lacking assistance or maybe a bad day but could’ve been better. Airflow little to none once on the 2nd floor which doesn’t seem good for keeping air clean with Covid looming about.

Summary Heading: Loved our stay! Clean, affordable, convenient
Summary: The hotel was so clean and conveniently located. We had a family suite. Staff members were friendly and gave helpful tips about Disneyland. The 24-hour drug store was very useful to have nearby. The walk to DL was only 15 minutes which is closer than walking from the DL parking lot.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The place itself was fine, but we paid for 6 nights and had to do all of our room cleaning ourselves (including our own garbage). No cleaning services were provided by the hotel staff. Definitely won’t stay again here. Usually our experiences at Hyatt are much better than this one was.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Line the halls with trash to "help with COVID"
Summary: We used to stay here, but will not anymore.  This has to be the worst hotel I have stayed at during COVID. I have done business travels so I have experienced a lot of different approaches. Not once have I enchanted a hotel that felt 5 nights of stay was needed before they would attempt to clean a room. We had two young kids go to Disneyland and come back to the room. As kids do, they were messy and crazy after having fun and being excited. Having to call down several times to have someone say they will give us a vacuum and we can clean the room was pretty terrible. They tell you nothing about their new trash policy. It's really simple, just throw your trash in the halls and someone will get to it eventually. Now if someone tripped over the the piles of trash in the halls, pretty
Manager Response: none

Summary: A huge shout out to Samantha, Jade, Dante ( graveyard shift) and Efrain …( I hope I spelled it correctly). Always so willing to help me in any way possible. I stay often with this Hyatt because of it’s great location… across the street from Disneyland…. Clean rooms ….But mostly coz of the staff!!!! Keep it up guys!!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Came from San Diego to attend baseball game at Angels Stadium. The hotel had easy access, plenty of parking, very clean and modern, beautiful pool area, and for me the Walgreens and Starbucks adjacent to hotel was a great amenity!

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for families heading to Disney.
Summary: Great location with breakfast included and a Starbucks on site. We got there about midnight to check in, had to wait a while because the lobby was so busy! But our room was nice and spacious. Everything was clean. We could walk to Disneyland in about 15 minutes.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place was great! A few blocks from Disneyland entrance and they had free breakfast that was decent! The pool was nice a little cool, but our kids did mind that much! Hot tub was nice and big and hot! We were happy with out stay here and will stay again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hyatt House Anaheim was great choice for our family of six!  The Family Suite fit us great and location was perfect as we wanted to be close to Disney parks entrances. The hotel staff was friendly and welcoming!! Our first time staying in a Hyatt Property…we will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are pleased to see that we exceeded your expectations. We try our very best to make Hyatt House your home away from home. Please know that your kind words will be shared with the team and we hope to see you all again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for family vacation to Disneyland!
Summary: This is my third trip to Disneyland and each time we have stayed at this hotel as it uniquely offers family suites with bunk beds!  There are sliding doors that effectively create two separate rooms.   The beds are comfortable, but the sleeper sofa was not at all - thin and squeaky.    The hotel includes breakfast which is a huge benefit and it is walking distance to the park.  It is also on the ART bus line and there is a Walgreen's & CVS very close by.    The hotel staff was incredibly helpful and super friendly.

Summary Heading: Worst Hyatt House I’ve Stayed In
Summary: As a frequent business traveler I’ve stayed in at least a dozen Hyatt Houses and more than 40 Hyatt Places.  This Hyatt House was the worst I’ve stayed in. The room was poorly laid out. It felt cold and depressing rather than warm and welcoming. WiFi was awful. In our 7-night stay we never got a room cleaning due to COVID. That seemed like a cost-saving measure rather than safety.   The included breakfast lacked variety. Scrambled eggs, sausage links and potatoes. Every day.   Beds and pillows were pretty good. Towels were average. Water pressure in the shower was below expectations. Air conditioning was fine. Noise level was okay.   You’ll stay here because it’s close to Disneyland. And it’s not super expensive.   Hyatt used to be my preferred brand until they diminished their
Manager Response: I apologize that your experience was anything less than satisfying. Feedback such as yours assists us in improving our service and property. Summary: Good experience happy rooms had kitchen overall great experience. Room was clean and stocked. House keeping didn’t come because due to Covid they only clean if staying longer than 5 days. Breakfast was eggs, pork sausage, potatoes, cereal, toast, milk, coffee. Fruit was oranges, apples, and bananas they also had yogurt parfaits on one day we were there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are pleased to see you and your family enjoyed your stay with us, we hope to see you all again soon!

Summary: It’s so so if you just need a place to sleep. It was not clean enough for me and cleaning services were suspended unless you stayed more than 5 nights (we spent 5 nights). The showers were terrible, the beddings were terrible too. Loved the proximity of the hotel to DisneyLand.
Manager Response: We hope you'll accept our sincerest apologies for falling short on our high service standards. While we do our best to always deliver a smooth experience, it appears we fell short and did not meet expectations during your visit.

Summary Heading: Great property near Disneyland!Just go for the location!
Summary: As a 82 night globalist the staff did everything in their power to accommodate my family. We stayed for the location and went to Disneyland 2 days in a row. A quick 10 minute stroll to the front gate. Couldn’t be happier.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review! Please know that your kind words will be shared with our team. Here at Hyatt House we strive to provide the best customer service and we are so happy to see we were able to exceed your expectations. We hope to see you all again soon.

Summary: Stayed here in 2016 when hotel was brand-new. Now it’s showing its age (stains, scuffs, etc.). We were probably only guests not visiting Disney. No breakfast to speak of, due to Covid. But having Starbucks & CVS next door are a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We currently have our breakfast available with limited hot items for our guests and always working to improve it. We apologize your stay was less than satisfying and we hope to afford your time again in the future.

Summary Heading: Business trip, must stay in Hyatt House!!!!
Summary: Had a great experience staying in Hyatt House during my business trip. Professional staff, and the best service post Covid. Room was super clean, and WiFi was amazingly fast. I was impressed with the level of professionalism throughout the entire staff. Everyone was kind, and caring.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 5 star stay at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations.

Summary: Great overall experience! Friendly staff, clean rooms, nice beds, and easy walk to Disneyland. I was also surprised with how easy the parking was. It appeared the hotel was on a main road (which it is), but the check-in area is tucked behind the hotel and there’s plenty of room and parking there. Not stressful at all once you pull in the main driveway. Front desk staff was very friendly and helped us with anything we needed. They even have extra towels and blankets at the front desk so you don’t have to wait for someone to bring them up to the room. It makes a big difference when you have tired children. Thanks again for a great stay!! Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. Here at Hyatt we take every response into consideration as it allows us to continually grow as a team and as a hotel. I am glad that we were able to meet your expectations and provide you excellent service. We do our very best to try and care for all of our guests so that they can be their best. Thank you for deciding to stay with us and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, parking is ridiculously expensive, not included
Summary: While it was close to Disneyland and nice hotel, I cannot recommend it based on the ADDITIONAL cost of parking. Why is it extra to begin with? Also upon arrival there was a broken cupboard in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Please know that feedback such as yours helps us improve our customer service. We hope to afford your time again in the future.

Summary: The hotel is very clean. The staff was very friendly, courteous and helpful. Check-in was easy as we got there late into the evening on Sunday 11:45PM. The hotel parking lot was almost full. I was lucky enough to find a space to park. There was plenty of space during the weekday. I think weekends, it may be hard to find a parking spot ( this would be at any hotel in the area).   +spacious room + 15-20 min walk to Disneyland  +Walgreens, Starbucks, Blaze Pizza next to hotel. GardenWalk across the street.  +hotel parking + breakfast  - no maid service. Front desk will give you extra towels upon request.  -parking could be a problem on weekends -homeless people on the street (we saw one homeless man having an argument with himself, another defecating in the beautiful Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to see that you and the family enjoyed your stay with us. We do our very best to try and care for all of our guests so that they can be their best. Thank you for deciding to stay with us and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: My sister, her husband, and I have been coming to this hotel for many years, and we just experienced the renovated rooms in the South Tower this past weekend. They are just fantastic. Take a look at the pictures I took. The staff is friendly and made us feel like old friends. Adam the manager is on top of his games.  The hotel had a huge event going on, and the facility met pandemic safety measures so it was held outdoors. Adam made sure that all of our expectations were not just merely met but surpassed. We were highly impressed. We will certainly be coming back!
Manager Response: Here at Hyatt we take every response into consideration as it allows us to continually grow as a team and as a hotel. I am glad that we were able to meet your expectations and provide you excellent service. We do our very best to try and care for all of our guests so that they can be their best. Thank you for deciding to stay with us and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Hotel is within walking to Disneyland which was very nice.  Overall hotel was very clean, room was clean.  Only problem was water pressure for showering was low.  The only downside, there is an additional parking fee that is charged per day for parking at the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review and a 5 star rating at that! We make it a priority to make sure our guests feel as comfortable as possible when staying with Hyatt House. We appreciate the feedback regarding the water pressure and know that we are working to resolve this issue. We hope to see you all again very soon and thank you for staying with Hyatt House!

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights as it was very close to Disneyland entrance (5-8 minutes walk), had reasonable rates for a large suite.  I had booked the Tower Suite and it had 2 beds, a living room with a sofa-bed, dining table and full kitchen.  All of these amenities and space made our stay here very relaxing, which is needed after a long day at Disneyland.  The room was clean, but was missing additional bedding and linens for the sofa-bed.  There only had enough towels for 2 occupants, which is silly for their largest suite.   Full housekeeping wasn't being offered due to COVID-19 and after 3pm (when we checked in), they were gone for the day, so I had to go down to the front desk to get the bedding, linens and extra towels.  The gentleman at the front desk was quite friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay. I want to start off by apologizing for the inconvenience of the ECV not being charged prior to your Disney trip. With Covid protocols in place, they do change day by day and we headed in the right direction to where we can operate pre-Covid times. We appreciate your review and happy to see that your overall experience was good. We hope to see you all again soon.

Summary: nice gym good location great water pressure wifi was good close to disney close to outdoor shopping walking distance to hertz and avis  what else can you ask for?  the starbucks inside the building was only open in the morning which was 1 thing that was not great. but thats not even a hotel related thing
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 5 star stay at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations

Summary: I just checked out of the Hyatt house today. My daughter and I stayed there for 5 nights for a soccer tourney. The hotel is very clean, and the staff are pleasant and helpful. My issues with the hotel are the incredibly loud street noise, which made it impossible to get a decent night of sleep. The "covid " breakfast was terrible. Other hotels in the area were offering a full hot breakfast, and we didn't find out the regular full breakfast wouldn't be available until a few days prior. Wrapped muffins, toast and hard boiled eggs don't compare to the omelette station, bacon and waffles that used to be served. The hotel offered no maid service until the 5th day. The garbage starts to pile up and towels need changing way before the 5th day. The "market" is basically junk food, the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations. Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience. At Hyatt House, we promise to do whatever it takes to ensure you are satisfied, I hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: My family and I go 3 times a year to Disneyland and we avoid staying at the Disneyland Hotels because we know they have better accommodations and even if the price is as much as staying at a Disneyland Hotel/resort, we get better care and service but unfortunately we were very disappointed this time. The Hyatt, needs to improvement overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and are very sorry we fell short in meeting and exceeding your expectations of an exceptional stay. We are reviewing your comments with our team as we continually work to improve our guest experience. I sincerely apologize and if this was not properly handled by my staff I will certainly make an address this with them. Thank you again for your time and feedback, I truly hope you will give us another chance to earn your confidence back.

Summary Heading: Stayed for three nights with 3 kids under 7. No housekeeping is offered now which means you expect to deal with bathroom
Summary: Stayed for three nights with 3 kids under 7. No housekeeping is offered now which means you expect to deal with bathrooms in need of cleaning after a few baths and general usage. But no housekeeping and no cleaning supplies available to help yourself either. No trash pickup from inside the room which means people were piling trash outside the rooms, pizza boxes beer bottles food, used towels were a regular sight throughout the the 4 days at the hotel. Disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I apologize that your experience was anything less than satisfying. Feedback such as yours assists us in improving our service and property. We hope you'll accept our sincerest apologies for falling short on our high service standards. While we do our best to always deliver a smooth experience, it appears we fell short and did not meet expectations during your visit.

Summary: I've stayed at many Hyatts, but this is by far the worst. We booked because it's close to Disneyland, but go elsewhere (parking isn't bad at Disneyland anyways and there a lot of homeless people camped right near hotel). It is clear that management does not care about this hotel. No blankets, no towels, no toilet paper: these to me are basics and should be provided.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. Summary Heading: Solid hotel but lacking some amenities with restrictions
Summary: I'm a loyal Hyatt Globalist member and have come to love the typical great experience of my stays.  I will start with the negatives first: - As a Globalist, I didn't get a room clean for six nights which is long time for a family hotel.  Dirty towels and trash piled up fast and two nights after long days at Disney, I called for towels and they made us come down to pick them up because a lack of staff. - The breakfast was weak.  Muffins, granola bars, some toast/bagels (although was empty often), hard boiled eggs, and yogurt.  Huge breakfast area with a lot of loud families.  I think hotels are using Covid as an excuse to cut services like breakfast.  I'm not sure how the area is packed with people is less safe with hot food.  I paid a little extra expecting the Hyatt quality and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I apologize that your experience was anything less than satisfying. Feedback such as yours assists us in improving our service and property. We hope you'll accept our sincerest apologies for falling short on our high service standards. While we do our best to always deliver a smooth experience, it appears we fell short and did not meet expectations during your visit.

Summary: The room was nice snd meet our needs in most areas. Since there is not maid service every day, it would have been nice for more convenient towel and trash service.  Felt safe with added security measures………………………………
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are so pleased to see you and the family enjoyed your stay with us and felt safe in the process as well. We strive to provide the best customer service to our guests and make Hyatt House their home away from home. We hope to see you all again soon.

Summary: I'll get to the point: the mattress was bad. Sleep quality is the highest priority when I stay in a hotel and this hotel did not deliver. Also, the duvet and bedding were flimsy. Otherwise, Hyatt House is okay. The room is okay and the building is acceptable. Its saving grace is the walking distance to the Disney parks.  Beware: there is no housekeeping for five days. Your room will be a mess soon, unless you're fastidious (but who is when all you want to do is sleep after a long day in the hot sun?). Like another reviewer said, the hallways are filled with trash bags, but luckily someone collects them during the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I apologize that your experience was anything less than satisfying. Feedback such as yours assists us in improving our service and property. We hope you'll accept our sincerest apologies for falling short on our high service standards. While we do our best to always deliver a smooth experience, it appears we fell short and did not meet expectations during your visit.

Summary: I would Definitely stay here again with my family. My kids enjoyed their bunk beds! Very clean hotel and friendly staff! They also have free breakfast ! Just wish COVID didn’t restrict what they can have on the breakfast buffet. They are only doing grab and go’s at the moment. But other than that their banana nut bread muffins where bomb.
Manager Response: none

Summary: In spite of the limitations due to the pandemic, our experience went pretty well. There are few things that could be improved such as variety of prepackaged  breakfast. The muffins were good however it would be good to switch it with other prepackaged food and alternately serving it.  Housekeeping, security and food preparation were amazing, again considering the pandemic. Always greeting guests with smile. Paid parking was good, safe and lot of space available. Only problem is green vehicle slots are taken by non-green vehicle guests. Elevator can create long lines as it is one family per lift. You will need your room card to access the elevator and only guests can use it. One night we had a hard time locating the stairs because of the long line. When we use the Stairs, our
Manager Response: none

Summary: Breakfast selections pre-covid was way better.   Also, would be nice to get our rooms cleaned but even changing bedsheets were left to be done by guests. It would be nice to get a room upgrade being a World of Hyatt member, but no, didn’t get that. Parking is 22/night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Lovely place, right when you walk in it’s like wow!!! Very friendly employees, helpful and informative. We had and issue and it was taken care of right away with no questions asked. The place was is well maintained, very nice and I most say definitely clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Have to say the location of the hotels, great customer service, overall large room for breakfast for family, cool on the second floor it’s roomy outdoor open and clean.  Hotel has his own parking spot on the ground car is kept cool and safe multiple elevators for quick entries and exit
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent customer service! Close to Disneyland
Summary: I had made a reservation at the Hyatt Place by accident, and I didn’t realize it until I got to the Hyatt House. We always stay at the Hyatt House as it in close proximity to Disneyland; they have rooms to accommodate my husband and I and our four kids; ans it’s a great location. Eric Falcon, Front Desk Supervisor, was extremely helpful and did everything he could to accommodate my family. Although the hotel was booked for the weekend for the type of room I booked at the Hyatt Place, he was able to find room for us ans charged us the same rate. We were celebrating our 15th anniversary ans provided us with a nice bottle of wine to celebrate. Thank you Eric and Hyatt House for making our vacation and anniversary  memorable!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had an easy check in. Stayed in a king den. Quite spacious and clean. Pool was nice and basically empty. Breakfast Included coffee, tea, juices, English muffins, toast, bagels, hard boiled eggs, cereals. There’s a Starbucks downstairs. They also have Tesla chargers.  Downside was that the microwave time light was so bright during the night.  Since it’s still COVID times they aren’t providing cleaning which was fine. But we needed more towels and were brought pool towels which was a little weird. The hotel was completely sold out while we were there but it didn’t feel hectic.  We would definitely return and try one of the suites for better sleep with the kids.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice property, good value.  Walking distance to Disney
Summary: Very nice property, great amenities.  My wife who is usually very picky actually found this to be nice.  Convenient to Disney, shopping, and restaurants. Would definitely recommend and stay again when going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The pictures and description, as well as the price, indicated we would be staying at a nicer hotel. It was old and not very clean. Had to make our own beds even on the first day entering our room. The AC was off by at least 10 degrees per room so while one party was freezing the other was too hot.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Convenient location and views of Disneyland
Summary: Have stayed here several times, beautiful hotel with nice studio apartment style rooms. The sofa beds could be more comfortable but that's my only complaint. Nice kitchenette and great views of Disneyland and the mountains. The staff is always friendly and helpful. Breakfast still isn't back to normal since covid.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 5 star stay at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations. Please know that we have now added a few hot items to our breakfast such as scrambled eggs, sausages and potatoes. We hope to see you all again soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for your Disney Visit
Summary: Really great location. Roughly 20 minute walk to the magic at Disneyland/California Adventure and Downtown Disney. The staff was very friendly. Room was clean. Breakfast service is pretty much to-go due to COVID-19. There are other options around the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to see that you and the family enjoyed your stay with us! We strive to provide the best service to our guests and we are pleased so see that your needs were met. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Overall the hotel was just not great. I had better expect for a Hyatt hotel. We stayed on the second floor, and the street noise was awful in our room. There was a horrific stench in the hallways of the hotel in the morning. The family suite felt more like a dorm room, and was underwhelming. We wouldn’t stay again. The price point was high for the type of stay we experienced.
