Summary: No breakfast, no housekeeping, $50 deposit per night. $25 a night for parking.  Can’t walk barefoot in the room or your feet will turn black. They need to remind guests to 1 family per elevator, no one cares.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is amazing, my autistic grandson and I have stayed before and for his 11th birthday he wanted us all to stay at Hyatt House. He was so upset because we had to leave, he wanted to stay for 2 months, not 2 days. The rooms are clean, stocked well, they keep it so clean even with Covid and lets nit speak about the beds, Tou feel like your sleeping on a cloud.  We will be back again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was extremely clean with beautiful rooms. The hotel staff was very professional and friendly.  Can't say enough good things about the front desk service A+. Grat pool and fitness facilities.  Can't wait to visit again! Thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here to go to Disneyland.  It was close and convenient.  The staff was accommodating,  we arrived hours early and had expected to wait for check in time,  they not only checked us on at that time, they even upgraded our room with no extra charge.  The room and the hotel was clean and located near everything: restaurants, Starbucks, Walgreens.  We had a really great stay.  I would highly recommend Hyatt.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best hotel I’ve stayed in so far
Summary: Loved the convenience of this hotel and how everything is well organized. The suite we stayed in felt like home with a kitchen, living area, two queen beds, nice bathroom and an amazing view. Suite was really clean and we felt welcome!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed here many times prior to covid but sadly this time a very disappointing experience. Excessive noise the first night till 5 am. Called down the front desk. They sent someone up but noise continued. Then second night our AC went out. Had to change rooms. The normal breakfast was not in offer as we have come to expect. The door the pool was broken so had to be forced open. And in the am the pool area was extremely messy. Like i said all round very disappointing. As a hyatt member i dont think we will be staying here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I stayed here June 23-25. I was very happy with our stay here. The hotel and rooms were clean and inviting. The front desk staff Osiris and Nadia were very welcoming! The only thing I would change is the layout of the room. It would have been nice to have the bed together with the bunk beds and the couch toward the front of the room. Otherwise, it was a great stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff appeared to be bothered with us at check out.  No welcome, no offer of free water, didn't get the room we expected even though I specifically asked two different people if it was a suit with a door that closed off to the bedroom.  No it was a studio. Wasn’t told about any Covid policy or breakfast options.  Didn’t even explain to use the room key to enter and exit the parking garage.  Basically got “here are your keys, parking is billed to your card and here is your welcome letter.” Hotel was fine but staff was poor
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Bring your own cleaning supplies, soap, towels, sheets, trash bags and toilet paper
Summary: Do not stay at the Hyatt House of Horrors until COVID is long gone.  Unfortunately, their covid protocols has made staying their very uncomfortable.  We were there for 7 days and had our room cleaned once.  They only clean every 5 days.  So we had 5 of us with little kids in a filthy, sandy room for most of our stay.  I had to borrow a vacuum from the front desk to make the room livable.  They are simply saving money by doing less cleanings.  It’s not like it’s covid-friendly.  The sanitizers all over the hotel are empty. Also, because there is basically no cleaning support, you have to fend for yourself as far as getting supplies.  Trash bags?  Soap? Towels? Sheets?  Toilet paper? The best way to get it is to get lucky and run into housekeeping in the hallway though they aren’t
Manager Response: none

Summary: The “Breakfast” was not anything near a meal, it was only a baggy with a stale crumbling muffin and a piense of fruit. Housekeeping was non existent. My towels and toilet paper we not replenished. Took various texts and phone calls and a complete day to get those items. It took so long to get up to our room due to limited space in elevators. No stairway access just for emergencies only.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very impressed with the rooms they had. They were very spacious and had a full kitchen, which we were not expecting. We also had a pool and gym right outside our room. Staff were also very friendly and professional.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice location but missing personal touch
Summary: We stayed in this hotel for our long awaited disneyland trip. In terms of location, this hotel is very nice. Only 8-10mins walk to downtown Disney. Breakfast was a big down for us. The quality of food was not that great as compared to other hotels where we stayed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I’ve stayed at this hotel and several surrounding hotels on past trips to Disneyland. We waited to make this trip until our family was vaccinated and due to the fact that California recently fully opened for business and dropped mask mandates. Unfortunately, this hotel is maintaining COVID restricted services that feel more about cost savings than safety and make for a poor guest experience. None of these are made clear to the consumer at the time of booking.   For example:  - Your room is not cleaned AT ALL unless your stay is longer than 5 days (meaning it’s cleaned once every 5 days).  - No continental breakfast. No hot food at all aside from one type of plain bagel and a toaster oven. Prior to COVID this location has an excellent continental breakfast with very decent food
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Worst Hyatt House We had been
Summary: Found the cockroach in the bathtub, got moved to the the 1 Bedroom suite. I am globalist and request late checkout only to 1 PM got denied, customer service here is a joke. i stayed to few Hyatt hotels and this one so far the worst i ever been.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Usually stay at Hyatt place Anaheim, but wanted to try this Hyatt house.  They have regular rooms Or suites, but what I wanted was the bunk room it has a couch pull out bed tv and the bunk beds.  Also it’s closer to the Disney park than Hyatt place, don’t get me wrong I love the Hyatt place, but wanted to try the Hyatt house and I’m hooked.  There is a walgreens right under hotel and blaze pizza, you can custom make your own pizza and watch it being cooked.  My family member also said the swimming pool was nice.  The parking was ample and felt very safe That’s important.  Now before going there I called to ask questions two different occasion, first I spoke to Nadia and the second time to Osiris, I was impressed with both gals, they were very personable, gracious, knowledgeable
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean hotel rooms and convenient hotel to the Disneyland parks.
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Hyatt House. It was very convenient to the Disneyland parks. It's only a 10 minute walk. Also, the rooms were nice and clean. Loved having a full sized refrigerator, microwave and stovetop. We would stay here again and recommend the hotel to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! Our one bedroom suites are one of the best rooms we offer as it features a full kitchen in the room. We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us! We hope to see you all again soon!

Summary: checking was quick and fast the room was good the bed and bunk beds were good the sleeper sofa was very hard the kids had a hard time resting our room was never made n had to take out our own trash n durty towls outside room due to covid restiction the breakfast was very basic to coffee and muffins to go for the kids there were no milk or cereal to go . its 10-15 walk to disneyland our 3 day stay overall it was good it could been better .  we would probably stay again when restriction lift ,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your overall stay with us. As restrictions are being lifted we too hope to make the adjustments needed to better enhance our customer service with the families visiting Anaheim. We are also working on improving our breakfast as well and hope to implement a better breakfast option in the near future. Thank you again for your review and for staying with us at Hyatt House! We hope to see you all again soon.

Summary: This hotel is clean and walkable to Disneyland. Walls/ceiling is super thin. You can hear everything in rooms next door and if you are not on the top floor, you hear heards of elephants from above. Most noise is 6am-9am as families are preparing to leave for the parks. Not sure this is a good place for a business stay or for anyone not planning to go to the parks at opening. It was relatively quiet after 9am.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We apologize that we were not able to offer the kind of stay you had wanted when you were with us. We appreciate feedback such as yours as it helps to better improve our service for the future. Know that we are addressing the issues you experienced, and we hope you'll give us another chance in the future.

Summary: Amazing staff, clean hotel with great rooms. Enjoyed the bunk beds and then private king bed room for us. Staff went above and beyond and made my daughters stay more magical. Would recommend and will be staying again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, we are happy to see you and the family enjoyed your stay with us! The family suite is one of our biggest hits with families as the kids LOVE the bunk beds. We hope to see you and the family again soon!

Summary: Excellent stay walking distance to Disneyland!!!! Very clean and safe. Great staff especially the cleaning department. Did I mention they provide breakfast, wow! Would definitely recommend to all my family members!
Manager Response: Wonderful to hear! We are so happy you and the family enjoyed your stay with us at Hyatt. We try our very best to make sure that Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center is your home away from home. We hope to see you and the family again in the future! Have a wonderful day!

Summary: location is good. Customer service was just OK. We requested additional comforter for my kids. It took very long time for staff to deliver a blanket instead of the comforter we asked for. Breakfast was very disappointing. Only muffins, yogurt and boiled eggs available for breakfast. I'd recommend to order your own breakfast if staying with this hotel.
Manager Response: We hope you'll accept our sincerest apologies for falling short on our high service standards. While we do our best to always deliver a smooth experience, it appears we fell short and did not meet expectations during your visit. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations. Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience.

Summary: Great location and amenities (pool/fitness center, 24 hr Walgreens, Starbucks, Etc.) but the hotel has significantly reduced services without a reduction in rate.  What is sold as "Covid" protocol appears to simply be cost cutting measures by hotel ownership/management.  Our room was standard (two queen bed suite w/kitchen) and did the job as far as housing my wife and I and our three kids.  Unfortunately, they do not offer any kind of housekeeping until your 5th night.  We only stayed for three nights which meant we received no housekeeping.  We could call the front desk for extra towels and blankets, but that was it.  If you've ever traveled with children you know how cluttered/dirty a hotel room can get in just one night. To not have some level of housekeeping is a total
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and are very sorry we fell short in meeting and exceeding your expectations of an exceptional stay. We are reviewing your comments with our team as we continually work to improve our guest experience.

Summary: Good location relative to Disneyland, 15 minute walk to the parks.  Grab and go breakfast was fine, fruits, muffins, bars, yogurt, coffee, tea and juices.  Room had everything we needed/expected and noise level facing street was tolerable.  However, the bedsheet had a blood stain, making us doubt if it was changed.  We were then told that to get fresh sheets we have to go pick them up from the front desk!?  Then another trip to the front desk to pick up the missing blanket for the sofa bed. Poor cleanliness and service. We stayed at the other major brand hotel across the street and had a much better experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and are very sorry we fell short in meeting and exceeding your expectations of an exceptional stay. We are reviewing your comments with our team as we continually work to improve our guest experience. I sincerely apologize and if this was not properly handled by my staff I will certainly make an address this with them. Thank you again for your time and feedback, I truly hope you will give us another chance to earn your confidence back.

Summary: The Hyatt House is reasonably priced and a 10 minute walk from Disneyland. We loved the family room with one king bed, plus bunk beds and a fold out couch. We also had a suite with a full kitchen. We shopped at a local grocery store and prepared breakfast every morning before we left for the parks. Staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We are pleased to see you and the family enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for your kind words, as they will be shared with our team. Here at Hyatt we strive to provide the best customer service possible. We hope to see you and the family again soon!

Summary: As for the hotel, we have stayed at a lot over the last year during covid protocols, and this one was tough between not servicing for the room for stays under 5 days, and the wait for elevators, since they are only allowing 1 family per elevator.  The last thing you want to do after a long day at Disneyland is come back to your hotel and stand on a long line just to get an elevator back to your room.  The one bright spot was the staff.  Everyone was very helpful. Especially Richard in matience.  He went above and beyond when our car had a dead battery at checkout.  Thank you Richard!
Manager Response: I apologize that your experience was anything less than satisfying. Feedback such as yours assists us in improving our service and property. We hope you'll accept our sincerest apologies for falling short on our high service standards. While we do our best to always deliver a smooth experience, it appears we fell short and did not meet expectations during your visit. We hope to afford your time again in the future.

Summary: As a family of 5 with two teens we’ve stayed here a few times. It’s so convenient to DL and CA parks. We stay until the park closes so we appreciate the short walk back to the hotel when we’re tired. This time due to the extra screens to enter the park we got in line at 6:30 am and then the next day to recover we slept in so we missed breakfast both mornings. I understand it was grab and go. Parking is always great for security, plenty of spaces and accommodates our large SUV. The room was comfortable for everyone in our family. We brought dinner in which was relaxing. They had warned us our room wouldn’t be cleaned given our two night stay which was fine with us. We had enough towels for everyone and all our garbage fit in the van provided. Blackout curtains and A/C worked
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so pleased to see that you continue to choose Hyatt House as your choice hotel when visiting Anaheim. Here at Hyatt House we strive to provide the best customer service and seeing positive reviews such as yours makes it all worth it! Your kind words will be shared with our staff, we hope to see you and the family again soon!

Summary: Based on the great reviews and the fact that we always stay at a Hilton Hotel, we were expecting quality rooms. 1) The kid above must have been practicing for a marathon, running and jumping non-stop. Starting at 5:00 am everyday. It was loud and shook our room so hard the TV would shake. 2) The head boards in each of the rooms we reserved were gross!! They were peeling and coming off of the head board. 3) the sofa beds were old, dirty and worn out, my kids slept upside because the beds weren’t unfolding properly. 4) my mom, daughter and grand daughter got some kind of bug bite, I’m assuming flea bites all over there feet and ankles. 5) the refrigerator didn’t close all the way so the alarm was beeping constantly. Annoying.  *the outside, the lobby and the pool area are all very
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and are very sorry we fell short in meeting and exceeding your expectations of an exceptional stay. We are reviewing your comments with our team as we continually work to improve our guest experience.

Summary: I stayed with a few girl friends for a weekend recently and everything was great. The rooms were clean and spacious, and we hung out by the pool for a whole day. We felt extra safe since you have to use your room key to go up to the guest floors in the elevator. One night, we walked just a few blocks to have dinner at Downtown Disney. There is also a Starbucks on the ground floor, some other fast casual eateries, and I think it was a Walgreens. SO great in case you need anything during your stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 5 star stay at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations.

Summary: We just returned from a three night stay.  This stay was before the California's full reopening so many things we experienced may no longer be relevant.  I will say the staff was friendly and great. We did not have housekeeping service while there but we did request an additional blanket and toiletries.  Items were delivered quickly and with friendliness and that was all that really mattered.  Room size was good and everything was well appointed.  We were there for a Disneyland trip and never had much time to spend in the room, but we would definitely choose to here stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 5 out of 5 at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Location is close to disney. Rooms are on the smaller size Currently only offering yogurt, muffin to go as breakfast. It seems as if hotel is understaff our room Never got restocked with toilet paper we only had one roll in room. I requested to get room vacuum on day 4 since I have small kids but my request got ignored as well as my replacement for bath towels. We stayed for a total of 6 nights 7 days and they never serviced our hotel room. When we did the check in we were told that on day four they would clean I brought it up to management and they simply apologized with a sorry for a misunderstanding but that with covid they would only service the room on a stay longer than 6 days. To me it doesnt make sense but oh well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations. Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience. At Hyatt House, we promise to do whatever it takes to ensure you are satisfied, I hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: A great place to stay!!!! I want to thank Samantha and Jade for helping me with an early checkout!!!!  As for the room… VERY CLEAN!!!!!!!!  Wonderful service.  If your looking for a stay close to the Disneyland Resort… you found it! Also just steps away from a Walgreens or CVS, your choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We are so happy to see that you enjoyed your stay with us here at Hyatt House. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: New, Clean, Easy Disneyland walk, easy parking
Summary: We get a suite for four with bunk bed. Always clean, fresh and ready. Breakfast is better than most but closed due to COVID. You can't get covid from breakfast. :) Pool table and outdoor eating is nice but it was all closed due to covid too. You can't get covid from a pool table or eating outdoors.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we hope to see you again soon now that restrictions have been further lifted in the state of California.

Summary: The check in process was great.  Super friendly, and worked well to provide us with excellent service! Due to restrictions, the breakfast options were not so great.  Other than that, our stay was awesome!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! Please know that we are currently working on improving our breakfast options now that restrictions are being lifted in the state of California. We hope to see you and the family again soon!

Summary: We opted to stay here the night before our Disneyland day. Because I'm an Explorist member, they gave us a complimentary upgrade to a park-view den room on the top floor. It was fun seeing the "backside" of Disney from our room (the eight wonder of the world? #JungleCruiseJoke). This location could not be more perfect. It's about a 10-minute walk from the Disneyland entrance on Harbor. There's a Starbucks, Walgreens, and a couple restaurants right next to the lobby. The room was a bit dated, but it was spacious and comfortable for the two of us. They even let us leave our car in the garage for the day after checking out so that we didn't have to worry about parking at Disney. This is a perfect option for people who want to be near the parks!
Manager Response: Thank you for completing our Guest Survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel. Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us and we will utilize your response to make every guest experience the best it can be. I greatly appreciate your kind words and they will be celebrated with the entire team. If I can be of any assistance to you, please contact me directly. We look forward to being of service to you in the near future.

Summary: Room was clean, room was available early and the location was very convenient.  Was able to cross the street to go to Disneyland.  It was even closer than the Mickey and Friends structure.  Would stay here again.  My only problem was that the pillows were too firm for my taste.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay. We are pleased to see you enjoyed it and we hope to see you and the family again soon.

Summary: This location is a great option for those with a small family or for an extended stay. The amenities in the room alone were beyond my expectations. I loved having the option to cook in the room if needed and we were able to accommodate our group of 5 comfortably.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to see you and your family had a wonderful stay with us, so much so that you were kind enough to share a review about it! We strive to provide the best customer service possible and we are so pleased to see we were able to achieve that. We hope to see your family again soon!

Summary: I wanted to shout out Z for being such a great front desk! He helped me and my friends with our parking situation. He was attentive and understanding. If you ever decide to stay at a resort near disney this is the one to stay at! There's starbucks, blaze pizza, and walgreens right down stairs. It's such a convenient place to stay at. They keep this place nice and clean. They also have a snack shop in the lobby with super reasonable prices. Shin Ramen for $2?! That's the best after a long day of walking and screaming.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing our Guest Survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel. Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us and we will utilize your response to make every guest experience the best it can be. I greatly appreciate your kind words and they will be celebrated with the entire team. If I can be of any assistance to you, please contact me directly. We look forward to being of service to you in the near future.

Summary: My husband and I normally stayed at a different brand of hotel when we go to Disneyland, but I was very happy with my choice of hotel this time. The hotel room was clean and the staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Loved our stay so much. We have stayed at hyatt hotels before but first time at this location and it was everything we needed. Short walk to the park, very clean room and staff was amazing! Will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your kind words! We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us and are pleased to see that we'll be seeing you again in the future!

Summary: We stayed here to visit the Disney parks and had a great stay. Loved the kitchen option in our room, everything was very clean and the staff were all helpful and kind. We had some extremely noisy guests above us late at night and the front desk was great at requesting they be quieter and they complied. We didn’t use the pool so cannot speak to that. I left my wallet locked in the safe after we checked out and the hotel housekeeping had set it aside and I went back to get it two days later and the staff were all very helpful in me retrieving it. We would definitely stay there again and were happy with the walking distance from the parks. Thank you for the great stay, Hyatt House!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay! We are so pleased that all departments here were able to provide you with the best possible customer service there is and even after you and the family checkout! We hope to see you all again soon.

Summary Heading: One of the better hotels I stayed at
Summary: Room looked and felt clean, staff was happy to help with any questions or issues I had and in a great location. There was hand sanitizer everywhere so I didn’t have any problems making sure my hands were clean and the to go breakfast is a great idea but had minimal options.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us, we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My family and I arrived with simple expectations due to the COVID-19 situation and didn’t require much because I was well informed of the adjustments being made at the time of our stay.  Upon arrival we discovered our room had either not been cleaned or was cleaned by someone wearing four fingered oversized Mickey Mouse hands.  Food was scrubbed into the carpet, crumbs crunched under our feet in the kitchen, the beds were made but missing pillows, the towels were absent and dirty dishes were left in the sink and dishwasher.  I asked for the room to be cleaned and explained the status to the front desk.  I was met with a refusal to clean the room and right the wrongs due to staff limitations and the COVID policy.  I told the employees we would not be in the room and would stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and are very sorry we fell short in meeting and exceeding your expectations of an exceptional stay. We are reviewing your comments with our team as we continually work to improve our guest experience. I sincerely apologize and if this was not properly handled by my staff I will certainly make address this with them. Thank you again for your time and feedback, I truly hope you will give us another chance to earn your confidence back.

Summary: We had an amazing stay this week at the hotel. The room was beyond clean and comfortable. The customer service was excellent and everything was so convenient. We would definitely stay here again. I highly recommend booking a stay here.   VM
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 5 star stay at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations

Summary: This hotel is nice but not fancy.  It is very close to everything which is a huge plus.  It lacks some of the finer things I was expecting.  The bar was closed which was a bust.  The staff was very pleasant.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are hoping to have our bar up and running soon once we get the approval. We hope to see you and the family again soon!

Summary: Went on a solo trip to Disneyland. The hotel was clean and comfortable and the staff was GREAT! So so kind and helpful! Especially Osiris and Samantha!  It’s super convenient with Starbucks and Walgreens just downstairs. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us! It is our goal to offer the best customer service for our guests at all times and I'm happy to see that this was executed. Your kind words will be shared with the staff, we hope to see you all soon!

Summary: This last visit was only one night, but it’s always worth it here. Every chance my family has to stay at the Hyatt House we do. Since it opened we gave it a shot and it’s been a winner time and time again. Solid choice for a family trip.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you and your family continue to enjoy staying with us! We strive to provide the best customer service to our guests every time. We hope to see you all again very soon!

Summary: We loved everything about our 5 day stay here! The room is lovely and clean, the staff were all friendly, and the kitchen was awesome to have! Also the floors and walls were pretty thick so we hardly heard a single neighbor.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing our Guest Survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel. Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us and we will utilize your response to make every guest experience the best it can be. I greatly appreciate your kind words and they will be celebrated with the entire team.

Summary: We recently stayed here so we can go to the Disneyland parks. I'm gonna break down our visit and why I took away two stars   Overall the stay was great, the hotel room was very clean, we had a one bedroom suite with views of Disneyland. That was pretty awesome! The size of the kitchen was great, the common living area was also really big, and the bedroom was a good size. We also love that I was right next to a Walgreen so if we needed some thing we can just go right next-door to get it  OK here are why I took away the two stars. When we arrived and checked and they did not welcome me as a Hyatt member, she was going to charge me $22 for parking which as a member I get $15 for parking. On their Instagram page they said that Hyatt members receive a special bad, they didn't even
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and are very sorry we fell short in meeting and exceeding your expectations of an exceptional stay. We are reviewing your comments with our team as we continually work to improve our guest experience.  Thank you again for your time and feedback, I truly hope you will give us another chance to earn your confidence back.

Summary: we have one bedroom with view. location is great. 15min walk to Disney land entrance. room is spacious but poorly design of room door and bathroom door opening area. Clean Towels. Nice Kitchen. Bathtub is very slippery.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 5 star stay at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations.

Summary: We had an incredible stay at the Hyatt House.  The front desk staff went above and beyond to help us celebrate our daughter's 5th birthday after they found out the reason for our trip.  They made a special welcome basket for her complete with balloons!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. Here at Hyatt we take every response into consideration as it allows us to continually grow as a team and as a hotel. I am glad that we were able to meet your expectations and provide you excellent service. We do our very best to try and care for all of our guests so that they can be their best. Thank you for deciding to stay with us and we hope to see you in the near future

Summary: Our stay at the Hyatt House was clean, comfortable, and conveniently located to Disneyland. They also had a free grab and go breakfast during the pandemic, free WiFi, and check out of 12:00pm. We enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 5 star stay at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations.

Summary: Traveling with toddlers and a teen it was the nice the studio room was set up with no sharp corners for my active boys. The teen had a place to lay down and be near but far enough to relax. I like the kitchen set up with plates, cups, cookware and utensils.  We were on the 2nd floor and the first night we had to get use to the noise from cars passing. We come from a quite town so it was different.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 5 star stay at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations.

Summary: Reason for stay was to go to Disneyland and it is in a great location. Easy walk to the parks and has some nearby food. As a hyatt globalist I was upgraded to a very nice room with a kitchen and refgarator. The front desk staff was very nice. The only thing lacking was water pressure in the shower. Overall great stay and will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 5 star stay at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel, we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Awesome property close to restaurants and Disney. We were greeted by the nicest front desk person I ever met. They already had our scooter rental on-site for us. The room itself was awesome full kitchen with dishwasher stove plates and everything you need. Pool was right outside our room. It was great.

Summary Heading: I should have taken a picture! Another stellar stay at the Hyatt House across from Disney!
Summary: This is the second time staying at this AWESOME Hyatt House right across the street from Disneyland!!!  Just like last time, we had incredible friendly service from the very beginning including an unsolicited upgrade!!  I titled this review as such because I meant to take a picture of the bathroom and totally forgot.  As a self admitted germaphobe.... this bathroom was 10/10 in cleanliness.  One of the first things I do when checking into a hotel room is to look at the shower... is there staining?  Is there mold in the grout or where the tile meets the tub?  Is there an unsightly crack that just makes it appear dirty?  These are just some of the things I look for.  This bathroom was IMMACULATE!  Not a single spot of ickiness anywhere in the tub or tile!  Or anywhere else in the

Summary: If you have a Tesla or electric vehicle then you can immediately cross this place off your list for consideration. Done. You’re welcome.   Need more details? There are 2 free Tesla destination charging stalls and they charge about 7kw speed, basic, nothing fancy. Here’s the problem: demand is far higher than supply; few hotels around Disneyland have chargers so if you’re filtering your search for EV charging then this is one of only a handful of options. I counted no less than 8 Tesla’s in the parking lot in addition to the 2 that occupied the charging stalls. We all fight for those spots, not pleasant. Summary: This hotel is in a prime location. The walk to Disneyland took maybe 15-20 min, and the cost of the rooms is pretty decent considering how nice they were. There’s a Starbucks right downstairs, which is a win for some. There are also a plethora of dining places and even a Walgreens / other convenience stores literally on the same corner. The only things that bothered me was my room, although nice, seemed cramped; the parking garage was convenient, but the spots were really tight unless you got an end spot; and the dresser in my room kept opening on its own because it wasn’t level, which got annoying. Overall great value and would stay again.

This hotel hit those marks and above at a very affordable price.  Our room was big and roomy. The kitchen was well equipped with a large refrigerator. Everything was clean, comfortable, and orderly. The room was perfect for our family.  Some other pros was that the hotel staff was friendly. The location is within easy  walking distance of the park. Summary: My wife and I have stayed at the Hyatt House a couple years ago when we took our daughter to her first visit to Disneyland, and we wanted to stay there again.  We arrived at the hotel and we're told that the room we had booked and pre paid for was unavailable (Standard with King bed), and they gave us a choice of free upgrade to a family suite with a king bed, or a suite with two queens and a kitchette, we weren't going to be staying long and we like having more room to spread out so we took the king bed.  Staff is always polite, professional, and friendly.  The only issue we had is we have a Tesla and was told there were chargers in the underground garage, when there actually wasn't.  There are however 4-6 chargers in the parking lot near Walgreens, not a huge deal for us.

Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your input about your stay with Hyatt House! Know that feedback such as yours is greatly appreciated. I am pleased to hear you and the family enjoyed yourselves while staying with us.   If there is anything else you and the family may need next time please let us know! We always welcome constructive feedback as well. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: So I booked Hyatt Place Anaheim originally, but that location was experiencing low occupancy and forwarded my reservation to Hyatt House Anaheim. I was placed in a Studio 2 Queen on a higher floor. I had a feeling of quiet luxury and freedom not normally enjoyed in a hotel of this size. I actually forgot which room I was in (it was very late) and got lost in the maze of hallways.  Stay was eerily quiet and I'm sure all... ten (?) of us guests enjoyed our stay.  I had a nice workcation and appreciated that they kept the pool available for us. The compact kitchenette is extremely nifty - just enough for a small family and perfect for individuals.  I understand other customer concerns about hotel value right now, with all the reduced services & amenities.  I think the value is
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out our guest survey. Here at Hyatt we take every response into consideration as it allows us to continually grow as a team and as a hotel. I am glad that we were able to meet your expectations and provide you excellent service. We do our very best to try and care for all of our guests so that they can be their best. Thank you for deciding to stay with us and we hope to see you in the near future. If there is anything that I can do to be of any assistance to you now or in the future feel free to reach out to me directly.

Summary Heading: Nice and clean but value of stay could be improved
Summary: Breakfast during COVID was a bruised banana and pre-packaged muffin. Quite a bit different from the "awesome" breakfast I read about in the reviews. There was also a surprise $22 per night fee charged for parking. The hotel was fine and clean, but for what I ended up paying, I do NOT feel it was a good value at all. Prices per night need to be adjusted to take into account the weird time we are all living in right now and any hidden fees need to be applied to the price at the time of making a reservation.
Manager Response: We hope you'll accept our sincerest apologies for falling short on our high service standards. While we do our best to always deliver a smooth experience, it appears we fell short and did not meet expectations during your visit.  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and are very sorry we fell short in meeting and exceeding your expectations of an exceptional stay. We are reviewing your comments with our team as we continually work to improve our guest experience

Summary: The staff was very friendly. I did not get the same room i originally booked online but it was still a nice room. Very clean and felt safe. I didn’t get a chance to eat the free breakfast but loved the idea of it being individually packaged.  I loved the under ground parking as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 9 or 10 at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations. We look forward to your return. I hope you have a great rest of your night.

Summary: The hotel staff were very nice and helpful. Our room was clean and it was nice having a little kitchen in our room. It is walking distance to restaurants, Walgreens, CVS, and about 10 minutes to Disneyland. The only thing I didn’t like was they charged an extra $25.74 per night for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing our Guest Survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel. I apologize that your experience was anything less than satisfying. Feedback such as yours assists us in improving our service and property. We hope you'll accept our sincerest apologies for falling short on our high service standards. While we do our best to always deliver a smooth experience, it appears we fell short and did not meet expectations during your visit. If I can be of any assistance to you, please contact me directly.

Summary Heading: I wouldn't come here again if you have children and are not capable of stepping lightly
Summary: Hotel was clean, empty as I would expect with others.  We got several complaints TOWARDS us by the person/people staying directly beneath us for noise.  I have two little ones and wasn't quite sure what "noise" was being made as they were well behaved and in bed watching cartoons when we got numerous phone calls from the front desk indicating noise.  The person beneath us also repeatedly banged on the wall/ceiling very very loudly while.  One time, we got back to the room at 7:30, within 5 minutes he was banging on the walls and ceiling again regarding the "noise." There was no noise.  Instead of kicking the jerk out of the hotel, the management suggested we move instead.  We weren't banging on walls or celings or running around.  Essentially, unless we tip-toed (which we did at
Manager Response: We hope you'll accept our sincerest apologies for falling short on our high service standards. While we do our best to always deliver a smooth experience, it appears we fell short and did not meet expectations during your visit.

Summary: Super friendly staff. Hotel was really really clean. My wife and i came here for a quick getaway, and this hotel was top notch. Tons of things to do nearby, even in the age of Covid closures. Thank you to the staff
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out our guest survey. Here at Hyatt we take every response into consideration as it allows us to continually grow as a team and as a hotel. I am glad that we were able to meet your expectations and provide you excellent service. We do our very best to try and care for all of our guests so that they can be their best. Thank you for deciding to stay with us and we hope to see you in the near future. If there is anything that I can do to be of any assistance to you now or in the future feel free to reach out to me directly.

Summary: We were evacuating fires in OC during COVID. Thank you for your hospitality and wonderful service. Hyatt waived parking and offered generous discounts. They even gave us free takeout breakfast and coffee. Can’t thank them enough. They could’ve taken full advantage of families fleeing from fire when their hotels were empty but didn’t. That says a lot about their brand.    Beyond my desperation and gratitude....this hotel is in prime location. There are several restaurants within walking distance and a pharmacy right next door. Disneyland is very close by. Nice spacious rooms, comfortable bed and friendly staff. The cleaning staff was constantly wiping down high traffic areas.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out our guest survey. Here at Hyatt we take every response into consideration as it allows us to continually grow as a team and as a hotel. I am glad that we were able to meet your expectations and provide you excellent service. We do our very best to try and care for all of our guests so that they can be their best. Thank you for deciding to stay with us and we hope to see you in the near future. If there is anything that I can do to be of any assistance to you now or in the future feel free to reach out to me directly. I hope you have a great start to your week!

Summary Heading: Other hotels give you free parking
Summary: I have been to many hotels and I have never paid more 50 dollars more than the advertised price. I paid over $100 dollars for taxes and parking and other “fees”. Would recommend getting a different hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a World of Hyatt member, you are our most valued guest. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations. Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience. At Hyatt House, we promise to do whatever it takes to ensure you are satisfied, I hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: We had a quick overnight trip planned to drop off kid at college and see friends. This hotel had easy check in and check out procedures in place.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  It was very clear that this hotel has made preparations for covid-19.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 5 at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations. We look forward to your return.

Summary: I’ve stayed here with our little family of 5. We choose the family suite with the bunk beds and it was perfect! The hotel was very clean and the staff is very pleasant. The pool has a great method to make a reservation so they can ensure the proper amount of occupancy (only on Saturdays and 1:45min per reservation)   Reina was especially helpful with ensuring our accommodations were met. Her customer service exceeded our expectations and she is a great asset to your company!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. Here at Hyatt House we take every response into consideration as it allows us to continually grow as a team and as a hotel. I am glad that we were able to meet your expectations and provide you excellent service. Thank you for deciding to stay with us and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Family vacation, bed bugs, DVD player not working, TV not working, no housekeeping, no maintenance - DO NOT RECOMMEND!
Summary: For over $200/nt for a 2 queen suite (expanded) during mid-week when Disneyland is closed, we expected much more. Upon check-in, parking was another $17/nt plus taxes. DVD player was not working, so we requested a replacement. After the movie was over, TV was not working. Called the front desk at 7am, and was informed that maintenance would not be in until 2pm. So we bought a bunch of DVD's from Target. Then we asked if housekeeping could vacuum the living area where the kids were playing. They sent up a vacuum and the dust bag was completely full! My husband was not okay with breathing that dirty air, so we asked for the dust bag to replaced. The staff who brought it to us knocked on the door when the do not disturb sign was hung and it woke up our 1 year old who was sleeping
Manager Response: We hope you'll accept our sincerest apologies for falling short on our high service standards. While we do our best to always deliver a smooth experience, it appears we fell short and did not meet expectations during your visit.  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and are very sorry we fell short in meeting and exceeding your expectations of an exceptional stay.

Summary Heading: We got to the room.......That feeling that it's dirty.....Pubic......
Summary: We got to the room.......That feeling that it's dirty.....Pubic hairs ALL OVER THE BATHROOM COUNTER, toilet, shower, floor. FOOD CRUMBS ALL OVER THE DINGY DARK FLOOR. Tiny room, but worst of all. I came in with my mask on but reentered with child in arms and luggage rack and the clerk and assistant manager YELLED at me to get my mask on. I said, "OK, I will" as I kept walking out of the crowd of 10 Asian people not social distancing at the counter and a few not wearing masks. HAHAHA. The female guest with me was not even wearing a mask and they SAID NOTHING to her at all. They ran after me continuing to scream and threaten me in front of my guests and family. Are you kidding me? Three women not wearing masks in front of the manager and she singles me out and runs after me
Manager Response: We hope you'll accept our sincerest apologies for falling short on our high service standards. While we do our best to always deliver a smooth experience, it appears we fell short and did not meet expectations during your visit.  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and are very sorry we fell short in meeting and exceeding your expectations of an exceptional stay.

Summary: stayed with my family and we had an amazing time together, very helpful staffed and they took care of all our needs, we are definitely coming back to stay here in 2 more weeks for a few days, thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We strive to provide all of our guests with services that can be rated a 5 at Hyatt House. We are thrilled that we could provide you an experience that exceeded your expectations. We look forward to your return.

Summary: The rooms were clean, classy, and comfortable.The breakfast was delicious with many choices. The location is within walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure. The staff were amazing; friendly, helpful and accommodating. This is our second time staying at this location and we will choose it everytime!
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback jilllybbert! WE appreciate you taking the time to write such kind words about our hotel and amenities, and hope you decide to stay with us again on your next Anaheim trip. We'd love to host you again!

Summary: Well....this is our Go to Hotel in Anaheim. Because, The staff are Friendly, helpful , the breakfast is great, the location....two take out restaurants right under the hotel, easy walk to Disneyland,and, you can watch the fireworks at night from your room, stroll down the street to the Cheesecake Factory, Roy's, Pf Changs....walk to the AMC Movie house, and if I feel ....   like a late night snack..Walgreens is right there. Like a Boomerang...we will be back (Who else said that ?😂😘) Susie & Tony.
Manager Response: We are happy to see that you enjoyed your overall stay with us and that you found the hotel to be great. Thank you for sharing your comments. Thank you for posting a review about our hotel. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience.

Summary Heading: Love this home away from home!
Summary: My first time at any Hyatt Hotel...I selected this hotel for it's location from both Disney parks (10-15 minute walk). I  Initially booked the rolm through a 3rd party online website. Next time I'll be booking directly through the Hyatt app. The room rates are the same or better and you get to rack up points!... we arrived early and Marianna was a polite and friendly front desk receptionist that helped us check in early. (Marianna really made our day). Most hotels are very strict with the check in time and she made our processes very seemless and stress free!... Our room was clean and had a good view on the top floor. The kitchen is stocked with necessities and restroom had the normal toiletries and plenty of towels.... The breakfast is great and tasty! Check out is at 12pm and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice feedback! We greatly appreciate all of the kind words and we will make sure to pass along your words of praise to our staff. We always try to keep our rooms updated and fresh, we appreciate you for noticing that. Thank you again for your review and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you as our guest agai!

Summary Heading: Super convenient, very comfortable, upper-mid range accommodations
Summary: We recently stayed 5 nights for a Disneyland vacation.  Room rates are very competitive for a hotel of this caliber (though we were able to stay using our World of Hyatt points) and the location really can't be beat.  It's about a 10 minute walk to the entrance to the Disneyland and California Adventure theme parks and since that's where we would be spending all our time we didn't need to rent a car or pay for parking (which is now far too common among hotels in the area.  The room was well appointed with a comfy king size bed, flat screen tv (we didn't really use it but it had the capability to cast streaming services from your laptop or phone to the TV), fridge, and microwave.  It only had a stand up shower (no tub) but that was fine for us.  The sectional couch was nice and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued World of Hyatt member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel and the breakfast buffet. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service we appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: About as good as a Motel 6
Summary: Room was about what I expected. Cleanliness was not up to par. We asked for additional sheets for the hide-a-bed and were given sheets with holes and very visibly worn. We asked for replacement sheets that were also worn. Breakfast was a little better than a Motel 6. Parking is $22/day and they will not let you use the empty spots in the lot.
Manager Response: We apologize that the cleanliness of your room was not up to standard. Please know that this is not typical of our property. We will make sure to take your comments to heart and do everything we can to improve. Please let us know next time you are in the area. We will share your comments with our cleaning team and make sure to follow-up appropriately. We look forward to your next stay in the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while visiting Disneyland
Summary: Very clean, very modern and very comfortable. Within a 10 minute walk to the park, this hotel was the perfect location for our family. Close enough to walk but far enough to be out of the noise and traffic.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay. Thank you for the compliments regarding the room. We are so I am glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary Heading: Staff was rude, room was dirty
Summary: The room was not clean. I stay i a lot of hyatts and this was my first bad experience. the staff was rude and didn't want to be bothered as they talked amongst themselves. i always chose hyatt but this location i will never visit again.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize that your experience with us was not perfect. We would love to see what we can do to in order to correct your experience with us. Please feel free to contact me directly. I look forward to assisting you

Summary: This was a great place to stay. The rooms were clean and quiet and as expected. The breakfast was good, the staff in the dining room were very friendly and accommodating. The only thing we would improve is to change up the breakfast selections a bit more. The front desk staff were helpful and pleasant to deal with. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice feedback! We greatly appreciate all of the kind words and we will make sure to pass along your words of praise to our staff. We always try to keep our rooms updated and fresh, we appreciate you for noticing that.

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Hyatt House
Summary: Our stay at the Hyatt House in Anaheim exceeded our expectations.  Our one bedroom suite was perfect for our family of five. Very spacious and well maintained.  The pool provided a nice break when we needed to rest from all the fun at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Our go to hotel but no longer
Summary: My family and I planned a last minute trip the day of after the kids ending up having no school and it was my fiance's birthday. we went late Monday afternoon to check in, receptionist then was great. When I got there I realized we have an appointment we set up months back online on skype with our ring maker for our wedding bands at 12 noon Tuesday. I told the receptionist this when I first checked in and she said there shouldn't be any issues from what she is seeing but to double check tomorrow. So tomorrow morning after our breakfast I approached the front desk to ask for a half hour late check out since our appointment is at 12 and checkout is at 12 just so we can have our skype meeting in a quiet setting. Mariana never greeted me and when I told her what was going on the
Manager Response: I am sorry that you were disappointed by the other aspects of your stay. We expect our team to deliver excellent service, and I apologize that we disappointed you. I have shared your feedback with our team and we are working to ensure we avoid these problems in the future. I appreciate you sharing honest feedback, as it gives us an opportunity to improve.

Summary: We’ve stayed at a couple of other nearby hotels and the Hyatt was by far the best. A short ten minute walk to the Disney Park. The room was clean and spacious, and noise transfer from other rooms and halls were minimal. The daily breakfast buffet was great.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are pleased that you enjoyed the cleanliness of our rooms and our breakfast. We would love to have you come stay with us again next time you are in town. Thank you again!

Summary: Great location and a very easy walk to Disneyland after a REALLY great breakfast with lots of choices!  Lots and lots of variety in places to eat. Rooms are well suited for families and there is a pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback 522hanks! We appreciate you giving our breakfast such a friendly shout out, and are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Please come back and stay with us again!

Summary: We stop by the Hyatt House to have a few drinks at the H-Bar to celebrate my friend’s  bday. We were greeted by Richard the AGM he made our experience a memorable one with his amazing cocktails 🍹he made for us. We will definitely be back🙌🏼.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback geeklan06! WE appreciate you taking the time to write such kind words about your H Bar experience. Our staff is constantly striving to improve the services we offer, and we hope on your next Anaheim trip you visit us again!

Summary: The beds were very hard.  We were very disappointed with the decor of the suite we had upgraded to as it was NOT at all like pictures shown on internet.  There was no fireplace, no warm atmosphere.  It felt more like a prison cell.  The bathroom and bedroom doors continually bumped into each other - who designed that?  Was not worth the extra money for the upgrade.
Manager Response: We are sincerely apologetic that your stay with us was anything but the very best. We would love to help change your perception and invite you to come back whenever you are in the Anaheim area. Please feel free to contact me directly, I would love to assist.

Summary: We're in the area for a company party at the Disney Hotel, and this is only one mile from it.  The hotel is brand new, very clean, and is next to Walgreen's and Starbucks, and some restaurants.  It's a perfect location, with modern, no muss no fuss decor,  There is free breakfast, which is eggs, sausage, oatmeal, bread.    There's a few other Hyatt hotels nearby but this one definitely won me over because it's BRAND NEW.  There's a microwave in the room, and it's just a nice hotel overall.    Staff is friendly and very helpful.  We get to ask for complementary water bottles.  Elevator can get a bit slow, but nothing to complain about.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind feedback. We look forward to having you stay with us again for your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: My friends and I decided to come and pre game for our friends 40th Birthday!! Best decision and experience at the H-Bar.  Richard AGM was Amazing, with great drink selection and very attentive to us. We will def come back very soon🎉🥂
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments regarding your experience in our H Bar. We greatly appreciate your feedback. Thank you again for your review and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you as our guest again.

Summary: Richard welcomed us with a smile. He served amazing drinks that sutied our tase buds. The server recommended "the Richard special" it contains vodka and carnberry and other key ingredients. Thank you for the great service.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice feedback! We greatly appreciate all of the kind words. To read that you enjoyed your amazing cocktails is wonderful to learn. Thank you for sharing your comments.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay, spent a long weekend with a busy agenda.  Cheer at the convention Center and Disneyland.  All walking distance made it a convenient place to stay.  Lovely employees as well! Thank you Hyatt House!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are glad you had a wonderful stay. We look forward to having you stay with us next year!

Summary: Very clean, well kept, super friendly staff and a nice big breakfast. Even the coffee was good and I'm a coffee snob. The pool area was also lovely, we spent some time soaking up the sun there. The parkade is nice and bright and well marked.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive ch00se2behappy! WE appreciate you taking the time to write such kind words about our hotel and amenities, and hope you decide to stay with us again on your next Anaheim trip. We'd love to host you again!

Summary Heading: A great place to stay for a Disneyland trip!
Summary: Hot breakfast included, but if you eat there more than twice, it is pretty much the same things every day with precious little variation. The staff are friendly and helpful, the rooms are fine. The bartender is nice and competent. Will chat if you want, will leave you alone if you want. Picks up on non-verbal queues well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We greatly appreciate the consideration in choosing to stay with us! We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: No integrity, honesty, and sense of urgency
Summary: We checked-in on Jan 9, 2020 for 2 nights and we were at Room 452. We had 3 kids with us and its really hard to keep track all of our stuffs especially when our twin toddlers cried before we checked out. We forgot Pandora necklaces, a pair of earrings, and a Ray-ban glasses in one of the drawers and we reported it the next day (Sunday). It seems like they don’t have sense of urgency and does not care. We had to call them couple of times before the manager reached out to us. The Manager promised on Jan 18, 2020 that the insurance will call us for details. No one from Petra insurance called even after so many follow-ups. Today, February 15, 2020 I just called them and couldn’t connect me to the Manager. I would not recommend this hotel to any of my families and friends.
Manager Response: I am sorry that you were disappointed by the other aspects of your stay. We expect our team to deliver excellent service, and I apologize that we disappointed you. I have shared your feedback with our team and we are working to ensure we avoid these problems in the future. I appreciate you sharing honest feedback, as it gives us an opportunity to improve.

Summary Heading: Perfect spot for families heading to Disneyland parks
Summary: I chose this hotel because from the map, it looked like an easy walk to Disneyland parks and it did not disappoint! It was such an easy and pleasant walk even a long, tiring day at the park.  The hotel itself is nice. The elevators tend to be packed but the wait was not bad. Perfect for families with the amount of space and amenities. Breakfast is plentiful and just as you would expect from this type of a hotel.   Service was generally good. The lobby area seemed always busy but that's because there are gobs of families coming in and out.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for sharing your comments about your visit. I'm very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I will share your compliments with our team. Thanks again - we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: The perfect stay for a Disneyland trip
Summary: First off, the location is perfect for a Disneyland trip. It is just a short walk straight up Harbor Blvd to the entrance of the parks. There are also a handful or restaurants within a couple blocks which makes finding food incredibly easy. As for the room, we were in a typical hotel room (no kitchen, just a mini fridge and microwave) with a king bed and a pull-out bed in the sofa. We would have liked to try a room with a kitchen but only the king room was bookable with points. The room was spacious and we were on the top floor facing the Disney Parks so we could see the fireworks perfectly from there which was cool. Apart from the occasional loud car or emergency vehicle (out of the hotel's control), the room was very quiet. I never heard anything coming from neighboring rooms
Manager Response: Thanks so much for sharing your comments about your visit. I'm very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I will share your compliments with our team. Thanks again - we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great hotel! Perfect for families and little kids
Summary: We love this hotel! Our new favorite! All our family members stay here now for our Disneyland trips. We love the big, clean rooms, and Pull out couch. Kitchen for kids milk and snacks. Plenty of space for kids, luggage, Disneyland needs, snacks, & stroller. Hotel is a close walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are glad you loved our amenities. We are also pleased that the room was big enough to accommodate your whole family and you were able to take advantage of our surrounding area. We look forward to having you stay with us for your next Disneyland venture!

Summary: This was within walking distance of Disneyland, local restaurants, and local nightlife. The heated pool and breakfast made for a wonderful experience for my children especially. We will definitely be returning to the Hyatt House for our next Disneyland stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We greatly appreciate the consideration in choosing to stay with us and we are glad you were able to take advantage of our pool & breakfast options! We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Great hotel for a family stay at Disneyland.  Family suite was perfect for a family of 4, the kids loved the bunk beds and said they were very comfortable.  The hotel staff was very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel after your recent stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience. We look forward to having you stay with us again when you are in the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Enjoyed my stay at the Hyatt House.
Summary: The Hyatt House is walking distant to Disneyland, room was big and clean. Breakfast room was big so plenty of seats, food are basic with pancakes, eggs, sausages, etc.  you will get two bottles water daily while staying there. I would suggested get a room not close to the street, I can hear cars go by all night.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words! All of us here at the Hyatt House appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel, and we can't wait to service you again in the future. See you soon!

Summary: This hotel is only a few blocks from Disney, so that was great. The mattresses are rock hard so I did not sleep well. Parking is reasonable and way more convenient than Disney. I recommend this hotel for the location, but other than that, nothing special.
Manager Response: We are sincerely apologetic that your stay with us was anything but the very best. I appreciate you sharing honest feedback, as it gives us an opportunity to improve. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: I stayed here two nights as part of a visit to Disneyland.  The room is great and super functional.  It really includes everything you need for a short or extended stay.  Walgreen's, Starbucks are both super convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your wonderful review and we look forward to having you stay with us again when you are in the Anaheim area!

Summary: We stayed here during our trip to Disneyland.  When the Front Desk staff learned that it was my son's birthday, they sent up his choice of fruit or cupcake and gave him a cute Mickey Mouse Birthday card.  The laundry facilities came in handy when my 5-yr old had an accident.  The rooms were clean and comfortable and the kitchen was stocked with everything we needed to fix a quick breakfast before heading to the park.  We would definitely stay here again on our next Disneyland visit.
Manager Response: What wonderful things you had to say about your experience! Thank you for letting us know about the nice service, clean room and good food. We are glad that everything went well throughout your stay and we look forward to your next Anaheim adventure.

Summary Heading: Excellent stay for Anaheim Convention Center event
Summary: The Hyatt House exceeded my expectations.  Was surprised to see a much bigger room than anticipated, with a full kitchen, and the fitness room was bigger and more equipped than expected as well.  The complimentary breakfast wowed me and it was, again, beyond expectations.  Every employee I met, from checking in to hanging at the bar to the delightful woman on the cleaning staff, was a pleasure to talk to and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice feedback! We greatly appreciate all of the kind words and we will make sure to pass along your words of praise to our staff. We would love to have you come stay with us again next time you are in town. Thank you again!

Summary: The hotel is in a great location and very nice condition overall.  I would stay there again if our convention is at the same location next year.  The people at the check in desk were very friendly and answered any questions we had.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel after your recent stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience. We look forward to having you stay with us again when you are in the Anaheim area!

Summary: I was told by a friend that the bar at the Hyatt House would be a good place to watch the NFC Conference Final.  I live in Glendale, and I wasn't sure the drive to Anaheim would be worth it.  My friend was right.  Parking was easy.  They had plenty of TV screens.  They had a full bar with delicious food.  Since it was happy hour, there were plenty of specials as well.  The bar tender Edgar was amazing.  Even though there was a full crowd, he kept everyone happy, fed and made delicious drinks.  Thanks to Edagar and the Hyatt House for making this a memorable Sunday.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Thanks for the great compliments about our H Bar, and our Associate, Edgar! I will share your feedback with team. We hope that we will see you again when you return to Anaheim!

Summary: We came to celebrate one of my kids for 6th BD,and Crystal A. surprised my baby with cupcakes, Thank you so much for this detail🤗..... Also is a new hotel, it's super clean, huge and affordable prices.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice feedback! We greatly appreciate all of the kind. We always try to keep our rooms updated and fresh, we appreciate you for noticing that. Thank you again for your wonderful review and we look forward to having you stay with us again when you are in the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Reliable clean hotel with efficient service
Summary: We stayed in a 4th floor corner room and it was very quiet. Pros: Good breakfast, reasonable walking distance to park. As an alternative you can take the [free] Toy Story Disneyland shuttle from the parking lot across the street. Clean and efficient service. Check in and out a breeze. Beds were comfortable and accommodated 4 adults well. One of my sons slept on the sofa bed which was a bit noisy, but at least they didn’t have to share a bed. Cons: Towels were very thin and need to be replaced. The bathroom door has a glass panel and lets in all kinds of light into the room late at night. Also not a great sound barrier.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your wonderful review and we look forward to having you stay with us again when you are in the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Kind staff, clean rooms and comfy beds
Summary: Our stay was short but we enjoyed it very much. The staff was kind, courteous and very knowledgeable. The hotel was very clean and we had a good nights sleep on a very comfy bed. Centrally located with many conveniences and restaurants nearby. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback juanp0nce! WE appreciate you taking the time to write such kind words about our hotel and amenities, and hope you decide to stay with us again on your next Anaheim trip. We'd love to host you again!

Summary: Made our Disneyland trip very memorable. Great breakfast ss well. Beds were very comfortable and bathroom was spotless. My kids enjoyed that there were two tvs too. Loved the feel of being in a little apartment.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback annadgomez! WE appreciate you taking the time to write such kind words about our hotel and amenities, and hope you decide to stay with us again on your next Anaheim trip. We'd love to host you again!

Summary Heading: Comfortable, clean and near to the park
Summary: We had a very comfortable stay here with family during June 2019. HH is just 7~8 minutes walk from the park entrance. The rooms are very big & clean and a have kitchenette too which makes it very comfortable for a family with kids. The swimming pool is where kids enjoyed the most everyday after returning from the park. Breakfast is sumptuous. There are many restaurants and cafes adjoining the hotel which makes it very convenient to grab a quick bite.  Had a memorable and comfortable stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice feedback! We greatly appreciate all of the kind words and we will make sure to pass along your words of praise to our staff. We always try to keep our rooms updated and fresh, we appreciate you for noticing that. Thank you again for your review and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you as our guest again.

Summary: I go to Anaheim for the NAMM convention every January. This hotel was great. New, clean, friendly staff, easy everything. Great rooms! Highly recommended. The only thing that irked me was when I asked for a late checkout (an extra hour) and they wanted to charge $50. So I didn't do that. But otherwise  everything was great - beyond my expectations - and the pricing was extremely fair.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice feedback! We greatly appreciate all of the kind words and we will make sure to pass along your words of praise to our staff. We always try to keep our rooms updated and fresh, we appreciate you for noticing that. Thank you again for your kind recommendation, we always love when guests love us so much that they want to tell their friends.

Summary: The hotel was great. We attended the NAMM show for three days and had an excellent experience. The room quality was very good. I had a mini suite with a small kitchen and nice seating area. The staff was friendly and professional. Planning to stay there next year
Manager Response: What wonderful things you had to say about your experience! Thank you for letting us know about the nice service, clean room and good food. Thank you again for your review and we look forward to when you can stay with us again when you are back in Orange County

Summary: This hotel is close to the convention center and whilst simple gives you all you need - clean, good service, pleasant staff.  The breakfast is pretty good value and certainly enough to set you up for a busy day at the convention center
