Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay. Thank you for the compliments regarding the room, amenities and service. I will share your compliments with our team. Thanks again - we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: My Annual Home Away From Home
Summary: Once a year I attend the NAMM convention in Anaheim. After many years of exhibiting, I have stayed at many hotels near the ACC. For me, the Hyatt House strikes a perfect balance of location, price and quality. I booked for a second year this year and found my second experience to be just as good as my first. I will keep coming back as long as I can book in time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on our hotel Getaway47177988952! We appreciate you giving out staff such a friendly shout out, and are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Please come back and stay with us again!

Summary: Hotel was close to the convention, Free breakfast was hot and good for a buffet style... Room was nice ... a bit noisy when trying to sleep, but its the Namm Show this is what to expect when 120,000 music industry people invade the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel after your recent stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience.

Summary: We are world of Hyatt members and had requested and upgrade which was not accommodated the first night. That first night was rough, too many people in one room with not enough beds, as well as the room bordered the road, which was quite noisy and kept a few of us up. We requested that the new upgraded room be on the inside of the hotel. This was granted, they kept our luggage and called us as soon as the new room was ready. We decided to go ahead and get an additional room, since the pull out couch beds are really uncomfortable. They were able to block out another room right next to ours. The manager Josh was great and helpful through it all. Our older kids loved having their own room and own beds, made for much more peaceful and rested nights of sleep. The lobby is really nice,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We truly appreciate your acknowledgment of our breakfast selection and friendly staff. We are glad that everything went well throughout your stay and we look forward to your next Anaheim adventure.

Summary: I had the most amazing stay here for my family and my daughter birthday going to Disneyland ! The staff amazing the manger josh amazing ! Stay here and the beds how clean the rooms and bathrooms are we will be coming back
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We truly appreciate your acknowledgment our friendly staff. We are glad that everything went well throughout your stay and we look forward to your next Anaheim adventure.

Summary: The reason this place gets a 2 star is because the beds are hard and the Coach bed should not be considered a bed. Terrible....At the huge breakfast buffet that is huge they don’t provide hand sanitizer for guest as they go in. It’s grouse with the volume of people that all touch the same food handles and food serving utensils. My biggest complaint is that the bed that folds out from the sofa is so bad that not even a kid can sleep on it.  This is a problem whe. You have 3 adults and 2 kids in a 2 queen 1 bedroom with a sofa bed. After several attempts to remedy the problem including requesting to double the mattress the bed is still just a piece of cloth with springs and you can’t sleep on it. I complained 4 times to staff prior to getting another mattress hoping this would
Manager Response: Thank you for the detailed feedback. We feel terrible that your experience with us was not the best. We always strive for guests to be as comfortable as possible and it sounds like you have identified an opportunity for improvement. Rest assured we will take your comments to heart and do everything we can to recover from this. Please feel free to contact me directly when booking your next stay. I would love to make sure you are well taken care of on your next Anaheim venture.

Summary: I had to stay at this hotel for both business and also a mini family getaway to Disneyland. I was perfect for both. This is a new hotel so all the rooms and common areas are new. Bottled water is available and complementary. The hotel is walkable to Disneyland. For business the hotel had decent wifi and had plenty of room to spread out in. I had to be flexible with two days with family and two days with business and the hotel staff helped me out with different aspects of that for the trip. Overall a fantastic stay.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for sharing your comments about your visit. I'm very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I will share your compliments with our team. Thanks again - we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Chef George at the breakfast buffet was so kind and accommodating  with my celiac. He made me eggs each morning that were safe for me to eat and it was brought out to me with a bowl of fruit and covered in saran wrap. He did not make me feel like a bother at all and it was so much easier for me knowing I had a breakfast choice and I could eat with my family. The hotel itself was very good and comfortable and clean as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Thanks for the great compliments about our Chef and George! I will share your feedback with my team. We hope that we will see you again when you return to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: One of Hyatt's best properties for the money!
Summary: As a loyal Hyatt member, I had over 75 stays last year and this property is by far one of my favorites for the following reasons:  First, it's great for families.  We were upgraded to the bunk-bed suite which was amazing.  Second, the staff was friendly and very helpful.  Third, for a Hyatt House, the food was incredible.  Eggs, pancakes, hashbrows, etc...all cooked fresh.  Fourth, the pool area was great.  Fifth, you can't beat the location.  It's only a 20 minute walk to the park.  I can't commend this property enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay. Thank you for the compliments regarding the room, amenities and service. We look forward to having you stay with us again for your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary Heading: The only place to stay in the area
Summary: We love the Hyatt House in Anaheim. The rooms are am exceptional value, free breakfast is delicious, there's a Starbucks connected to it and it's a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. This trip we're celebrating our sons 4th birthday. We mentioned it to another guest who was also celebrating a birthday when one of the servers Margarita asked if he would like a small cake for his birthday. A few minutes later one of the managers and her came out with a peanut butter cup and chocolate cupcake (his favorite) and a candle. We all sang Happy birthday and our son was glowing. She even offered to have the cupcake sent up to our room if we didn't want him to eat it then. We had already booked another stay and we'll definitely be back after that.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice feedback! We greatly appreciate all of the kind words and we will make sure to pass along your words of praise to our staff. We look forward to having you stay with us again when you are in the Anaheim area!

Summary: Had a great stay at Hyatt House. Booked the Family Suite, which included bunk beds and separate room with tv and couch for the kids. Included breakfast was very good. Easy walk to Disneyland. Overall, a great option for visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your review and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you as our guest again.

Summary Heading: Great location for our Disney adventure
Summary: Stayed for 5 nights for our Disney experience. Great staff, venue and location - everything we needed either walkable or provided.  It would have been good to have a supermarket in the immediate area, but the hotel offered a grocery order/delivery service. Most of our needs were catered for by the stores in the area. Also a short cab ride for the outlet shops at Orange - well worth a visit for retail therapy!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review of our property! As always, we appreciate the consideration in choosing to stay with us and we are pleased that everyone had fun. We look forward to your next Disneyland venture.

Summary Heading: The Bartender Ana is the best
Summary: Ana in the bar is so kind and attentive. She makes an awesome lemon drop and her customer service is excellent! Ana is the reason we keep coming back to the Hyatt House in Anaheim. The hotel also provides a great happy hour with a good mix of drinks and food.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Thanks for the great compliments about Ana. We hope that we will see you again when you return to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: A good hotel, but less than ideal as a base of operations for a Disneyland visit
Summary: Pros: Friendly staff and clean rooms and common areas.  Generally quiet.  Good breakfast with plenty of hot and cold food choices.  A large number of inexpensive family friendly restaurants nearby. Nicely furnished rooms (however, only one USB charger port in the room - bring your wall plugs).  The things that make this hotel less than ideal for a long Disneyland stay are: - Distance.  The hotel is just barely within what I consider the maximum walking distance to Disneyland.  After a few days, it started feeling like it was beyond walking distance.  There is no hotel shuttle to Disneyland.  I don't like the public ART system which most hotels seem to be using nowadays. - Breakfast time.  Breakfast starts at 7 am on Saturday and Sunday.  Magic Morning at Disneyland starts at 7
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice feedback! We greatly appreciate all of the kind words and we will make sure to pass along your words of praise to our staff. We always try to keep our rooms updated and fresh, we appreciate you for noticing that. Thank you again for your review and we look forward to when you can stay with us again when you are back in Orange County.

Summary: Faster to walk to the park than bus or uber. None of the art buses were ever available and a Uber takes eight minutes for driving +3 to 4 minute wait and a walk is only 11 minutes to the park.  Also had 3 kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel after your recent stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience.

Summary: Loved the mini-kitchen and island in our room.  Hotel is nicely decorated, clean and modern.  Parking is reasonable and easy to access for in/out excursions.  The hotel is in a central location and the pool area is sunny and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your review and we look forward to when you can stay with us again when you are back in Orange County.

Summary Heading: Clean, Courteous staff, good breakfast, great location
Summary: The hotel staff was very courteous and helpful.  The hotel is clean and well kept.  Location was great, a few blocks from the convention center and Disney, Walgreens and restaurants in hotel ground floor, many restaurants nearby.  Room had a GREAT kitchen with full stove, dishes, pots and pans.
Manager Response: What wonderful things you had to say about your experience! Thank you again for your review and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you as our guest again.

Summary Heading: Great Staff, excelent breakfast, walking distance from Disneyland!
Summary: The kids loved the bunk beds, the staff is super friendly and always goes above and beyond to keep customers happy. It is really convenient to have laundry facilities inside the hotel as you can bring less clothes and have extra room in your luggage.
Manager Response: We are happy to see that you enjoyed your overall stay with us and that you found the hotel to be great.Thank you for posting a review about our hotel after your recent stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience

Summary: Check in was terrible and room didn’t get cleaned during stay  They don’t take cash at check in, only card. Had to ask for our room to be cleaned.  Terrible guest service, didn’t care about our needs/wants. Breakfast was very good
Manager Response: To say I am extremely disappointed would be an understatement after reading your detailed comments on your experience. I realize this is too late, but I wanted to apologize for the experienced shared. Please know I will be following up with the team on this as it is obviously something that needs addressing. Thank you again for taking the time to leave a review, even though we wished it were under different circumstances.

Summary: Got downgraded at check in.  Reserved an expanded one bedroom suite but told at check in that that type of room was not available.  Got put into a smaller suite and made to pay the same rate for the smaller room.  Not the type of service that I’ve been accustomed to as a loyal reward member.
Manager Response: Thank you for the detailed feedback. We feel terrible that your experience with us was not the best. Rest assured we will take your comments to heart and do everything we can to recover from this. Please feel free to contact me directly when booking your next stay. I would love to make sure you are well taken care of on your next Anaheim venture.

Summary: You won't be disappointed, you should stay here. Staff is very kind and friendly. I only stay here when I go to Anaheim. The breakfast is amazing and they help you if you have food allergies. We love the Hyatt House.
Manager Response: We are very happy to see how much you enjoyed your stay with us. To read words like kind and friendly, is wonderful to see and we thank you for saying that about our hotel and team. Thank you for posting a review about our hotel after your recent stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience.

Summary Heading: Convenient location. Don’t expect much else.
Summary: Stay here only if the rate is low and you want to walk to Disneyland — and don’t need much else. The hotel itself is sub-par for the Hyatt brand. Very cold and inefficient check-in. Staff was not helpful. We weren’t told about breakfast, so didn’t partake. Only found out about breakfast when encountering other guests on the elevator in the morning bringing plates of food and hoards of bananas back to their rooms. Which was somewhat ghetto. Room walls are thin and you will be able to hear the TV, music, and large movements from adjacent rooms. On the bright side, location is convenient if you want to walk to Disneyland, and hotel parking process is seamless (although note there is an additional charge for daily parking).
Manager Response: I am disappointed to read about your average stay with us, but I do appreciate your comments. Thank you for letting us know about your check in experience. Rest assured we will take your comments to heart and do everything we can to recover from this. Please feel free to contact me directly when booking your next stay. I would love to make sure you are well taken care of on your next Anaheim venture.

Summary: 800.00 a night and they didn't clean one of our 3 rooms. We will not be staying here next year after spending thousands for a dirty rooms. Also, when I looked online to get similar rooms that were still available, they went way under what I paid.
Manager Response: We feel terrible that your experience with us was not the best. We always strive for guests to be as comfortable as possible and it sounds like you have identified an opportunity for improvement. Rest assured we will take your comments to heart and do everything we can to recover from this. Please feel free to contact me directly when booking your next stay. I would love to make sure you are well taken care of on your next Anaheim venture.

Summary: This is a great hotel! The rooms are nice, clean and perfect for a visit to Anaheim. It shares a building with Starbucks and Walgreens, which was super helpful. My husband, two kids, and I stayed in a 2 queen room and it was great. We made a somewhat impromptu decision to spend two days at Disneyland and this hotel was well priced and really close. It is only a 15 minute easy walk to the gates. Hyatt House will be our go to hotel from now on!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice feedback! We greatly appreciate all of the kind words and we will make sure to pass along your words of praise to our staff. We always try to keep our rooms updated and fresh, we appreciate you for noticing that. Thank you again for your kind recommendation, we always love when guests love us so much that they want to tell their friends.

Summary: I stayed with the family while visiting Disneyland. The Hotel was clean, the room was very nice, and the breakfast was good. It was in good walking distance to Disneyland and many food places. It has a good secure parking area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our Hotel, and I am so glad you enjoyed the breakfast! Our buffet is set up to get our families filled up before they enjoy the magic of the Disney Parks. Hope to host you again!

Summary Heading: The least enjoyable part of our Disney vacation
Summary: This place feels too big and busy to provide a real customer service experience. We were pretty disappointed, especially for the price (almost $400/night for a one-bedroom plus $22/day parking). Pros: about a 10-minute walk to Disney, a tasty hot breakfast, kitchens in some of the rooms. Cons: the breakfast area is an absolute madhouse, staff seemed busy and not particularly helpful (e.g., no efforts to restock the change machine in the laundry and no help from the front desk either—so we left our 5-day stay with 3 bags of dirty laundry). We travel a lot as a family, usually staying in $120/night Hampton Inn type of hotels, and almost all those places have done better than Hyatt House. My main concern is the breakfast area, which is crazier than Disneyland. During our stay, I
Manager Response: We feel terrible that your experience with us was not the best. We always strive for guests to be as comfortable as possible and it sounds like you have identified an opportunity for improvement. Rest assured we will take your comments to heart and do everything we can to recover from this. We do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you back as our guest again when your travels bring you back to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed one night at this location in a king studio (so no kitchen, just a bed, couch, & mini fridge; kind of like a Hyatt Place room). This was our first time, we normally stay at the Hyatt Place down the street.   This place is big. The hallways are very long and the walk can be pretty far from the elevator. Everything in this hotel just felt very blah & beige. The hallways, the rooms. Maybe it’s just the high ceilings and decor but it just felt blah to me. I found the DVD player in the room interesting.   Our room was fine. I wish there was a way to keep the bathroom door open for air circulation, but it closed itself. We didn’t have a view room so there wasn’t much to see from inside. The hotel was definitely quiet.   Positive for me was definitely the parking. They have
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review of our property! As always, we appreciate the consideration in choosing to stay with us and we are pleased you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your next Disneyland venture.

Summary: Family of seven stayed comfortably in a room for two nights for a quick trip to Disneyland that was within walking distance.  Hot breakfast was ready early which made it easier to get to Disneyland early. There is also a variety of restaurants within walking distance for dinner and other meals in addition to being right above a Walgreens.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We truly appreciate your acknowledgment of our breakfast selection. We are glad that everything went well throughout your stay and we look forward to your next Anaheim adventure.

Summary: We recently stayed here Dec '19 for a Disney vacation.  The good: Nice hotel Location Very clean Breakfast included 2 room suite options Friendly staff Starbucks, Blaze pizza and Wagreens directly below/adjacent to hotel  The bad: -Room 426 with a view was of a palm tree - would never stay in this room again. -Room directly above bus stop.  Anaheim has a significant homeless problem and they sleep at the bus stop.  We heard multiple fights and lots of curse words throughout our stay.  Not super family friendly from that perspective.  I understand this isn't the hotels fault per se and probably not a lot they could do, but just posting for awareness. -Room wasn't ready at 4pm to checkin.  I used the app which didn't seem to make much of a difference.  After a couple minutes we
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback David! We appreciate your honesty. Our staff is constantly striving to improve the services we offer, and we hope on your next Anaheim trip you visit us again!

Summary: Place is walking distance from a lot of restaurants and Disneyland. Rooms were very clean and updated. Breakfast is included with the stay and served fresh. Starbucks and Walgreens are downstairs.  Very convenient for the whole family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review Elizer! We appreciate your feedback. Hopefully we will have you back again on your next trip to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Wonderful family trip to Disneyland and California Adventure
Summary: We really enjoyed our 1/2 week stay at this modern, clean hotel near Disneyland and California Adventure.  It's perfect for families with a huge breakfast buffet included. Great friendly staff. It's about a 10 to 15 minute easy walk to the parks (many families are walking at the same time).  It's also surrounded by convenience stores (Walgreens, CVS), Starbucks, Pizza and smaller restaurants, and down the street from larger chain restaurants.
Manager Response: We are happy to see that you enjoyed your overall stay with us and that you found the hotel to be great. Thank you for sharing your comments. Hopefully we will have you back again on your next trip to the Anaheim area!

Summary: We stayed at Hyatt for our big family Christmas trip to Disneyland! It was a great stay! We were able to get a room next to our other family members, and we got a great view for the fireworks at night! The breakfast is pretty good, I wish they would have served the French toast sticks more, the pancakes were crunchy around the edges and hard to cut. Other than that all the breakfast food was pretty delicious!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for sharing your comments about your visit. I'm very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I will share your compliments with our team. Thanks again - we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Large room with enough beds for family of 5. 10 min Walking distance fr Disneyland. We enjoyed the hot breakfast but felt that there could be more variation on a day to day basis. Most of the front desk staff were warm however there was one who seemed very reluctant to serve others. The basic requirement for Staff working at the front desk is that they need to serve with a smile!
Manager Response: Thank you for the detailed feedback. We always strive for guests to be as comfortable as possible and it sounds like you have identified an opportunity for improvement. Rest assured we will take your comments to heart and do everything we can to recover from this. Please feel free to contact me directly when booking your next stay. I would love to make sure you are well taken care of on your next Anaheim venture.

Summary: Friendly greeting with complimentary cookies upon our arrival. They offered us a late check out according to our status and a room upgrade. Room and facility was clean as expected and checkin was very quick. Had a good night sleep in a comfortable bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel after your recent stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, friendly staff, close to Disneyland
Summary: I recommend this hotel!  Great friendly staff, newer clean hotel, about a 12-15 min walk to Disneyland.  CVS and Walgreens are nearby as well as Subway, Blaze Pizza and Starbucks.  We only used the pool once as it was cooler at nights in December.  We were at DL all day anyway.  Breakfast is great - lots of options.  They had eggs, bacon or sausages, bread, doughnuts, pastries, oatmeal, yogurt, cut fruit, fresh fruit, hashbrowns, etc.  You can take the Grand Plaza Line bus to DL in front of the Red Lion (next door) and take it back to the Springhill Suites (across the street) at the end of a long day at DL.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are pleased that you enjoyed the your stay at the Hyatt House. We would love to have you come stay with us again next time you are in town. Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Really good spot for families near Disneyland
Summary: We got the family suite, so you only have to share the bathroom.  Free breakfast which is great.  We were even able to rent a scooter(recent sprained ligaments) right from the front desk.  Great service, nice pool and large hot tub!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a great review about our hotel. We truly appreciate your feedback.

Summary: The Hyatt House is a good choice if you are traveling with teens.  We stayed in a room that had 2 queen beds separated from a kitchen & living area.  The sectional couch was also was a sofa bed.  The cost was less than other hotel suites in the area and also less than getting two rooms to accommodate our sleeping needs.  Our room was very, very quiet, which is important to me. The hotel provides a free hot breakfast that offers a lot of choices, real silverware & plates, and plenty of seating.  The staff was very friendly and helpful with all of our questions..  We had an issue with the shower one morning and it was fixed within the hour.  Disneyland is just an easy 10 -15 minute walk from the hotel to the ticket booth.
Manager Response: We are happy to see that you enjoyed your overall stay with us and that you found the hotel to be great. To read that you enjoyed the breakfast and the cleanliness of the guestroom is wonderful. Thank you for sharing your comments.

Summary: Great place to stay for Disneyland, also has a good size kitchen.  Can work great for people with small children, since you can store baby food and formula in a good size fridge.  Breakfast at the hotel was good along with a great kitchen staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are pleased that hear your comments concerning our breakfast and kitchen staff. We would love to have you come stay with us again next time you are in town. Thank you again!

Summary: I enjoyed being able to watch the fireworks.  I liked the hotel location. The room was very clean and I enjoyed all the amenities. I do believe additional staff was needed at the bar area to eliminate customer wait time, yet the young lady working was very professional and sweet regardless.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel after your recent stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience.

Summary: This is an ideal spot for a Disneyland trip. The hotel is new and clean, unlike some of the other older ones in the area. It's also a great value with a full breakfast. If you're not coming with kids, expect lots of them around, which is great if you are bringing kids. The walk is close enough to not make it too difficult, but not likely a walk you'd want to do several times a day with kids. Check in and check out process were both super smooth. $22 a night for parking, but that's less expensive than parking at Disneyland. Also if you have guests coming for the day it's only $11 for them. Note that with this and any hotel nearby you will hear fireworks at 9:30.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for sharing your comments about your visit. I'm very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I will share your compliments with our team. Thanks again - we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Baby Shower at the Hyatt House
Summary: My husband and I recently hosted our baby shower at the Hyatt House. We were very impressed with everything the hotel had to offer, we worked closely with Richard and Alyssa to plan our event and everything turned out wonderfully. They took care of everything we could possibly think of and were so accommodating the day of even helping us set up our own decorations and desserts to ensure everything looked amazing!   The staff was amazing, they were kind and so helpful. They checked in with my husband and I often and really took care of our guests, we never had to ask for anything as they were always attentive and ensured we never ran out of drinks or food. We opted for an Italian buffet and mimosa bar for our guests, the food was delicious and well presented. For the mimosa bar
Manager Response: We are very happy to see how much you enjoyed your visit with us during your special baby shower. To read words like impressed, accommodating, amazing and attentive is wonderful to see and we thank you for saying that about our hotel and team.

Summary: Rooms and hotel was great, very clean and beautiful. Staff was very kind and helpful. Could use updates on their breakfast. Waffle were frozen kind. Mushy and tasteless eggs were running. Did have other options.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments about your visit. Rest assure, I will relay your comments to our Culinary team to ensure your recommendations are met. Thank you for staying with us - we hope to see you again when you return to our area.

Summary Heading: Relaxing stay convenient to convention center in Anaheim
Summary: Wonderful rooms, friendly staff.  Breakfast was very good. Rooms were clean and modern.  I was there for four days and never had an issue. Walking distance to convention center. Parking was easy and food around the hotel is convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel after your recent stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience.

Summary: What a nice staff and friendly atmosphere.  Thanks for going out of your way to make our stay enjoyable.  We could not ask for better service.  If we make it to Anaheim again we look forward to staying at the Hyatt House.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a great review about our hotel. We truly appreciate your feedback.

Summary: The Hyatt House and the employees are amazing!!! My close friend had a baby shower there last week and everything turned out perfect. We had a lot of personal items we brought for the shower which they helped set up and we were extremely great full. I highly recommend this place for trips as its close to Disneyland and the food was delicious. This is a little GEM in Anaheim and a big shout out to the Manager Richard and his staff, they did so much and made my friends day even more special.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review jstarr1010! We appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our Hyatt House Hospitality. Hopefully we will have you back again in the near future.

Summary: This was my first time staying at Hyatt House and I have to say I was highly impressed! Hotel is conveniently located a short walk from Disney. Hotel was super clean and comfortable and the complimentary breakfast was delicious. This is now going to be my go to place when I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on our hotel! We appreciate you giving out staff such a friendly shout out, and are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Please come back and stay with us again!

Summary: Entire 7-day stay was plagued with an overwhelming sewer gas smell in the bathroom.  When I would leave the bathroom door open, the room would smell as well.  I also noticed the smell in the hallway.  Reported to maintenance but they were unable to correct.  This is likely a bigger issue than just my room... probably an issue with their sewage system.    From Internet:    “The gas contains ammonia, methane and hydrogen sulfide, all of which are toxic when inhaled in high concentrations. People can die through asphyxiation when exposed to very high concentrations of sewer gas. More common effects include eye irritation, nausea and breathing difficulty.”
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize that your experience with us was not perfect. We would love to see what we can do to in order to correct your experience with us. Please feel free to contact me directly. I look forward to assisting you.

Summary Heading: Good Place to Stay at Disneyland
Summary: Large, newer hotel with a variety of room types including suites, bunk beds and traditional rooms.  Good breakfast with lots of seating.  Can be a little noisy with a room overlooking Harbor and Katella.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us - I hope that you will give us another chance when your travels bring you back to Anaheim.

Summary: My cousin and I spent three days at the Disneyland resort. We loved this hotel! Great accessibility to Downtown Disney and Disneyland. It was so convenient having a drug store (which we needed) and a Starbucks right at the location! The breakfast buffet offered many, many selections and the food was HOT and cooked well. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words. We will share your comments with our food and Beverage crew. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: My family and I came to attend an event at the Hyatt and had an amazing time. The food, set up, and drinks were good as well. But, most of all, the service was spectacular. Richard, Alyssa, Paulina, and Gabriel gave nothing but the best service: they were extremely friendly, hard working, and genuinely great at their job. I don’t think I’ve ever had such amazing service. We came for friends and I left wanting to host my own event here.
Manager Response: We are very happy to see how much you enjoyed your event with us. To read words like amazing, spectacular is wonderful to see and we thank you for saying that about our hotel and team. Thank you for reviewing our hotel on TripAdvisor. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience with us.

Summary: This was an amazing place to hold a baby shower ! By far the best catering and service I have encountered. The food was amazing and the presentation was great and Richard’s team, Gabriel, Paulina, and Alyssa, were so nice to us and offered the best service. 10/10 will recommend to anyone who wants to hold any kind of event here ! Of course while holding an event you want to offer the best to your friends and family, the Hyatt House is the way to go !
Manager Response: We are very happy to see how much you enjoyed your event with us. To read words like amazing, presentation was great is wonderful to see and we thank you for saying that about our hotel and team. Thank you for reviewing our hotel on TripAdvisor. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel with a great location
Summary: My wife and I did 2 days in Disneyland and stayed here primarily for the location. It was a 10 minute walk to the entrances to the park. Many fast food and sit down dining options around. The hotel was clean, parking convenient and the breakfast was very good. Hannah the receptionist was great. I had difficulty with an old Hyatt gift card but Hannah and her manager handled the situation very well. Highly recommend this facility
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Hannah is just one of our super stars here at the Hyatt House. I will share your feedback with our team. We hope that we will see you again when you return to Anaheim!

Summary: The free breakfast was not at all what I expected. The some thing everyday, nothing was like made to order. Employees were forceable nice and the hotel was clean. Very close to downtown Disney and Parks
Manager Response: We apologize that the breakfast was not what you expected. We will make sure to take your comments to heart and do everything we can to improve. Please let us know next time you are in the area. We look forward to your next stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Well worth the stay, especially with it's proximity to Disney. Staff was very attentive and the hotel was clean and well cared for. For our conferences, the staff made sure our room was well stocked and came in periodically to refill and empty when necessary. very well done
Manager Response: WE appreciate you taking the time to write such kind words about our hotel, and hope you decide to stay with us again on your next Anaheim trip. We'd love to host you again!

Summary: Hotel is under construction, no restaurant or bar. Very noisy with hammers, saws. It is a great location if you are going to Disneyland. Rooms need update, carpets frayed and shower heads need replacing.
Manager Response: We are sincerely apologetic that your stay with us was anything but the very best. We would love to help change your perception and invite you to come back whenever you are in the Anaheim area. Please feel free to contact me directly, I would love to assist.

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Fantastic hotel located walking distance to Disneyland. The rooms are wonderful. My kids love the family suite with the bunk beds. The breakfast buffet is excellent. I highly recommend this property. We will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your review and we look forward to when you can stay with us again when you are back in Orange County.

Summary: Started out with construction in lobby. No mention was made to us prior. Room was dirty. Dirty stained sheets. Broken amenities. Crumbs and stains. Overall not welcoming or homey. We have stayed at residence inn, springill suites and now Hyatt. I am usually a huge fan of Hyatt. But this location next to Disney...well to say we don’t choose this place again.
Manager Response: We are sincerely apologetic that your stay with us was anything but the very best. We would love to help change your perception and invite you to come back whenever you are in the Anaheim area. Please feel free to contact me directly, I would love to assist.

Summary Heading: Awesome family hotel - great rooms, service and breakfast included
Summary: I couldn’t fault this hotel. We stayed in a one bedroom kitchen suite which had a full size fridge and cooktop which meant we could have a home cooked meal. Perfect size for us and our 9 year old.   A quick walk to Disney, Walgreens and CVS right at the door as well as great pizza and Starbucks just downstairs.   A great breakfast included and easy coin laundry great when travelling with families.   Nothing was too much trouble and I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback Rebecca! WE appreciate you taking the time to write such kind words about our hotel and amenities, and hope you decide to stay with us again on your next Anaheim trip. We'd love to host you again!

Summary: Good location to Disneyland.However, had to call for missing items in the room upon check-in. Good breakfast. Would recommend or stay again.Book early   for  better rates. Went in a busy holiday. Other hotels in the area within a block also a great value
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We truly appreciate your acknowledgment of our breakfast selection. We look forward to your next Anaheim adventure.

Summary: This was my first stay at this property. I was very impressed. One of the front desk staff, Dylan, really made an impression. She always greeted us with a smile and was incredibly friendly during the check-in process. She asked if we were celebrating any special occasions and I told her that we were between my wife's and sister-in-law's birthdays. She made sure that both got special treats that evening (even though the kids got to them first). She also made sure we had extra towels and necessities soon after we checked in and was always friendly. She really went the extra mile, and I was really impressed with her hospitality and the entire staff in general. I also interacted with Gabriel. He was very friendly and was quick to make sure that we knew that if we needed anything to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the very kind words! We have already celebrated them as a team, and I am so proud that we made your stay special. Please come visit us soon!

Summary: The hotel was quite busy when we went and service was slow. It is located very close to Disney which makes it an ideal location. However, it is still quite pricey for what you get. The only reason we chose this hotel was because of the breakfast package and that was quite helpful with two little ones.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our Hotel, and I am so glad you enjoyed the breakfast! Our buffet is set up to get our families filled up before they enjoy the magic of the Disney Parks. Hope to host you again!

Summary: Reception desk A+ - Friendly professional staff. Greeted every person who walked through the lobby with - Welcome Back.  Breakfast A - Great selection and plenty of seating.  Room - A+ - 5th floor room facing Disneyland. Large room, great kitchenette, comfortable bed, couch area was a bonus.  Location - A - short easy walk to park entrance.  Parking - A -   Will be back!
Manager Response: Woohoo! Straight A's! In all seriousness, thank you so much for not only your business, but for taking the time to review our Hotel. Please come see us again, and have a pleasant day!

Summary: When we returned back to our room about 5.30pm we realised that our room is not clean. When I called up the reception, I told them to send the housekeeper at 6.30pm to clean it when we are out for dinner.& they agreed.  We returned at 11.30pm, our room is still not clean! I called the receptionist up & they said they only have 1 housekeeper at night so won’t be able to clean up our room. What they can do is to give us whatever additional towel or so. I requested for them to come immediately they said they can’t cos they have a lot of request.   My kids need a clean bed to sleep & clean towel to bath!  Total disappointment by Hyatt!  I have been travelling around & staying in Different country Hyatt but this is a total disappointment this time on the type of services that I
Manager Response: I am so sorry for the mix up, and I believe that I have already spoken to you and made this right. Thank you so much for your business, and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Great experience! Check in, location, amenities, and staff all exceeded our expectations. The kids loved the food and the pool. Definitely will return and recommend to others. Movies, and excellent food options are all within walking distance.
Manager Response: Exceeding expectations is our mission! Thank you for your business, and we look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Close to Parks and Other Eateries
Summary: The hotel was clean, fairly quiet, the breakfast was good and plenty of room for everyone to find a seat to eat. there are other amenities- Starbucks, Blaze Pizza and Walgreen's very close to walking, good parking downstairs too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our Hotel! We are so glad to have been your choice out of many options. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: We had a wonderful Anniversary Get-Away. We arrived a little early and when the staff learned that this was our Anniversary trip, and our original room was not ready, they upgraded our room so that we were able to settle right in. Hannah at the front desk, was so sweet, she personally brought a beautiful fruit plate and a sweet note to our room. We were so close to the parks and could even see the fireworks from our room. The breakfast was one of the best we have ever experienced. There is a Walgreens and a Starbucks on site, which is so convenient.The room itself was beautiful and had everything we needed. We loved our stay and will be back again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words! We will celebrate together as a team, and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay in Anaheim
Summary: I actually picked this hotel more or less at random since I needed a place to stay for a conference at the convention center at the last minute, and it turned out to be a real winner. Walking distance to both the convention center and Disney, great rooms, and terrific facilities. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: What a pleasant surprise! Thank you for choosing us, and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I am extremely happy with the customer service given upon arrival.  The service was above and beyond especially from Zurir.  Zurir noticed that I was tired and waiting for my room to be free to check in.  He took it upon himself to make sure I got the very first room when it became available.  Thank you soooo much Zurir...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words! Please think of us whenever you are back in the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: The location was clean, staff were engaging, and overall environment was positive.  A few homeless people spend time close to property but do not affect the overall services provide by Hyatt House, Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your wonderful review and we look forward to having you stay with us again when you are in the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center
Summary: Great place to stay if you are visiting Disneyland.  A variety of room types,  A diverse free Breakfast, a pool, food and drink services, very friendly people, and an easy walk to Disneyland (2 signals).
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We would love to have you come stay with us again next time you are in town. Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Clean, quiet hotel /Chef George was the best!
Summary: Very clean, quiet hotel. Heard no noise from other guests at all. Very comfortable beds. 10 minute walk to Disneyland security gates. It was very convenient to have a Walgreens, Starbucks and Blaze Pizza right below the hotel. Chef George deserves accolades as he cooked a separate, safe breakfast every morning for my 11 year old who is allergic to peanuts & tree nuts. We really appreciated that.  I would definitely stay here again for a trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are pleased that you enjoyed our location. We will make sure to pass along your words of praise to Chef George. We are very pleased that you had a great experience with us.Thank you again for your review and we look forward to when you can stay with us again when you are back in Orange County

Summary: Great for families! Clean and comfortable rooms, short walk to Disney (10 minutes). Breakfast has many options. Staff was accommodating for peanut allergy. Starbucks, Walgreens and pizza place below. Pool and hot tub are nice. We slept very well here.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments. Thank you for the compliments regarding our clean comfortable rooms. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly staff, clean rooms
Summary: This hotel was excellent for access to the convention center and Disneyland.  Everything was clean and breakfast was nice.  The staff was very friendly.  I liked being able to check in ahead of time on the app.  I also liked that I could request items like an extra blanket on the app - and it was delivered within a few minutes!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for sharing your comments about your visit. I'm very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I will share your compliments with our team. Thanks again - we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Used to be great, now, not so much
Summary: My family and I have stayed here many times, but this trip was below standard from our previous stays.  The bathroom was not very clean.  Hairs stuck to the shower wall, and what looked like dried vomit on the front of the toilet bowl.  Our room, 356, was right on the main street so was a bit noisy for my taste.  Breakfast was good.  Staff was friendly and pleasant.  When we checked out, I did my usual check of personal items and found trash between the queen beds and the nightstand on both sides.  Obviously housekeeping isn't being thorough when they clean.  I never had this experience before.  Not sure I will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience Shannon. You are right, that is not up to our standards, and the condition you found your room to be in is unacceptable. I can assure you that we will do our very best to learn from your experience, and make certain this does not happen again in the future. We would love to host you again whenever you visit the Anaheim Resort, so please feel free to reach out to us directly.

Summary: Conveniently located, close to the Convention Center, Disney Land, retailers, Starbucks, Walgreen's and more!  The staff was amazing and very freindly.  There were several different floor plans for the guest rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! They will be celebrated with our entire staff! Please visit us again anytime you happen to be in the Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: Terrific place to stay! Friendly, accommodating and well equipped!
Summary: This hotel was very comfortable, clean, well appointed and within walking distance to Disneyland (which was the purpose of our visit). The staff was great - professional, friendly and accommodating. We'll be staying here everytime we visit the area!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words on our Hotel, but most importantly our staff! We cant wait to host you again during your next visit to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Phenomenal stay at the Hyatt House in Anaheim.  Best breakfast ever, ever, ever!  Not to mention is was complimentary with stay.  Let's just say if they had charged me for it, I would have purchased it.  Rooms clean and comfortable, staff was super nice and accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are glad you loved our amenities and especially the breakfast.We look forward to having you stay with us!

Summary Heading: Large rooms, hotel full of families with children
Summary: The rooms of the hotel are huge, made for families. The service is good and the location is great. I would just not recommend the hotel for business trips. The hotel is full of families with many children. The free breakfast is a mess (too many people, not enough space). If you are a family and you want to go to Disney Land, the hotel is a great choice. There is a nice pool, grills where you can have your own barbecue, fully equipped kitchens in spacious rooms, a nice gym, good service... The 3 out of 5 rating is just a reflection of my personal situation as a business traveler.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us - I hope that you will give us another chance when your travels bring you back to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Thank you Chef George and Alma
Summary: Thank you Chef George and Alma for being so helpful.   The hotel staff assisted with the random requests that our team had and they were always very friendly and went the extra mile to assist us.   We would definitely go back to visit.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Thanks for the great compliments about our Food & Beverage team, and our Associates, George and Alma! I will share your feedback with them. We hope that we will see you again when you return to Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great stay for a Disneyland day
Summary: We were very pleased with this hotel for our stay and visit to Disneyland. It took just a few minutes to walk into Disneyland. Lots of restaurants within a block of the hotel. All spaces in hotel were clean and in good condition. Will absolutely stay here again for future trips in the area!
Manager Response: Thank you again for your wonderful review and we look forward to having you stay with us again when you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel is walking distance from Disneyland. It's the best kept secret in Anaheim for Disneyland visitors. Rooms are super clean and breakfast is amazing. This was our 2nd time staying here and plan on coming back again and again.
Manager Response: We are happy to see that you enjoyed your overall stay with us and that you found the hotel to be great. To read that your breakfast experience was amazing and you enjoyed our clean rooms. Thank you for sharing your comments. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience.

Summary: Great hotel! Spacious room. Very friendly staff    No shuttle to Disneyland but it’s about a 15 minute walk. Caught Uber of Lyft at times we were too tired to walk. Cost was approximately $4-6. Worth it!! Walgreens open 24 hours. Starbucks and pizza at this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us - I hope that you will give us another chance when your travels bring you back to Anaheim.

Summary: First time staying at this hotel. We loved it. Great proximity to Disneyland. Staff was very friendly and a very nice breakfast buffet. The room was large and clean. The bed was very comfortable. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We greatly appreciate the consideration in choosing to stay with us. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Booked this place because of proximity to Disneyland ( its about a 10 min walk) and looking at the pics online it seemed like a better hotel than its comparables. I was satisfied with my stay. Breakfast is included, rooms were spacious, clean and modern. Beds were comfy and nice living room area with kitchen to relax. Pool area was nice and clean, enjoyed the hot tub. Typical continental breakfast. Only took off one point because it was a bit pricier + you have to pay for parking. Otherwise if you can find a deal, I would recommend to stay here again.  Walgreens/blaze pizza/ other restaurants are very close.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay. Thank you for the compliments regarding the room, amenities and service. We will share your comments with our team. We look forward to your next stay in the Anaheim area

Summary: Hyatt House Hotel was a great choice for our family. Large enough with nice kitchen set up. The hotel had ok complimentary breakfast. It took us about 15 min to walk to Disneyland. Food options near by included Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump, Subway and several others. Walgreens is next door. Parking charges are a little steep but you are in California! Definitely would recommend hotel and definitely would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your review and we look forward to having you stay with us again when you are in the Anaheim area!

Summary: I enjoy this Hotel! They have a wide variety of room choices, including ones with full kitchens. My only knock is what seems to be a kimited number of mobility accessible rooms. This was the second time I stayed at this Hotel/
Manager Response: WE appreciate you taking the time to write such kind words about our hotel, and hope you decide to stay with us again on your next Anaheim trip. We'd love to host you again!

Summary: In all my trips to Anaheim, this was the nicest accommodation I have ever had. Room exceeded my expectations. Mini Suite was comfortable for our 3 and would have accommodated a 4th, easily. Kitchenette, with fridge, sink, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker and dining/work island
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are pleased that you enjoyed the cleanliness of our rooms. We would love to have you come stay with us again next time you are in town. Thank you again!

Summary: This hotel is a great location to Disneyland and at an affordable price. We love the rooms with all the conveniences of home. The food is great quality but if you are looking to go out for a meal there are wonderful restaurants close by. Great Hotel highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback dgringler! .WE appreciate you taking the time to write such kind words about our hotel and amenities, and hope you decide to stay with us again on your next Anaheim trip. We'd love to host you again!

Summary Heading: Great newer and clean hotel to stay at DL
Summary: This is has become by Go To place for Disneyland.  Nice big rooms, super clean, super new and great breakfast.  Lots of seating in the dining area unlike the older hotels closer to the Disneyland entrance.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review of our property! As always, we appreciate the consideration in choosing to stay with us and we are pleased that everyone had fun. We look forward to your next Disneyland venture.

Summary: We stayed at this Hyatt for the first time since it was built (they told us it's just 3 years old now).  The accommodations are very comfortable, clean, and quiet.  The staff is beyond friendly & helpful - we felt very welcome there.  The breakfast is pretty terrific (it would have been nice to have regular yogurt & not just the Greek variety, and perhaps muffins, but other than that, is quite generous with choices - eggs, sausage and/or bacon, hash browns, bread choices, fruit, ,),  and there is a Walgreen's & CVS right there for any other items we needed.  Disneyland is a tolerable walk away (prepare for a lot of walking anyway if you're visiting Disneyland!) - the location is great.  We would definitely choose Hyatt again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are pleased that you enjoyed the cleanliness of our suites and our breakfast. We would love to have you come stay with us again next time you are in town. Thank you again!

Summary: We stayed 4 nights at the Hyatt House and loved every second of it! Hannah at the front desk is amazing. She really made us feel welcome and assisted us with any questions we had. Margarita with the kitchen staff was also great at breakfast time and very friendly! I am overall very satisfied with my stay and will definitely be booking here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We greatly appreciate the consideration in choosing to stay with us! We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: The perfect place for a family focused on Disneyland. Easily walkable to/from the park and Downtown Disney. Great room setup with many choices of room configurations. Excellent breakfast - very substantial! Starbucks and Walgreens very nearby additional advantages! Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are pleased that you enjoyed the cleanliness of our suites and our breakfast. We would love to have you come stay with us again next time you are in town. Thank you again!

Summary: Upon first look, the place has style! Updated to a fresh experience and walk up. Oscar helped us with the reservation, and he was stellar with accomodating us with the perfect room. He was helpful and fun, and made my day start off great! Such good night sleep! This place is awesome! 5 stars!
Manager Response: Thank you again for your review and we look forward to when you can stay with us again when you are back in Orange County.

Summary: Came to visit Disneyland and we started off at a  hotel. It was horrible, so we decided to book another hotel and landed at the Hyatt place! Oscar at the front desk was amazing. We asked for an early check in, because we had our luggage, but our room wasn't available yet. We were just going to leave our luggage and without asking he found us another room that was available immediately! Super friendly and accommodating!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review stephaniegr1889rw! We appreciate your feedback. Hopefully we will have you back again on your next trip to the Anaheim area!

Summary: I was very pleased with my stay at The Hyatt House Anaheim.  The room was very clean and quiet.  The staff was very welcoming and helpful. The location was close to the convention center and Disneyland.  I would stay there again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on our hotel 980yamilar! We appreciate you giving out staff such a friendly shout out, and are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Please come back and stay with us again!

Summary: For the money this is a far nicer hotel than the 2 hotels in the park that I have stayed at. Great value. And the breakfast is great and within walking distance to Disney. The pool and workout center are great also.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words! We are so happy you enjoyed your time at the Parks here with us. Come and visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect stay for a trip to Disneyland
Summary: We had a great stay at the Hyatt House Anaheim. Arriving early (10am) after a long trip from Sydney we were very happy to hear a room was available and we could check-in early! The frontdesk staff were very friendly and accommodating. We stayed in a 1 bedroom suite which was perfect for a family of 4. The rooms were clean, spacious and had everything we needed for our stay. It was nice having the pool & spa for the non-disney days. Only a short walk to the main gates at Disney 10-15mins and we managed this easily with a 2.5 and a 4.5 year olds (both walking, no strollers). Good variety at breakfast and many options for the kids, including fruit! Would stay here again if making a return trip to disneyland. I didn't notice any noise issues as mentioned by other reviewers though
Manager Response: Thank you again for your review and we look forward to when you can stay with us again when you are back in Orange County.

Summary Heading: A good hotel, could be so much better!!!!
Summary: We (3 adults, 2 kids) spent 4 nights here while visiting Disneyland. The location is great!! A block and a half to Disneyland, a block from restaurants and close to whatever else you are looking for. Check in was a nightmare. We came to the hotel at about 2pm, check in is at 4pm, we did not get a room until after 6:30pm. We left our bags with them and went site seeing but super disappointed with the check in. The staff was hot helpful and did not care that the rooms were not ready at all.  The room was nice. Had a kitchenette with a fridge and mini stove. Two double beds in a separate room with a bathroom. The living room had a pullout couch.   It is a family hotel and is noisy. The family upstairs did run around and stomped but we were somewhat expecting that. Included a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our Hotel! I truly apologize for any delay in your check in process, I know from experience how frustrating it can be. We are constantly working to create a better Guest experience, and we all hope that you will select us for your next visit to the Anaheim Resort!

Summary Heading: Sleep and shower before visiting the happiest place on earth!
Summary: My family and I spent five nights at the Hyatt House in Anaheim, as our home base while we explored the Disneyland Resort. Although the hotel is fairly new, I believe its popularity has resulted in it looking a little tired in some places already. There were some sizeable scrapes in the wall of our room and basically wear and tear that I’d expect to see at a much older hotel.   We booked a firework view room on the top floor, and reading all the other reviews about above noise, I’m glad we had no one above us. A note about the fireworks - Disneyland does not have fireworks every single night. So be prepared to possibly pay extra for a fireworks view room and either not see any, or see less than you expected. Fireworks only happened on one of our five nights.  The free breakfast
Manager Response: We are happy to see that you enjoyed your overall stay with us and that you found the hotel to be great. Thank you for sharing your comments.

Summary: We planned our family vacation to Disneyland and stayed at the Hyatt House. We were so pleased with everything!  The breakfast was easy, good quality and super kid friendly.  It was an easy walk to Dianeyland for our family of four.  Our room was very clean and worked great for needs.  We had a full kitchen and two rooms so we could separate the kids from the parents.  The front desk staff was very accommodating especially Mariana!!!  You are awesome.  I highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a quality hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are pleased that you enjoyed our breakfast and the cleanliness of our rooms. We will make sure to pass along your words of praise to Marinna. They always go above and beyond for our guests. We are very pleased that you had a great experience with us.

Summary: The staff was not helpful at all. The family above us were so loud and disrespectful stomping at 5 am and at 9 pm. They got worse every time we complained. Terrible management / customer service. Will not return! Go somewhere else!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! I can imagine all of the excited young children running around getting ready for their magical day, and how that could create an inconvenience to the Guests below. We will continue to improve on handling this difficult situation, and continue to improve our Guest experience. Thank you for your business and have a pleasant day!

Summary: Great place to stay with family specially when you have kids. Rooms were great and housekeeping did an amazing job each day.   Breakfast included which is a PLUS, but there is a room for improvement there.
Manager Response: Thank you so much imraiqbal! Hearing about your great experience at our hotel is so wonderful, and we will share your kind words with our staff. We hope to see you again soon for more fun!

Summary Heading: A good family spot for Disney Trips
Summary: We recently did a 2 night stay at Hyatt House Anaheim. The staff was polite, the rooms were nice, and the whole hotel was clean and well tended to. Heated pool and hot tub stay open until 10 pm. Breakfast buffet (630-930) came in great to fuel up before walking over to Disney (about 15 mins with a kid in tow). If you're a sensitive sleeper I found the pillows a little uncomfortable but the bed was great. Also, if you stay at Disney till close, be aware that all in-hotel dining shuts down at 10 pm. The Blaze pizza next door is open until midnight so it might be your hungry family's savior as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We greatly appreciate the consideration in choosing to stay with us. We look forward to your next stay with us

Summary: This vacation involved a family of 6. This was our first stay at the Hyatt House and it was a wonderful Place to stay. Very clean . Friendly staff. Comfortable beds. Very nice breakfast. The only drawback was no shuttle service.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review of our property! As always, we appreciate the consideration in choosing to stay with us and we are pleased that everyone had fun. We look forward to your next Disneyland venture.

Summary Heading: Hyatt House.. where screaming children are your alarm clock!
Summary: LOCATION REVIEW AND TIPS Getting to Disneyland from hotel: Walk, takes about 10-15 minutes Cross the street and take the ART Grand Plaza Line or Harbor North Line one stop to Disneyland, they run every 15-20 minutes.   From Disneyland to hotel: Walk, although after 10pm be aware you will pass homeless individuals, the juxtaposition of seeing rampant homelessness right after a magical day at the park is interesting albeit sobering. Take ART Grand Plaza Line (Stop # 3,4,5 at Disneyland departure area)   Tip #1: If you plan on taking Anaheim Resort Transportation (the lines mentioned above), I would download the app and buy a multi-day ticket.   Tip #2: Honestly, the distance does become an annoyance and in retrospect I would pick a closer hotel or a hotel farther and cheaper away
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed 3 nights. 10 to 15 minute walk to Disney which was nice, especially since that stretch of walkway always had tourists around which makes it safer (IMO). Rooms were basic, but new. Had the suite with bunks for the kids which was awesome for them to be in another room. Food in the bar was basic but good. Breakfast in the morning was a great bonus.  If you don't want to spend the extra $$$$ in a Disney property hotel, this is a great alternative.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review klintonlaw! We appreciate your feedback and are thrilled the your kids enjoyed the bunk beds. Hopefully we will have you back again on your next trip to the Anaheim area!

Summary: We stayed at Hyatt house , Anaheim California. The location was a ten minute walk to Disneyland and California Adventure park. The rooms were spacious and had tea/coffee facilities. Hairdryer and shampoo/conditioner etc. Breakfast was also included with the room. Lots of choices at the buffet help yourself breakfast. Even had english muffins!  Near to other restaurants as well. Cheesecake factory was across the road and Walgreens was on the corner under the hotel. Free parking as well. I would use this hotel again, for price and location
Manager Response: Thank you again for your wonderful review and we look forward to having you stay with us again when you are in the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Terrible Service and DONT DRINK THE WATER
Summary: Our stay at the Hyatt House unfortunately very disappointing. Our flight from Hawaii didn’t arrive at LAX until midnight. After getting the car rental, we didn’t arrive until 2 am. Everything at check in seemed to be fine. We arrived to our room, I had messaged someone on a Facebook Messanger app asking if we could have the pullout bed ready and made since we were arriving so late and kids would be asleep. It was confirmed that Zarhr, the front desk agent, said the sofa bed would be made up before we arrived. Well, we arrived tired and kids asleep to our hotel room and then I had to make the sofa bed because it was not previously set up for us like they said it would be. Fine, kind of annoying, but I made the bed for the kids to sleep in. Then at 7 am, only 5 hours later, we
Manager Response: I am sorry that you were disappointed by the other aspects of your stay. We expect our team to deliver excellent service, and I apologize that we disappointed you. I have shared your feedback with our team and we are working to ensure we avoid these problems in the future. I appreciate you sharing honest feedback, as it gives us an opportunity to improve.

Summary: Whether traveling alone or with a family the hotel staff were diligent and happy to answer all questions and made the stay that much more comfortable.   I would recommend the hotel to anyone who is staying in Anaheim to attend activities at the Convention Hall or at the Disneyland Resort.  The location is perfect for either.
Manager Response: Thank you so much Wander31714711141! Hearing about your great experience at our hotel is so wonderful, and we will share your kind words with our staff. We hope to see you again soon for more fun!

Summary: Fantastic location, easy walk to Disney. Surrounded by food options, the Garden Walk just down the road has a range of family restaurants and a range of fast food places across the road. Short drive round the block to the local Vons supermarket gives you a much wider range then the Walgreen's in the building.   Accommodation was clean, modern and comfortable. The ability to have a fold out bed in the lounge also gave us space to spread the kids out. Kitchen was well equipped with a full sized fridge, dishwasher etc.... The pool is awesome for a dip between the day shift at Disney and the night shift (take an hours break, makes the 6pm to midnight period easier!). Parking is expensive but that's just the same everywhere in LA at anywhere decent. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay. Thank you for the compliments regarding the room, pool and service. Thanks again - we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stayed at Hyatt House in September for 8 nights and it was perfect. We were coming from Australia and wanted a room that gave us space and a place to unwind after busy days exploring and Disneyland. We had a family room and loved our son had his own sanctuary to recharge. This hotel was perfect in every way.  The distance to Disneyland was good and it had many places around it to eat. Underneath the hotel had a Walgreens and Starbucks and Blaze Pizza. Across the street is the best Mexican ever! A subway, 7/11 and a few other restaurants.  The pool area was pleasant and many hours were spent bubbling away in the hot tub.  Breakfast was good and the breakfast area was well designed to service lots of families wanting to hit the park early. The staff during breakfast were so
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We greatly appreciate the consideration in choosing to stay with us! We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: An Excellent Place to Stay When Visiting Disneyland
Summary: Within walking distance of Disneyland, the Hyatt House at Anaheim is perfect for visiting the parks.  The accommodations and service are what you'd expect from Hyatt, and the outstanding breakfast is not only very good and extremely convenient, but saves perhaps $15 per plate per person per morning that you'd spend at a nearby restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your review and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you as our guest again.

Summary Heading: Don't Expect Your Room On Time
Summary: MANY people this last week did not get their room by 4pm. The staff acted like it wasn't a big deal. Them, at 4pm, many cleaning staff were hanging out by the bar instead of cleaning. Management isn't doing a great job managing their staff. When I asked for drinks at the bar as compensation, they said sure, but when I tried to use the credit, they said i could only use them for food, so I gave them to a homeless guy that was already in the hotel. Staff is not helpful or very friendly, so if you just want a nice room & don't need ask any questions, you'll be fine. If I ever come back to Disneyland, I'll find somewhere closer.
Manager Response: We are sincerely apologetic that your stay with us was anything but the very best. We would love to help change your perception and invite you to come back whenever you are in the Anaheim area. Please feel free to contact me directly, I would love to assist.

Summary: Accommodating, quiet rooms, affordable price, good breakfast and a short walk to Disneyland.  They accommodate Gluten Free at their included breakfast!  They will hold bags so you can go out if you arrive early and even offered breakfast the day we arrived since we got  there so early.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We greatly appreciate the consideration in choosing to stay with us! We will make sure to share your comments with the team!

Summary: Hotel staff was friendly. Rooms were great as well as the location. Able to leave bags at desk until room became available. Was contacted via text when it was ready so when I was done at the park after closing it was an easy process to get the room key and go. Staff saw me walk in had the key ready and grabbed my bags so I could go to my room. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel after your recent stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience.

Summary Heading: This is our go to place every time we visit the park.
Summary: We stay here about 4-5 times per year when we visit the parks. Staff is always helpful and goes above and beyond when it comes to hospitality. Housekeeping staff makes it easier to come to our room after a long day.
Manager Response: We are very happy to see how much you enjoyed your stay with us. To read words helpful and above and beyond, is wonderful to see and we thank you for saying that about our hotel and team. We will make sure to share your amazing comments with our Housekeeping team!

Summary: Lots of good things to say about this hotel.  The front desk and cleaning staff run a tight ship!  Hotel staff are friendly and out going!  They obviously make time to have fun too which means they like working here.  I caught the front desk staff dancing last night!  Love the energy, keep it up!!  Rooms are clean and stocked with plenty of clean sheets and towels.  They make a good burger too!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review pharbman! We appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Hopefully we will have you back again on your next trip to the Anaheim area!

Summary: We stayed here two years ago for 5 nights and decided to extend our next stay to 8 nights.   We arrived at the hotel at 9 am after a long flight from Australia fully expecting that we would have to wait until the afternoon to check in. However the lady checking us in said our room was ready immediately and that we could grab some breakfast if needed. This was great and very much appreciated - Thank you.  We had booked a one bedroom suite with a view which is what we received. The room was divided into two areas, a living area and kitchen and bedroom with two queen beds and bathroom. The beds were comfortable, the original feather pillows were exchanged for foam on request quickly. The suite was clean and serviced every day. The bathroom was large and had a bath/shower combo. The
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay. I'm very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I will share your compliments with our team. Thanks again - we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Very pleased with my stay at this property. Service was great and I really enjoyed the suite we had.  Beds were comfortable, pillows were comfortable the room looked and felt clean.  The best part... Such an easy walk to the park every morning. It was just me and my young daughter and I felt very comfortable and safe the entire time. Loved how close it was to Walgreens and Starbucks. Breakfast could’ve been a little better but overall I would absolutely stay at this again.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel after your recent stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience.

Summary Heading: Great place for your Disney Staycation!
Summary: We booked with the Hyatt House after booking with a neighboring Hotel, and coming across some subpar reviews. We live in Los Angeles and decided for our Disneyland trip we would book a hotel so we didn’t have to think about the drive home after a long day at the park.
